I don't understand why games like this always advertise themselves as something other than what they are. I was very excited because it looked  like a Heroes of Might and Magic mobile reboot but it's just another boring kingdom building game. So disappointing. I wish these game companies would actually create the games they're always pretending to be.

comments: This game has been great to me forever, and I never had a complaint but this recent update has driven me here. The trophy cap is a real kick in the nuts and ruins the game for casual gamers like me. You now HAVE to advance through the games prestige system and keep resetting all your work just to help out a gang. And if you are in a strict gang like I am, they require 100 trophies a day. If I keep advancing, I won't be able to keep up with that. This is all a money grab by zepto now. They want you to have to pay to keep your machines strong so you can compete.

I love this game. I have been playing it for a very long time. I play it every single day. I like the new updates however it seems you are getting away from the original game and focusing more on ultimate machines. Increasing the prestige levels was awesome but you need to also add additional upgrades with them as well. I have over 100 paw upgrades that are completely useless to me at the moment.

Look this was a great game, worthy of it's previous accolades. Sadly since then it's been progressively ruined by an ever more aggressively enforced attempt to move to a pay to win model. Previously you could achieve anything in the game with a bit of hard work, then they tweaked it and you could achieve anything with a bit of hard work and team work. Sadly though what's happened is soft paywalls have been introduced, things you can't outright buy, but will only manage with financial outlay and change after change is being introduced with new soft paywalls and new ways to try and cash grab. The game is on a steady but rapid downward decline and to any new players I would avoid picking it up and investing your time in it now.

Update: Now it won't even open. Once you find out your progression is rigged, the fun wears off. You will have a win streak going, them "mysteriously" a machine will show up with just the right set up to beat yours. Then once you finally get the right configuration to beat that one (however long that takes) another machine with the perfect set up to beat yours shows up again preventing you from progressing. Over and over and over....

Great game, easy to play and a good time waster. One thing I would like to see in a future update  is a scroll bar for the parts in your garage. It would make it a lot easier than swiping through them, especially for those who have a lot of spare parts like myself. Other than that, awesome game.

This game sucks. First it is really hard to get good equipment. Then it is also very laggy. Everytime im playing the game it freezes right when im doing something. (Mainly when im customizing my car). Think about it when you are getting ths game to take up storage. If you'll excuse me now I've got a game to delete.

comments: So much development has went into this game, the reason why I like it is because of the consistent updates and new stuff. It's hard to find games now with nothing new to bring to the table. It makes you want to invest into this game. Not to mention how generous they can be with the free gifts and whatnot. Keep it up Netmarble!

NM is slowly setting up higher prices for uniform qualities that should be 750 when on sale.. Now all new uniforms are 1050 when on sale even if the bonus and changes are trash. I'm disappointed that this game is changing drastically to a greedy game. Soon i will uninstall this game if this will continue.

This game is awesome. Love playing it everyday and everytime. But  recently I have a problem with the game crashing almost all the time. Please help me fix this problem.  I also want to ask when will you give Odin a uniform? A better skillset, a heal, and a piercing ability for him to shine again as a god. Looking forward to it Netmarble.

There are some incredibly predatory practices with the in app purchases.  For example, if you buy the new Emma Frost pack, you won't get her work fully leveled gear, and that isn't made clear on the purchase screen.  You will need to buy the package at least once, and possible multiple times over to actually advance her.

This game was good. The past 6 months have just been a display of how game companies do not care for user experience but rather their pockets. Cash grab all the way. This game had potential to be the greatest, but a pure let down for the entire community.
Game is easily a 4/5 stars, it's fun, addictive, and fair. It has had it wobbles but for new players, there is enough to do to keep you interested without needing to pay cash.

comments: It's a very realistic tycoon games. Had lots of run buying 'real' properties as I travel. The market place bidding section is like a trading floor.  🌟  because the bugs are not being fixed and is affecting game play. Added on 5/3/18 I have been writing to you about this issue. The fix you provide doesn't last.

It was a great game..... until they started removing coins from your balance after watching ads.... I sent a support ticket and they told me it is a known issue, but there's nothing they can do to fix it... And they would not credit me back my lost coins!

This game is interesting. It isn't time consuming, which is good and it is still be entertaining.Every 2-3 days I check on the game to wait till my money is full and I buy new properties which, I have to admit is quite satisfying. Especially if you own 100% of it.The only downside I could find is the coins system which gives upper hand for gamers that have money to spend into this type of game. However i still find it entertaining and I'm trying to make my own way through competition into getting first place on all rankings.  Edit:once you get rich you can't buy any properties, they're all cheap and not worth investment. You also need to play the game everyday and look for expensive properties that don't exsist. Buying properties from auctions is also not an option as most of the time it's not worth buying one.

Fun and challenging.  It takes patience to excel. Sometimes the map needs updating (abandoned business block away) but dont buy those. Also id say skip watching ads for coins because they disappear.  Anyways, enjoy. Could be the lifelong game you've been waiting for!

This is a game that is played with the real structures around you (like Ingress and Pokemon Go) but it's for buying, selling, and gaining revenue on real properties.  It's a pretty good game if you're in it for the long haul. The interface and graphics seem pretty old/bland, though.

Great game and app. Developers do a great job updating it to make it better and responding to any questions in a timely manner. Very addicting real situation game. I love it. Just wish they would provide some incentives to those of us who purchase coins on a regular basis.
description: Ever wanted to be the owner of famous real life properties?Now you can, thanks to Landlord Real Estate Tycoon everything is possible!In Landlord, the first reality based game, You will find elements of a business simulator, trading game and a bit of geolocation reality. You can buy, sell and trade digital properties set in their actual locations thanks to the use of GPS and geolocation!Invest wisely, trade with other players and compete with your friends. Make every dollar count, as you progress through the game, building your real estate empire. Ready for a challenge? Start with buying corner shops in your neighborhood, make profit on them and move forward, till you can acquire the most famous landmarks in the world. Level up and develop in order to become the biggest business tycoon!Landlord  takes the best out of trading games, tycoons and simulators to give you a taste of real business world! Find your own strategy, learn about the economy and earn your way to the top of the leaderboard!We prepared nice start for You with $50,000 of virtual currency on the beginning of the journey invest them in best possible properties around you!Earn money each time someone checks in at your property through Foursquare or Facebook Upgrade your estates to earn even more or sell them to get instant surge of dollars.It’s all about the reality:- buy your school or office – every property in the game is based on its real-life equivalent- find your favorite real estate or discover new ones- search through Market to buy properties all over the world- learn more about real-life economy and business thanks to realistic simulation- get rich by buying properties in your city and then selling them to get even more money- become the owner of your hometown and profit from it to become the richest capitalist.Compete with other Landlords, invite your friends and challenge them to see which of you is the best tycoon. Trade with other players to develop your own empire. Compete and conquer them all to become number 1 in your city, country or even in the whole world!Landlord , one of the best business games on the market, shows how to use your money in the most effective way. Level up to receive new rewards and conquer the market of real estate!Geolocation has never been so much fun! Just choose a property from the list, click on it and it’s yours, as easy as that. The challenge lies in the living economy simulation – you must be very careful not to go bankrupt! In opposite to clickers or simple company games, Landlord  is a true business game with fully fledged trading system based on real world. Invest your money, observe the movements of your rivals and trade with your friends. You’ll buy and sell real estate which you can upgrade to get even more profit in order to develop and level up.Do you have what it takes to conquer the market of real estate and become the richest real estate tycoon? Download NOW one of the best realestate games ever: Landlord , and build your own world!
descriptionHTML:
Ever wanted to be the owner of famous real life properties?
Now you can, thanks to Landlord Real Estate Tycoon everything is possible!

In Landlord, the first reality based game, You will find elements of a business simulator, trading game and a bit of geolocation reality. You can buy, sell and trade digital properties set in their actual locations thanks to the use of GPS and geolocation!

Invest wisely, trade with other players and compete with your friends. Make every dollar count, as you progress through the game, building your real estate empire. Ready for a challenge? Start with buying corner shops in your neighborhood, make profit on them and move forward, till you can acquire the most famous landmarks in the world. Level up and develop in order to become the biggest business tycoon!

Landlord takes the best out of trading games, tycoons and simulators to give you a taste of real business world! Find your own strategy, learn about the economy and earn your way to the top of the leaderboard!

We prepared nice start for You with $50,000 of virtual currency on the beginning of the journey
invest them in best possible properties around you!

Earn money each time someone checks in at your property through Foursquare or Facebook
Upgrade your estates to earn even more or sell them to get instant surge of dollars.

It’s all about the reality:
- buy your school or office – every property in the game is based on its real-life equivalent
- find your favorite real estate or discover new ones
- search through Market to buy properties all over the world
- learn more about real-life economy and business thanks to realistic simulation
- get rich by buying properties in your city and then selling them to get even more money
- become the owner of your hometown and profit from it to become the richest capitalist.

Compete with other Landlords, invite your friends and challenge them to see which of you is the best tycoon. Trade with other players to develop your own empire. Compete and conquer them all to become number 1 in your city, country or even in the whole world!

Landlord , one of the best business games on the market, shows how to use your money in the most effective way. Level up to receive new rewards and conquer the market of real estate!

Geolocation has never been so much fun! Just choose a property from the list, click on it and it’s yours, as easy as that. The challenge lies in the living economy simulation – you must be very careful not to go bankrupt! In opposite to clickers or simple company games, Landlord is a true business game with fully fledged trading system based on real world. Invest your money, observe the movements of your rivals and trade with your friends. You’ll buy and sell real estate which you can upgrade to get even more profit in order to develop and level up.

Do you have what it takes to conquer the market of real estate and become the richest real estate tycoon?
Download NOW one of the best realestate games ever: Landlord , and build your own world!

My main complaint is THE HACKERS WHO DRIVE ME TO THE POINT OF A MENTAL BREAKDOWN. This game has great potential, it just needs the major issues addressed.

It's needed bug fixes for HTC One M8 since release. Current event RoboBebe stuck at applying configs. Matches work fine over my work hotel wifi but home wifi must reconnect after every match pvp or solo. 5* is my opinion regardless just 1* to try and catch devs attention

Now with one day to get to legendary tje game crashed...pathetic. Wish i could give a lower rating

! GOOD !, Arcade style eat'em up game. Feels ALOT like "Echo The Dolphin". Except ur a badass shark! The ONLY hold backs is the controls, but u really can't do much about that problem unless u actually had physical/analog joysticks built n2 ur phone.?. The basic control problems u have w/ ne downloadable games.
Addictive, played for hours at a friends house until 3 in the morning. Got it for myself. Gems are costly, but save up and you can get the baby on the last shark. Then get hungry shark world.

It's mindless fun and the soft gore while eating a human is fun. The underwater scenes are visually pleasant. I also like the feature that warps you to the North Pole once a day. The random vortexs that throw you into space are also a really fun feature.

Love the game but in the last couple days, I'll get into a warp and it'll freeze completely on me. And It truly disappoints me because I could've had so many coins by now. I cannot play the game at all with it not freezing and making me start over.. I don't know if it's a virus or what but I wish it would get fixed.

descriptionHTML:
Take control of a very Hungry Shark and go on a frantic ocean rampage!

Survive as long as possible by eating everything and everyone in your way!
Explore underwater worlds filled with delicious and exotic creatures!
Collect and evolve iconic sharks like the Great White, Hammerhead and Megalodon!

In this action-packed aquatic adventure:

• Unlock more than a dozen unique sharks and other fintastic creatures
• Explore free-roaming worlds both above and below the waves
• Enjoy jawsome 3D graphics and sound effects
• Discover and devour mysterious creatures of the deep
• Recruit Baby Sharks to boost your predatory powers
• Equip awesome accessories like Lasers, Jetpacks and Top Hats!
• Find and collect sunken Bonus Objects
• Sink your teeth into loads of challenging missions
• Activate Gold Rush to survive longer and score higher
• Take part in regular in-game events to score limited edition prizes
• Challenge your friends via Facebook social features
• Attack with intuitive touch or tilt controls
• Play offline wherever you are – no Wi-Fi needed!
• Synchronize your game easily across Android devices

Compatible with Android 4.0 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy Gem and Coin currency which can be spent on upgrades and accessories. Gems and Coins can also be collected in game without requiring purchase, or by watching video advertisements from the Treasure screen.
This game contains advertising.
Advertising is disabled if you make any purchase.

Follow on Twitter @HungrySharkEvo
Subscribe on YouTube: http://youtube.com/FutureGamesOfLondon
Need support? Have some feedback for us? Contact: support@fgol.co.uk"

descriptionHTML:
Pokerrrr 2 is the ultimate multiplayer poker app to play with your buddies! Poker online games are now as simple as creating a free private room, setting the rules, and dealing out the cards. It’s like having poker night in the palm of your hand, anytime, anywhere!

Let Pokerrrr 2 be the shuffler and dealer so you can get right into playing game modes like Ultimate Texas Hold’em, Sit-and-go, Pot-Limit Omaha Poker, Round of Each and more!

Play poker with friends however you like with the custom game feature, where you can set all the details of the table, like the blinds, buy-in range, and max players. Host a poker tournament directly on your TV by connecting your Tablet!

Want multiplayer poker with new poker buddies? Play world poker with people around the globe when you join or create a Poker club!

Want live hold’em, five card poker and more? Be a poker star with friends when you download Pokerrrr 2!

Pokerrrr 2 is a virtual poker app to play poker with friends. Free poker is simple to start, just install the app, create a private room, and share the room code! The poker app keeps records of your past games, so you’ll always know who’s the poker king.

POKERRRR 2 FEATURES:

♤ Play Poker ♤
♠ Host live poker games online in private rooms, just for friends!
♠ Multiplayer poker with multiple game modes, including Texas Hold’em Deluxe, Sit-and-Go, multi-table poker tournament and Omaha poker, for up to 9 players.
♠ Pocket poker with its own card shuffler and dealer, so you can spend more time playing!
♠ Intense poker hands can be saved and replayed with our unique Hand history

♡ Free Poker Online ♡
♥ Poker night in free private clubs with your friends from around the world or join clubs to meet new players.
♥ Poker online games hosted with a members-only chat in each club.
♥ Play poker with friends when you invite them to a club with the unique club code.

♢ Poker Games of All Kinds ♢
♦ Omaha poker
♦ Five card poker
♦ Texas Holdem Deluxe
♦ Ultimate Texas Holdem
♦ Vegas Poker
= And so much more! =

♧ Live Poker On the Big Screen TV ♧
♣ Poker tournaments and parties can be held on your TV from Pokerrrr 2.
♣ Play poker on the big screen by connecting your Tablet!
♣ Poker chips and community cards will be shown on Tablet while two hand cards are dealt to each player's phone.
♣ Play poker for fun with Big Screen mode, supporting cash game, SNG and MTT.

Get multiplayer Poker like you’ve never experienced before on the Play Store! Play like a poker star with your friends - It’s as simple as host, share, and play!

《 What others say 》
"It’s great for those times when you don’t have a deck of cards or poker chips lying around." - AppAdvice

"Don’t wait for Vegas. This app lets you create your own poker club and play poker with friends anytime, anywhere." - Yahoo

”It’s a really great update on poker playing experience, so download Pokerrrr and try something new for POKER NIGHT.“ - APPSAGA

Top p2p poker app in AppStore:
- Top 1 in 20+ countries
- Top 10 in 60+ countries
-------------------------------------

Additional information:
- This game is intended for an adult audience and does not offer real money gambling or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at social gaming does not imply future success at real money gambling.
- Use of this application is governed by Pokerrrr2's Terms of Service, found at http://pokerrrrapp.com/terms/

comments: A well made app that's immersive, addictive, and the essence of the Kingdom Hearts franchise. The app is mission based and has a complex but easy to use medal system with rock-paper-scissors type of combat. You can join/make a party, or go solo. Money isn't an issue so long as you pace yourself. It gets better the more you play. There are optional event quests and a story, but don't fret if you can't get the app or just starting out; it's slow going. 735 quests.

Liking the cute art style but my god does this game take forever to download even with a low resolution. Has taken me two attempts and I'm doubtful that it's related to my broadband speed and connection (not sure if it's to do with my phone? But again, doubtful.) Would be great if this could be fixed somehow.

I freaking love this game! However I have a small complaint that is probably fixable. I was wondering for my lg g6 if you could expand the borders so the screen would fit. And if the screen is not able to get any bigger, I'm hoping you people can at least put a cool border around it instead of leaving it as a black bar. I know you people can make cool borders. Thanks for your attention!

Hey guys, huge fan of the kingdom hearts series and also the game in general. Though one thing I wish you could add is the option to link your data to your Google Play account as well as Facebook. Not a lot of us use Facebook so I wish there was more options to get your data back if you ever deleted the app. Otherwise, good game!

I love this game.  Strategy, adventure, and story (once you get far enough) are all great!  Although it is a little pay to win, and they keep coming out with new medals (attacks) that are infinitely better than your current ones.  This can get discurraging, because your hard work doesn't really mean much in the long run.    I played for 6 month when a friend got a single medal that made him more powerful than me on his 1st week playing.

[Edit: THANK YOU SO MUCH! I love that you all added a lower quality version this way I can play this game.] I like it and all, but when that very large download starts after the tutorial, it stops at 4/6 and restarts, even though my phone has enough room for it, I think. Please fix this, I really want to play it!

Each fighting is a kind of unique experience! = Features =Stablish Your Territory and Ready for action!You will never know how to do when you have to fight back. Your territory needs to accommodate a strong fleet and you need to protect yourself in naval battle. Establish your territory and update its buildings, which can give you a better protection in PVP and PVE.The Whole Global Multi-player Online (PVP)!You are not the only commander with territory! In this game, you need to fight with thousands of commanders to prevent them from destroying your territory. Launch your warship to defend your territory and strike with them to rob their resources!  Unpredictable Brains Battle!Technology determines its fighting capacity, but the strength comparison will not last eternally. The Most Exciting Iron Warship!Steel vessel and Solid cannon are the immortal soul of naval battle! descriptionHTML:
The latest expected AAA Naval-battle game has been online, adding multi-lines fighting to its traditional single-line fighting! The game combines different warships to create its unique naval fleet! As the commander of the fleet, your mission is to strike enemy’s warship and to save your territorial sea! Each fighting is a kind of unique experience!

= Features =

Stablish Your Territory and Ready for action!
You will never know how to do when you have to fight back. Your territory needs to accommodate a strong fleet and you need to protect yourself in naval battle. Establish your territory and update its buildings, which can give you a better protection in PVP and PVE.

The Whole Global Multi-player Online (PVP)!
You are not the only commander with territory! In this game, you need to fight with thousands of commanders to prevent them from destroying your territory. Launch your warship to defend your territory and strike with them to rob their resources!

Unpredictable Brains Battle!
Technology determines its fighting capacity, but the strength comparison will not last eternally.

The Most Exciting Iron Warship!
Steel vessel and Solid cannon are the immortal soul of naval battle! Various aircrafts, battle ships, cruisers, destroyers are waiting silently in the dock and they are waiting for your service.

Research Advanced Technology!
Research new technologies, new equipment and can build warships. Leading technology has a great impact on the entire country.

Download Iron Warship:Battle and join the PVP war!

comments: Good game, good graphics,good sound. I like that it is on going, not like some similar games. I found it fairly easy to get used too. Plenty of choices and cars. I like that you are not constantly forced to spend real money in order to progress. That is a big plus for us game players. Well done all at EA, you have a real winner with this game. I personally am loving playing this game. Update, I have been playing for a few days now, the only drawback I have noticed is, the game takes up a lot of space on my device. Having said that, its so good its worth it. As previously, well done all at EA.

Excellent game! I have no doubt that the game is one of the most perfect games. Everything but one thing. I just ran one race that comes with the actualization and I won around 5k, te first upgrade for the camaro Nascar costs around 130k does that even make sense. In the real life if you spend that money to make a competitive car to win that money... I hope you get my meaning

The MOST AMAZING racing game in the mobile device. The gameplay, graphics, and the controls were perfect. Also, the tracks in the game were so real like I was racing in real life. I also loves the cars that were added in this game, it looks so amazing. But, what I like the most from this game was online real-time racing. There were no other racing games that has this feature. Just have suggestions, add custom race mode. In this mode, you can chose tracks, daytime, amount of opponents, and also the laps. And also enable to invite friends to custom race mode. Also, probably adding weather system will be better. Last, make the cars could do rev-bombing. So, at the start of the races, you could have some pretty good start. Although, keep it up Electronic Arts & Fire Monkeys. Hopefully, these suggestions could help the game become much better and better.

Well,to start off, game really speaks for itself.Everything is pretty dope. I'm just going to name some things that I'm sure most of the people wants. -Dynamic weather conditions,how amazing snow day on Bathurst would be?Rain,wind,foggy... -Breakable parts, mirrors, spoilers,even wheels,and those should be on the tarmac whole race. -Drift events, I'm just going to say,we all want it. -More hatchbacks definitely,and more cars like its Jeep,or Ford Raptor,and you can add unique cars from movies,etc. -And sprint events,point to point.How fun is that. -More mountains!!! Please. Peace!

the graphic, control, and gameplay is good as always, but the problem is, i played this years ago just with a device with 1gb RAM and i have mid-high graphic setting, but now im running with oppo a37f and i think it can run this game with a mid or mid 2 graphic setting... but no, my game always set to the lowest graphic, could you guys fix this problem? i love this game and i'd like to enjoy it in its best performance

It's a great game where you can race and customise your own car. However here are some ideas I would like you the imlament please  1. If the cars from the NASCAR can get the custmizeing like all the others.   2. To extend the custmize can yo add a tab where you can put spoilers, air intakes And other things you would put on a car.  3. Finally to make this game real racing 3 if when a race of just go to see all the car you have.  There be a "i" button that will give the player real information about the car the player is looking at.

descriptionHTML:
**#1 Top Free App in over 100 countries**

Real Racing 3 is the award-winning franchise that sets a new standard for mobile racing games – you have to play it to believe it.

This app offers in-app purchases. You may disable in-app purchasing using your device settings.

Over 200 Million Downloads!

TabbyAwards 2014 – WINNER: Best Action, Adventure, Arcade & Racing Game
Mobile Excellence Awards – WINNER: Best Mobile Game 2013
Game Connect Asia Pacific – WINNER: Game of The Year 2013, Technical Excellence, Excellence in Art
Meffy Awards – FINALIST: Best Mobile Game 2013

Real Racing 3 features an ever-expanding roster of officially licensed tracks with 39 circuits at 17 real-world locations, a 43-car grid and over 140 meticulously detailed cars from top manufacturers. Plus Real-Time Multiplayer, Social Leaderboards, Time Trials, night racing, and innovative Time Shifted Multiplayer™ (TSM) technology, allowing you to race anyone, anytime, anywhere.

“A stunning visual masterpiece on mobile” (Touch Arcade)

REAL CARS
Take the wheel of over 140 intensely detailed vehicles from iconic manufacturers like Ford, Ferrari, Lamborghini, Aston Martin and Mercedes-Benz and test your skills on an authentic 43-car race grid – the most epic racing experience on any handheld.

REAL TRACKS
Burn rubber on a full lineup of 17 real tracks in multiple configurations from top worldwide locations, including Silverstone, Hockenheimring, Le Mans, Dubai Autodrome and many more.

REAL PEOPLE
Go bumper to bumper with friends and rivals in global 8-player, cross-platform, real-time racing with drafting. Or drop into any race to challenge their AI-controlled versions in Time-Shifted Multiplayer™.

MORE CHOICES THAN EVER
Compete in over 4,000 events including Cup races, Eliminations and Endurance challenges. Choose from a wide range of upgrades to maximize your car’s performance. Customize your car with a huge collection of paints, vinyls and rims. View the action from a variety of camera angles, tweak the HUD and fine-tune the controls to your personal preference.

THE PREMIER RACING EXPERIENCE
Powered by the remarkable Mint™ 3 Engine, Real Racing 3 features detailed car damage, fully functioning rear view mirrors, and dynamic reflections for truly HD racing. Enjoy a rich, next-gen game with the most advanced cross-platform social and competitive racing community ever. Real Racing 3 delivers it all and pushes the boundaries with every update.

Welcome to the definitive racing experience.

recentChanges: Real Racing 3 returns to Daytona in our third exhilarating NASCAR update, where you can:
• Take on three all-new NASCAR limited-time series, featuring the NASCAR 2018 Chevy Camaro, Toyota Camry, and Ford Fusion

PLEASE FIX THIS NET ISSUE WERE ARE TRYING OUR BEST TO WIN BUT ENDED UP LOSING BECAUSE OF THE NET ISSUE. . Thanks. I love this game so much so please be fair.

Women's Royal Rumble. Generous fair ads mid way between limited and unlimited leading to competitiveness going back to it. So much better than old s4 and it's only day 1. Can't talk about heroic yet haven't got one but sounds good too.

Love the app and the game it is very addictive. I love the changes to season 4; however your ticket store and CP PVP store is still bugged as I am still getting cards well below my rank. Also PVP is very buggy as I am always seeing waiting for opponent or opponent is viewing last match which isn't an option. Just wondering if there is a security team that monitors online activity because it seems like a lot of people are manipulating the network at times.

I like the game but last week 2 of my cards where removed I didn't accidentally delete them. They was locked. I emailed and got told that there was nothing they can do. It is a Titan pro Neville and a beast pro Tamina can someone help me get my cards back I played a lot of games to pro them right

Horrible, disgusting excuse for customer service I have ever seen. Automated response no matter the issue. Never a problem ( and there are many many many issues.) Do not let the WWE license fool you, this is NOT a company I would support and I'm not sure why WWE can't find another company to produce a game.like this.

They are still plagued by PVP issues that they claim they are fixing, but never do anything about. Not worth playing as you won't actually recieve your rewards for playing, and they won't help you if you send in a help ticket. You will only get form letter responses. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND.

descriptionHTML:
Play the card battle game downloaded by over 16 million players worldwide in WWE SuperCard!

Start collecting thousands of cards featuring your favorite WWE and NXT Superstars, Legends and WWE Hall of Fame Inductees. Play highly competitive Player vs Player (PVP) Leagues and rise up the unified PVP leaderboard system. Improve your card battle strategy in new arenas like Monday Night Raw, SmackDown Live, and NXT! Test your skills in the new Elimination Chamber PVP mode, and a whole lot more.

Collect every Superstar to create a powerful card deck, step into the ring, and prove you’re the best in the world!

WWE SuperCard Season 4 has finally arrived with over 250 new cards across 3 brand-new tiers!

WWE SuperCard Season 4 includes:

CCG - START COLLECTING CARDS
-WWE SuperCard introduces 250 new cards across three new tiers–Beast, Monster and Titan.
-WWE Superstars like Roman Reigns, AJ Styles, Sasha Banks and Braun Strowman are all collectible

PVP CARD BATTLES - ONLINE MULTIPLAYER LEAGUES & MOMENTUM
-Level up your deck to become the top ranked SuperCard player in the world!
-Check WWE SuperCard’s new unified leaderboard and League system for PVP game modes.
-Win PVP games and earn Competitive Points based on your rank to get even better rewards.
-PVP Competitive Points can be used in the CP Store to get new cards, cardbacks, and packs!
-Unlock powerful boosts with the new Momentum system to defeat champions and prepare for the next League.

Battle for the KING OF THE RING title
-Card battle in the ever-popular ‘King of the Ring’ mode with an all-new bracket structure!
-Tournament gameplay – Battle head-to-head in groups of eight during the 32-player tournament.
-Keep wrestling to earn awesome rewards for each stage you advance.

POWER UP YOUR DECK IN OPEN CHALLENGES
-Collect and earn tickets each day by completing new daily and event-based challenges.
-Collecting powerful cards is easy when you redeem your tickets for more rewards!

NEW GAME MODE – ELIMINATION CHAMBER
-PVP Mode – Elimination Chamber is the first mode to feature an all-female Superstar deck!
-Use strategy and skill to prove you’re a wrestling technician in head-to-head, deck-elimination gameplay

Build a deck of your favorite WWE Superstars!

Download WWE SuperCard now to start collecting Superstars today!

***Update requires OS 4.2.1+ WILL NOT RUN ON ANY EARLIER OS***

description: Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! -  a Match 3 puzzle adventurePublished by Strawdog.The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animationsSimon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!
descriptionHTML:
Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! - a Match 3 puzzle adventure
Published by Strawdog.

The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!

Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.
Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!

Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?
Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!

Simon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.

We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!

Plarium do not like Aussies. They charge us extra money for offers.   A top end offer is $100 USD for the Americans. Which is $120-125 AUD after currency conversion for Australians. Yet for some reason our offers are $160 AUD. $35 AUD more then we should be paying.   I do not know how this practice has gone without incident as I thought there were supposed to be good anti descrimination laws and consumer laws in place that prevent the charging of extra to countries just because they do not like that country.   This is a morally disgusting practice as it is the same concept as charging more to others purely on the basis because they have a different skin colour, gender or religion.   I want to know why Australians are paying an extra $35 AUD then we should be as other mobile games. One example being Battle Mobile do the correct currency exchange rate and only charge $125 AUD after conversion from $100 USD. If other mobile games do it correctly why are Plarium choosing not to?  Edit: @ Plarium employee who just lied in response to me. Plarium set all prices up themselves through Google Playstore. NOT Google.

it's a amazing game real challenging I always get attack well not always so it's always challenging for me and for new players i also dont get much storage items and troops because of how many players attack me
description: Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world’s only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won’t be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.™.NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare™Game Features✔ FREE TO PLAY✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.✔ Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.✔ Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.✔ Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.✔ Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.✔ Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.✔ Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.✔ Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.✔ Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.✔ Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.
descriptionHTML:
Step into the next generation of MMO strategy in Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare. Train your troops, build your base and command an army against your enemies. Conquer Black Sites and outposts full of resources, and team up with friends to take total control of the battlefield!

The year is 2037, and the evil Phoenix Corporation has taken control of Selva De Fuego - the world’s only source of a new lifesaving serum. The world has declared war on Phoenix, giving every private military and mercenary force a green light to invade Selva De Fuego and do whatever it takes to crush the rogue corporation.

This where you come in. As the commander of a division of seasoned soldiers of fortune, your mission is to defeat Phoenix before your rivals - but it won’t be easy. Standing between you and victory are the most elite mercenaries and devastating weapons on the modern battlefield.

Use a cutting-edge arsenal of weapons including advanced assault vehicles, tanks and futuristic military drones to prepare for all-out warfare in the mobile sequel to the award-winning hit Soldiers Inc.™.

NOTE: Please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Soldiers Inc: Mobile Warfare™

Game Features

✔ FREE TO PLAY
✔ Available in the following languages: English, French, Spanish, Italian, German, Japanese, Korean and Russian.
✔ Incredible graphics with motion-captured hero characters and stunning 3D maps.
✔ Compete online in realtime massive multiplayer clan warfare.
✔ Train and upgrade your troops and combat systems to create an unstoppable army.
✔ Develop and deploy the next generation of military weapons across an ever-evolving battlefield.
✔ Attack or Defend - reposition your base and customize your outposts to back up your strategy.
✔ Participate in intense, tactical PvP against players all around the world.
✔ Single-player PvE missions, tournaments, rewards, and achievements.
✔ Forge an alliance, cooperate with teammates and devise strategies to defeat your rivals.
✔ Live operations with hundreds of different events and leaderboards to play across single player and PvP.

comments: This is such a fun game ever since I watched the anime when I was a child! Worth a keeper on your phone if you're super bored. This is the best time killer ever. Keep up on the updates, I would spend some money getting some cool decks. Great job on this game!

Cheating or hacks are still an issue with the potential to manipulate the game growing in diversity. Im worried for the day where they obtain the ability to wipe all our progress or cards. Also please release the wight cards. You have very weak king of skull support and im sure there are many whod  love to run it
This is really fun to play in my downtime, the duels are challenging and I'm getting better at strategy and planning through my turns! I recommend, even if you're not a fan of the show/manga!

I loved this game and really got into it until the game started crashing every time I was in a pvp duel or creating a new deck. Now it crashes a couple seconds after starting it every time. Wish they had better support for these issues.

Everything was thought of. Very easy to learn the rules. And totally awesome to be able to start playing this game for real with. Out having. To spend money.. I will spend a little though to make a nice deck

This is a very polished game. Everything is on point from graphics to game play. The meta game is very diverse with many decks being fun to play. I've come to really enjoy the speed duel format as it works great for mobile gaming. Having only 3 Monster spaces and spell/trap spaces makes you think about what you are using.

descriptionHTML:
Battle monsters, other Duelists and collect battle cards in Yu-Gi-Oh! Duel Links, the fighting card game straight from the TV show!

Online multiplayer games meet card battles in the Yu-Gi-Oh! card game. Collect cards to build your battle Deck and fight other Duelists online to see who is the Dueling Master! Enjoy voices from the anime and heighten the Dueling experience!


[FEATURES]

Fighting Card Games
- Battle other Duelists and their special battle Decks
- Intuitive controls for beginners! Depth to satisfy "Yu-Gi-Oh!" veterans!
- Build your Deck to become the most powerful Dueling Master, with monsters like "Dark Magician" and "Blue-Eyes White Dragon"
- Strategic gameplay makes you decide which card comes out next!
- Duel with your favorite characters from the Yu-Gi-Oh! world and complete Stage missions

Online Multiplayer Battles
- Fight Legendary Duelists from the show like Yugi, Kaiba, Joey, and Mai!
- Multiplayer games force you to find your opponents weakness and strategize
- PVP battles pit you against players from around the world! Climb through the rankings and take your place as the Duel World King!

Card Battle Deck
- Collect cards and form the most powerful Deck for battle!
- Build your ultimate Deck and aim for the top
- Use the cards that you collect in-game to build and edit your trusty Deck to take on opponents!
- Shop for cards in the game store!
Stay tuned for future card additions!

[ABOUT "Yu-Gi-Oh!"]
"Yu-Gi-Oh!" is a popular manga created by Kazuki Takahashi that was serialized in SHUEISHA Inc.'s "WEEKLY SHONEN JUMP" since 1996. Konami Digital Entertainment Co., Ltd. provides a Trading Card Game (TCG) and console games, based on "Yu-Gi-Oh!" created from the original manga, that are enjoyed around the world.

[Supported OS]
Android 4.4 and above

description: Fun Bridge is a contract bridge game. It enables you to play deals at your own pace, whenever you want, and rank yourself against hundreds of other players (as well as your friends) who have played the same deals as you under the same conditions. You can watch a replay of how other players have played (bidding and card play), replay deals, see your live scores and even pause a deal to resume it later. For each deal, you are compared to other players and it is possible to watch a replay of how each player has played, making Funbridge an ideal tool to progress.- 2 tournaments of the day per continent- Series tournaments and unlimited practice deals - Tournaments with MP and IMP scoring- Setting of your bidding conventions- Help for bids during the game- Watch a replay of all the other players' bids and card play- Challenge your friendsFun Bridge, your new bridge club available in French, English, Dutch, Spanish, Italian, Polish, German, Danish, Swedish, Norwegian, Portuguese, simplified Chinese and traditional Chinese.Already over 400,000 players and more than 1,000,000 deals played every day !Please note that the Funbridge application requires an Internet connection to play.
descriptionHTML:
Fun Bridge is a contract bridge game. It enables you to play deals at your own pace, whenever you want, and rank yourself against hundreds of other players (as well as your friends) who have played the same deals as you under the same conditions. You can watch a replay of how other players have played (bidding and card play), replay deals, see your live scores and even pause a deal to resume it later. For each deal, you are compared to other players and it is possible to watch a replay of how each player has played, making Funbridge an ideal tool to progress.

comments: I love your latest update! Also thank you for fixing the "internet connection lost" issue! 😊 Love the new character by the way! *-*)/ Great job!   I do have a suggestion, can you add like a one park/any place where players can meet with other players and chat? It would be great to interact with other players, not just in your guild group 😊 hoping you'll consider it. Thank you so much for making this game! So addicting!

It'll be nice if we earn those ITEMS given in the stages description.  I kept on earning only common item no epic or legendary.  Which is sad but game is smooth which is good.  Thank you google for the update.  If we may add would love an auto healing potion during adventure. Thank you

Edit: Issue was resolved and devs were very quick to reply and help, which they seem to do consistently. I really love this game because it's easy to get good equipment and currency, you aren't forced to pay to win. Rewards for login/quests are very generous, prices of cards to equip new items isn't unreasonable. The characters and items you can equip look stunning. The only thing I can criticise is the unbalanced PvP, but I solve that by not playing PvP lol.

Marvelous heroes, outstanding graphics, excellent costumes, and cute pets. I realy like this game. But I hope this game would turn into an open world where all players could see each other at a single area. Perhaps a town or some kind of a city where everyone could gather and more features like whispers, world chat, etc. Well aside from that the game is totally amazing. Would much likely recommend this game.

Great game beside the fact it is a memory-eater this is exactly what you expect from cell game in 2018 good graphic smooth gameplay and enough energy reward not to worry about beeing stpp because of a lack of it. The omly downside is the pvp which is build in a way you are up against player who 1HKO you which get pretty frustrating.

When I tried to relaunch, after the Google Play Store and Nexus logo, it just stuck on the black screen. Nothing happened, waited for 5 minutes, still nothing happened. So I deleted the app and reinstall it. Still stuck on the black screen after the google plastore and nexus logo. Hopefully u guys patch this up ASAP, and I'll gladly change the rating once this is sorted out

description: Join more than 30 million brainiacs and try WordBrain - Brain training at its BEST! This is a word puzzle for true word geniuses! It starts out very easy but gets challenging quickly. I'm a woman in real life and want to play one online too!!! When are you all going to add women characters???

Graphics are good an Gun play is pretty fair. When battling the game goes on runs where I get matched against teams whos members are way stronger then my team an I. Then it goes back to fair match making.   3 Month UPDATE: The game has turned into a money grab. You have no chance to compete against players that drop a bunch of money an have 4 an 5 star guns. This was the top shooting game in my opinion, but turning it into a pay to compete killed the fun with this game. Havent been match fairly against players in a couple weeks now. I would recommend trying a different p vs p shooting game.

Amazing game, however there is one small problem, but not enough for me to not give it 5 stars. Recently when I've been watching an ad to double the reward at the end of the battle, the video has played until the end and it says the reward has been doubled, but I only receive the regular reward? It has happened 15-20 times and it's getting slightly annoying, as I'm about 4000 gunbucks short of what I should be now. Anyways, thanks for making such an awesome free game with little to no adverts!  UPDATE: video watching for additional rewards does not work with anything. No extra crates or supplies

One of the best fps I've played. Graphics is cartoonish but fun, Remedy is underpowered in the sense that it doesn't generate a decent HP on each hit. On lower levels, it's decent but on higher levels against Porcupine, Ranger, Thunder it doesn't stand a chance that could be balanced out by either increasing the rate of fire or increased health generation on each hit , Lifestealer is pretty darn awesome but could do better with a bit smaller crosshair and little bit more accuracy

Initially the game seems super addictive but once you hit level 16 it gets ridiculous. You have players who have spent money on guns and you're practically no match. Also the teaming of players should be balanced out. Another thing is even if you win a match you win around 30 trophies, if you lose there's a loss of 60 and if by chance you're internet is bad and you automatically get kicked out and cannot reenter you lose a 100 .Eventually you get sick and tired of all this and the game gets boring.
description: ✔ “A brilliant multiplayer FPS that you should just go and play right now. 9/10” — PocketGamer✔ “It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat.” — Android and Me✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be! • Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!Soldier! You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then! This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!Notice: Please note that Google ARCore, which is used in our game, may collect and process your data: www.google.com/policies/privacy/partners/

✔ “Guns of Boom has gone where no game has gone before – it’s a legitimately great shooter on mobile.” — Droid Gamers
✔ “You’ve never seen an FPS for mobile quite as good as this. You will come back because the game experience is just topnotch.” — AndroidCommunity
✔ “Guns of Boom is some solid, streamlined shooting that feels better than quite a few other mobile shooters.” — 148Apps

• Easy and intuitive controls: pump your opponents full of lead from the get-go!
• Awesome graphics for immersive gameplay: stylish levels and cool animation will keep you glued to the screen!
• Autofire: all you need to do is get the enemy into your crosshairs.
• Dynamic battles: play on a team and rip your enemies to shreds! The more active you are in battle, the better your reward will be!
• Various guns: 48 weapons to choose from, including machine guns, assault and sniper rifles, shotguns, and more. Each has its own unique ability: increased headshot damage, slowing down enemies, and even health leeching. Find a gun that fits your style of play!
• Explosive fun: free mobile shoot-outs that will leave your heart pounding! Gear up, soldiers!


Soldier!
You are one step away from action-packed combat! Can you keep steady aim under heavy fire and gun down enemies while grenades are exploding all around you? Can you handle that kind of fun?! Welcome to the game then!

This ain’t no regular army, though. No one will tell you what to do or where to shoot. You have to make your own decisions and choose your own battles. Team up with other soldiers, get good at killing opponents and dominate the battlefield. Make a blitz attack, spraying lead in all directions, or try and shoot your opponent from a safe distance, taking your time to aim directly for the head. It's always your call.  Now, these wars won’t fight themselves! Get to the armory, gear up, and start making a BOOM! On the double!
Guns of Boom is a hardcore multiplayer shooter with eye-popping 3D graphics and blood-boiling gameplay. It’s so simple that your cat can learn the controls, but the skill-cap is high enough to make even hardened FPS veterans break a sweat. Engage in online PvP battles on a variety of maps, utilizing different deadly guns, as well as frag grenades and med kits. Experience the ultimate competitive tension without leaving your couch!

description: Fleet Command is a naval warfare strategy game based on real life ships and military ranks, providing players a captivating experience of naval wars. Strengthen your power by managing and developing your base, producing resources, building ships, recruiting officers and more. Set sail to discover the vast riches of the sea in the world map. Mine resources, battle pirates and wage war against other players. Establish a Legion and lead your fellow players to glory in battle. With so many aspects to the game there is more to it than raw power, the right combination of officers, equipment and strategy can overcome a more powerful enemy.The game is very easy to start with and includes a tutorial of the basics, so even players with no experience of RTS or war games will learn very quickly. New functions and equipment are unlocked as your commander level increases, allowing players to learn the game at their own pace. With a vast support network, players can learn the more advanced features of the game and truly understand which path to take to victory.Features:Several ship classes of different types, all based on real life ships of the past and present ready for you to build or collect and command. Battle effects include explosions and missile trajectory so you can watch your fleet defeat your enemies.Flexible formations allowing you to choose which ships and officers you will use for each battle. This is a fantastic dynamic to the game, making thought, planning and strategy a critical component on the path to victory in this RTS game.Build resources in your base allowing you to improve resource output, build ships and develop new technology. If you are strong or cunning enough you can also loot resources from other players.A vast word map full of riches awaits you, but be careful, other players will seek to target your mining fleets, waiting for an opportune moment to destroy them and steal the resources they have collected.Great daily login rewards, free lottery draws and free plays at events help you build and develop an invincible fleet.[Fortune favours the bold] -Preparation is everything, have your ships ready to seize the moment when it arrives and take the resources you need from an enemy base or mine.[Pre-emptive Strike] - It might already be too late when you see hostile fleets on course for your base or fleet! Strike first and deal a crippling blow to your enemies before they strike against you. Fight for resource spots to mine to bring you more resources to develop your fleet. Recruit better officers and enhance equipment to make your fleets formidable in combat.[Domination] - Deploy your ships wisely and vary fleet formations to have maximum effect against your foe, weaken strong enemies and defeat weaker fleets to truly dominate the ocean! Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each ship class and put them in the best formation to deal devastating attacks on your enemies.For more information you can go to our Facebook page 'Fleet Command Community' (English): Fleet Command CommunityOr visit our forum: https://forum.movga.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=62Email: fc@movga.com
descriptionHTML:
Fleet Command is a naval warfare strategy game based on real life ships and military ranks, providing players a captivating experience of naval wars. Strengthen your power by managing and developing your base, producing resources, building ships, recruiting officers and more. Set sail to discover the vast riches of the sea in the world map. Mine resources, battle pirates and wage war against other players. Establish a Legion and lead your fellow players to glory in battle. With so many aspects to the game there is more to it than raw power, the right combination of officers, equipment and strategy can overcome a more powerful enemy.
The game is very easy to start with and includes a tutorial of the basics, so even players with no experience of RTS or war games will learn very quickly. New functions and equipment are unlocked as your commander level increases, allowing players to learn the game at their own pace. With a vast support network, players can learn the more advanced features of the game and truly understand which path to take to victory.
Features:
Several ship classes of different types, all based on real life ships of the past and present ready for you to build or collect and command. Battle effects include explosions and missile trajectory so you can watch your fleet defeat your enemies.
Flexible formations allowing you to choose which ships and officers you will use for each battle. This is a fantastic dynamic to the game, making thought, planning and strategy a critical component on the path to victory in this RTS game.
Build resources in your base allowing you to improve resource output, build ships and develop new technology. If you are strong or cunning enough you can also loot resources from other players.
A vast word map full of riches awaits you, but be careful, other players will seek to target your mining fleets, waiting for an opportune moment to destroy them and steal the resources they have collected.
Great daily login rewards, free lottery draws and free plays at events help you build and develop an invincible fleet.
[Fortune favours the bold] -Preparation is everything, have your ships ready to seize the moment when it arrives and take the resources you need from an enemy base or mine.
[Pre-emptive Strike] - It might already be too late when you see hostile fleets on course for your base or fleet! Strike first and deal a crippling blow to your enemies before they strike against you. Fight for resource spots to mine to bring you more resources to develop your fleet. Recruit better officers and enhance equipment to make your fleets formidable in combat.
[Domination] - Deploy your ships wisely and vary fleet formations to have maximum effect against your foe, weaken strong enemies and defeat weaker fleets to truly dominate the ocean! Learn the strengths and weaknesses of each ship class and put them in the best formation to deal devastating attacks on your enemies.

For more information you can go to our Facebook page 'Fleet Command Community' (English): Fleet Command Community
Or visit our forum: https://forum.movga.com/forumdisplay.php?fid=62
Email: fc@movga.com

comments: The game itself is wonderful, but I've had this bug ever since Chapter 2 or 3 (I just finished Chapter 12) where when I finish the final level, the screen goes black and won't play the cutscene. I end up having to close the game and never get to see it, then I go into the next Chapter not really knowing what's going on. The story is important to me and it's very unfortunate that this is happening. A fix from the developers or a suggestion on something I can do would be greatly appreciated.

Really enjoy this game.  Just wish we could pay for land expansions because they don't come fast enough.  Running out of room to place everything.  Yes they have the cargo ship but you lose points for doing that.

I play whenever I can. Very Enjoyable!  Love both searching scenes and decorating my island. Love being able to rearrange, and I wish I could move the gifts I receive.  Don't like waiting the 4 hours to regain energy and I would gladly watch ads to be able to fill my energy. It would be nice to have a larger expansion area while needing the same requirements. Love the speciality collections!  Great job!

In one of the recent updates, the timers to receive flowers messed up.  Purchased the passenger car and I'm on the fourth day so far. It counts down, but just before it finishes, another day is added.
Game is too slow to progress. You find the clues, you get the flowers but you have to spend DAYS to get stars to progress!
Energy Bar drains too quickly. Other than this very cool game.

description: Escape to an island getaway filled with adventure, mystery, and fun new mini games in this colorful free-to-play game from the makers of FarmVille, the number one farming franchise! Adventure unfolds all around your island! ESCAPE TO THE TROPICS - Seek adventures on your very own tropical island - Farm unique fruits and veggies, craft fun drinks and meet adorable animals - Discover all of the tropical crops and exotic animals that call your island home - Run a beachside inn and start a new life in paradise - Play mini games and have fun with new characters like Ting UNCOVER MYSTERY, SECRETS AND TREASURES - Complete story-based quests with island guides like the archaeologist and surfing expert - Explore the bubbling volcano and ancient monkey temple - Discover hidden treasures and rare goods in the secret chamber - Investigate uncharted areas to find even more island secrets BUILD AMENITIES FOR YOUR GUESTS - Fix up island workshops and create your own personal paradise - Buy a Tiki Bar, Sushi Stand, Artisan Workshop and more - Expand your inn and hire guides to help your guests enjoy the island DISCOVER AND PHOTOGRAPH ADORABLE ANIMALS FOR REWARDS - Build a Wildlife Center on your island with the help of Ting, the wildlife guide - Attract rare and exotic animals to your island like the colorful Iguana by feeding them treats - Earn rewards by snapping photos of the animals as souvenirs for your guests TRADE WITH OTHER ISLANDS - Trade with other players using the trade boat - Short on eggs? Buy the goods you need from neighboring islands - Have too many pineapples? Name your price and sell off extra crops and crafts - The more coins you have, the more you can do on your island ADDITIONAL DISCLOSURES • For specific information about how Zynga collects and uses personal or other data, please read our privacy policy at http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.• This game does permit a user to connect to social networks, such as Facebook, and as such players may come into contact with other people when playing this game. Social Networking Service terms may also apply.• The game is free to play, however in-app purchases are available for additional content and premium currency. In-app purchases range from $0.99 to $99.99.• You will be given the opportunity to participate in special offers, events, and programs from Zynga Inc and its partners. Use of this application is governed by the Zynga Terms of Service, found at http://m.zynga.com/legal/terms-of-service. Collection and use of personal data are subject to Zynga’s Privacy Policy, found at  http://www.zynga.com/privacy/policy.

comments: It's sad to see people complaining and giving bad reviews about crashing but not knowing it's probably because their device is  g a r b a g e. I have j3 6 which is pretty bad and still runs well. Very optimized, sleek game. Also alot of updated to keep the game fresh and the microtransactions are very fair.

Very fun game, wish it wasn't energy based, would definitely enjoy it more. The fishing is 'new' right now and i have to say the percentages are garbage. 75 percent is more like 50, 50 percent is like 10 percent,  25 percent is closer to 50. This is just my personal experience. The games is really fun though, expect to get annoyed with the fishing percentages however. Also energy gets spent super fast in this game, very fun yet very limited.

It's good and alot of fun but it's a bit of a tedious grindfest. 150% item find and I found nothing after going through ten dungeons. I want to keep playing but it's just another pay to win type. I understand you need to make money but I can buy a full loadout of epic equipment and run through a great portion of the game in no time. It's definetly worth giving a try but unfortunetly it's not for me.

I fell in love with this game as soon as I opened it the first time. But there is a problem which forces me to give it a 2 star rating. It kicks me out of the game every 5 minutes and that way I can't get any progress done. I absolutely enjoyed the little playtime I got and I want to play it more but it won't let me. Great job otherwise devs!
Fun and amazing game, great time killer for me, I just love these pixelated games so much.. to be fair it sounds like it's more Terraria and pokemon mixed typa thing y'know.. 5 stars

Been playing this for about a week.  It's a lot of fun with a variety of different things to do.  Running out of energy for doing dungeons doesn't matter a lot as there are three or four other things to do in game that don't require energy.  Will be making a purchase to support the devs.  Good game!
description: Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!Key Features:*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.A network connection is required to play.
descriptionHTML:
Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.

Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.

Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!

Key Features:
*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!
*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!
*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.
*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.
*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).
*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!
*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!
*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.
*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.
*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.

PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.

A network connection is required to play.

title: Bit Heroes

comments: I would give a full 5 stars on everything because I love this game! But I just got a new phone and the account was linked to my Google account and I can't access my character, whom of which, I spent a bit of real money on to make VIP 4. I emailed support and they told me what server my character should be on and she's still not there! It keeps prompting me to make a new character.

So the game glitched out and I lost graphics, no effects when using skills and what not. Other people in game said they had the same problem and said to fix it, you needed to uninstall it and redownload. Which I did. But now my characters are gone and I have to start off fresh. I've spent money in the game on  building up two characters. And I'm pissed now that it appears its money totally wasted. I feel that this is basically stealing!!

My skills didn't come out when I use it.. It didn't show effects when I click on it.. It still deal damage to the monsters though.. So I uninstall and reinstall it back..  however  the loading progress keep restarting.. I had to again..reinstall the game several times! And it still didn't let me complete the download.. It keeps restarting and resetting to 0%

Since updated my graphics have changed. I don't see special effects and  the cloud tasks when I try do them I can't see the flowers and my character glitches threw the floor. And I also lost a my character after logging out and back in again

This is the first game I ever played that u can have a wedding without paying using real money. I guess its a good thing. But else, why u have to take so much time for maintaince.... And it will be the best game I've ever play if u can add more outfit and character...
Was having good time. Went to log in today and said client error after small update. Now I've lost 3 level 40's and won't restore with my Facebook i used my account for...
description: Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed by a next-gen engine, it will grant you with great fluent combat and exquisite 3D graphics. The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! Various things keep you occupied in this game, such as various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfight.●BACKGROUND●The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.●FEATURES●- This MMORPG brings you Skywing System, Aerial Battles;- You can fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin;- Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles. ◆VISUAL FEAST●- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects- 720 degree panoramic view- Exquisite character art and design◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●- As a MMO ARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses- Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique Marriage and social System.◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●- This MMORPG provides 4 classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior; and 243 skill combinations- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System- Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power●COMMUNITY●Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Daybreak-Legends-676005115927809/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/daybreaklegendsGoogle Plus: https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/105067286023568754437Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_JdjL055iF5dNPBqKKG0QQOfficial Page: http://dl.linekong-global.com●SUPPORT●daybreaklegends@gmail.com
descriptionHTML:
Daybreak Legends: Origin is a 3D MMORPG developed by a next-gen engine, it will grant you with great fluent combat and exquisite 3D graphics.

The game brings you seamless combat with thrilling blows and various combos! Various things keep you occupied in this game, such as various raids and duels, ranked matches, guild wars, warpet battles and dragon airfight.

●BACKGROUND●
The evil dragon comes, bringing disaster and war to the world. Only the legendary artifact can destroy the evil forces and retrieve light. In order to find the artifact and eliminate the evil, brave adventurers have embarked on a journey into the unknown.

●FEATURES●
- This MMORPG brings you Skywing System, Aerial Battles;
- You can fly freely in a stunning 720 degree panoramic view only in Daybreak Legends: Origin;
- Aerial Battles System takes your battle to the air, ground combat skills and effects will all be mapped to the aerial battles.

◆VISUAL FEAST●
- Stunning 3D graphics and combat effects
- 720 degree panoramic view
- Exquisite character art and design

◆DIVERSE GAMEPLAY●
- As a MMO ARPG, Daybreak Legends: Origin provides intense Real-time PVP&GVG battles
- Summon powerful warpets to battle epic bosses
- Start a romantic relationship and have fun with your friends based on the unique Marriage and social System.

◆PROGRESSION & CUSTOMIZATION●
- This MMORPG provides 4 classes – Puppeteer, Mage, Bounty Hunter and Warrior; and 243 skill combinations
- Customize your character with hundreds of Items, Equipment & Fashion System
- Pets & Mounts System improves your combat power
