description: اللعبة الحاصلة على لقب أفضل لعبة لعام 2016! إنضم لعالم الأساطير والمعارك الملحمية! قاتل بشجاعة مع اصدقائك وأيضاً مع أعدائك في المملكة لأن قد صار بإمكانك الآن ان تتفاخر بقوتك وقوة تحالفك أمام الممالك الأخرى.خض المغامرة وكن على قدر التحدي في لعبة إنتقام السلاطين، الللعبة العربية الحربية الأولى في العالم، صممت خصيصاً للعرب، لإسترجاع البطولات العربية العريقة. ابني قلعتك، درب الجيوش و كون تحالف مع اصدقائك، لا تنتظر، خذ سلاحك وإنضم إلى هذه الحرب الملحمية الإستراتيجية وحقق المجد والانتصار كسلطان اسطوري ترتعد منه فرائص الاعداء.:: مميزات اللعبة ::• أول لعبة حربية استراتجية ملحمية عربية صممت خصيصاً لعشاق الألعاب في الشرق الاوسط وشبه الجزيرة العربية بتصميم دقيق يعكس الثقافة العربية من تاريخ واعياد وامجاد.• إلعب مجاناً وفي أي وقت وأي مكان.• حرب PVP وكلاش بين اللاعبين.• رسوم وجرافيكس رائعة وموسيقى وأصوات حية مثيرة.• ابنى قلعتك وطورها واجمع الذهب ودافع عنها بأقوى الدفاعات.• درب جنودك الأقوياء من المشاة والفرسان والعربات الحربية ورماة السهام وأرسلهم للحرب و القتال وقتما تشاء .• قم بتقوية أميرك وترقية مستواه ليكون السلطان الأقوى في أنحاء المملكة.• كون تحالف مع أصدقائك وحارب معهم جنباً إلى جنب لتكونوا من اقوى التحالفات.• تواصل ودردش مع اعضاء تحالفك و اللاعبين بالعبة ونسقوا الهجوم والحشد معا ضد الاعداء.• العبها اونلاين مع أكثر من مليون لاعب عربي من مختلف انحاء الوطن العربي والشرق الاوسط.• حرب استراتيجية وكلاش بين التحالفات ستشاهد فيها مناظر الحرب المذهلة لمعارك شرسة عبر العالم.• احشد مع أصدقائك وشن حرب PVP ضد الأعداء واهجم على قلاعهم وأنهب الموارد والذهب واقضي على قواتهم للسيطرة على العالم!Winner of The best game of 2016 award!!Google Play Store Yead-End Deals: Get Speical Offers for Your Kingdom in GameA Hearty Welcome Pack: Enjoy huge discounts and lightning-fast growth! 97.37% offUnbridled Pack: Troop training like you’ve never seen before, watch your power soar! 97.23% offJoin the legends and their epic wars! Now you can fight alongside your friends and enemies to show off your kingdom powers among the other kingdoms in the game!Experience the adventure and prepare for challenge in Revenge of Sultans; The first and best epic real-time Arabic strategy war game made especially for Arabs to reclaim the ancient glory of their ancestors. You, my king, are called by the people to take on the great challenge to become the next king in the hope of bringing peace and prosperity back to this land.:: Feature ::• First and best Arabic Strategy wargame designed especially for Arabs.• Stunning graphics & awesome soundtracks.• Play anytime and anywhere.• Build your castle, upgrade and defend it with turrets, strong walls and Traps.• Battle with other players worldwide, PVP and crush them and snatch their resources.• Build your own army of swordsmen, Archers, Camel Riders, catapults and other mighty fighters and tools.• Join together with other players and friends to form the best alliance and clash and PVP with other alliances.• Fight and have massive PVP against other alliances in the throne war.• Live the medieval wars and re-live the history of the kings.• PVP all the way to victory, to become the best king that ever lived!

comments: This COULD be a great game, but it's a very much unbalanced. Your resources on you area NEVER grow back, so you must travel... I get why that is, but it takes 10-30 minutes, unless of course you want to use energy. You get 100 energy and it takes too much energy to fast travel at the pace that energy is replenished. If you can get around that, and build a few items, tools, weapons, etc. It seems like the game finally gets going but if you die from the 5-10 attackers, you lose ALL of your stuff on you. Everything I've mentioned can of course be fixed by spending a TON of money, but beware, everything has durabilty, and once broken will disappear. So you will always be spending money. CAN'T THERE BE ONE OF THESE GAMES THAT AREN'T MADE OUT OF COMPLETE GREED?
Great game, wish there was something to gain more energy, and a hp, or energy lvl cap off, max hp should go up like 2hp per lvl gained. Idk more stats that the player can tweak for gameplay
I really like it, but such a slow start, after the initial offering of goodies i just stumble along with constant death, no weapon, lose my bag every death. Very frustrating.
New update turns game very very hard and unbalanced. To much equipment cost for too little kill reward
The team solved all my issues. Beautiful game, new twist on an already good concept. Loving it! Can't stop! Addicted!

I still like the formula (except for the energy, I want to play not wait), but... If you're just going to clone Last Day, you could at least include the character customization and female model. We waited forever for that in LDoE to the point where I quit playing it as Generic Dude and never really got to enjoy it as I would've preferred playing my own gender. Trying to call it an RPG when you have zero customization. While I absolutely love that there's no stupid 24hr horde breaking walls like in LDoE, the Night Guest is also annoying, fast and without warning. The game balancing is a little on the tough side, and if you're going to keep it that way, you could at least make the AI stop camping the border where we ran out of a zone. The spawning-in AI that beeline chases you down happens too frequently, and some enemies keep camping the area if you run to the border. Makes it tough when they're hitting you the moment you try to return. Also, AI "players" spawning and 1-2shotting me out of nowhere with a bastard sword? I'd love new content, but game needs balancing.
description: Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!● EXPLORE NEW LANDSExplore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.● LEARN CRAFTINGBuild workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLEBuild a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.● DEFEAT ENEMIESMorning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!● SADDLE YOUR HORSEBuild a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.● OVERCOME HARDSHIPLife in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.● BEFRIEND THE RAVENSBuild a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.● JOIN A CLANA clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHTWhen night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.● RECEIVE REWARDSYou may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.● SOLVE THE MYSTERYSearch for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.
descriptionHTML:
Grim Soul is a free-to-play dark fantasy survival MMORPG. A once-prosperous Imperial province, the Plaguelands are now covered in fear and darkness. Its inhabitants have turned into endlessly wandering souls. Your goal is to survive as long as you can in this dangerous land. Collect resources, build a fortress, defend yourself from enemies, and survive combat with zombie-knights and other monsters in this new Souls-like game!

● EXPLORE NEW LANDS

Explore lands afflicted by the Grey Decay. Discover mysterious Places of Power. Try infiltrating ancient dungeons and other survivors’ castles to obtain the most valuable resources.

● LEARN CRAFTING

Build workbenches and craft new resources. Discover new designs and create realistic medieval weapons and armor to battle with the Plaguelands’ most dangerous inhabitants.

● IMPROVE YOUR CASTLE

Build a sound foundation for defenses against the undead and other survivors. Defend your citadel, construct and place traps for uninvited guests. But don’t forget to explore your enemies’ territory to collect valuable loot.

● DEFEAT ENEMIES

Morning star? Halberd? Maybe an arbalet? Choose from an arsenal of deadly weapons. Deal critical hits and evade enemy attacks. Use different fighting styles. Find an effective strategy for wielding every type of weapon!

● SADDLE YOUR HORSE

Build a stable and don’t miss your chance to gallop into battle against hordes of undead on your war horse or ride through a grim medieval landscape. You can build a boat, a cart, and even a carriage - if you can obtain the necessary parts.

● OVERCOME HARDSHIP

Life in the Plaguelands is solitary, poor, nasty, brutish and short. Hunger and thirst will kill you faster than cold steel in this sinister medieval MMORPG. Conquer nature, hunt dangerous animals, prepare their meat over an open fire, or kill other survivors to replenish your reserves.

● BEFRIEND THE RAVENS

Build a raven cage and these smart birds will be your messengers. Watch the skies. Ravens always circle over something of interest. And that which ravens take interest in will always be of interest for a lonely Exile.

● JOIN A CLAN

A clan will increase your chances of surviving one more day in this cruel and bitter medieval world. Call your brothers in arms to cut down damned knights and bloodthirsty witches.

● PREPARE FOR THE NIGHT

When night descends, darkness floods the world, and you’ll need light to escape the terrifying Night Guest.

● RECEIVE REWARDS

You may feel alone, but you are not. There’s always something to do. Complete quests that bring ravens and receive rewards. Take every chance - that’s the best strategy for survival in the grim reality of this forgotten kingdom.

● SOLVE THE MYSTERY

Search for letters and scrolls to learn about the Empire’s ancient history. Find keys to solving the mystery of your past and the truth behind this unfolding catastrophe.


Life in the Plaguelands is a constant battle not only with hunger and thirst but with hordes of undead and cursed beasts. Conquer nature and fight in this action RPG for real heroes. Become a legend! Storm enemy castles, collect loot, and rule the Plaguelands from an iron throne!

Grim Soul is a free-to-play MMORPG, but it contains in-game items that can be purchased. You must be at least 13 years of age to download this game and begin your adventures in Grim Soul. Your strategy for survival will determine everything. Begin your journey and become a hero in a brutal game for fearless warriors.

descriptionHTML:
Get Ready for the Holidays with Google Play’s Festive Updates!

Endorsed By Gal Gadot! An Epic Fantasy RPG Adventure！

An eternal cycle of conflict has turned the world of Elysium upside down. The endless power struggle has finally toppled the Angels from their place as the aristocracy. But this did not lead to peace. In fact, the strife between the Humans, Elves, and Orcs have intensified even more. All the while, lurking in the shadows, a nefarious power plots its revenge.

When the Prophecy of the Apocalypse spread across the land, it became woven into the fabric of fate. Legend says only "Omega," an ancient relic of the Angels, has the power to alter fate and prevent the end of the world.

Join the epic saga! EMPOWER YOUR HEROES, BATTLE WITH ANGELS! Reclaim the glory of the League of Angels!

[Game Introduction]
The newest mobile game in award-winning League of Angels series is here! League of Angels: Paradise Land is the next epic fantasy RPG that will take you on a harrowing journey through the world of the Angels.

Visually, the game features beautiful 3D graphics, dynamic scenery, and exquisite character design created by senior art director on GTA5. On the gameplay side, a new dual-resource combat system and incorporation of multiple genres like MOBA and Roguelike has created a unique and innovative mobile RPG for the LoA universe.


[Game Features]

Superb Visual Presentation:
- Stunning combat effects
- Dynamic 3D scenery
- Exquisite character art and design

Engaging Strategy:
- Epic Battles: Recruit Heroes and strategically build your team to defeat the forces of evil
- Innovative Dual Resource combat system adds another layer of strategy

Multiple Progression Methods:
- Recruit Heroes, Augment and Ascend their power, learn and upgrade powerful Skills, and build your ultimate team
- Thousands of Hero Equipment to find; Upgrade, Refine, and even Awaken them to unlock their true potential
- Imbue your Heroes with new powers using the mystical Magistones
- Hero Blessing allows all your Heroes add to your strength

Wide Variety of Gameplay:
- Honor Trial: Dungeon-crawling game mode based on the Roguelike genre
- Labyrinth: Explore the darkest depths, find hidden treasures, and confront epic Bosses!
- Arena: Battle players around the world, use strategy to conquer your rivals
- Guilds: Create or join Guilds with hundreds of players, strive towards common goals


Visit the official website to start your saga: https://pl.gtarcade.com/
Follow us on Facebook for a chance to earn special rewards: https://www.facebook.com/LoAParadiseLand/

descriptionHTML:

Your team of almost heroes is a bunch of deeply unique and deeply flawed individuals who have been chosen for greatness. Heroic, noble, enlightened... Just 3 of the many words they can’t spell. Join these zeroes on a quest to become (almost) heroes in an ancient land. Train them to learn battle skills, magical powers and which end of a sword is the business end.

Download one of the most addicting clicker games, Almost a Hero - RPG Clicker Game today and lead your idle heroes to victory before it’s too late!

comments: I love all the Is-it Love stories, they're fun and a great distraction. My only complaint is that there isn't enough free daily energy! You only get a teensy bit of the story every day, which is maddening. There should be loads more ways to earn energy, especially like the mini games.

Matt seems like kind of an asshat in Season 2. She should just dump him. Could do way better. Like with Daryl perhaps? He obviously cares for her wayyy more than Matt does. Matt only has eyes for Lana. Like he says he loves our girl? I don't think so. I wish you could choose somebody else to date.

Energy is too short & there isn't anything other than a side game for 100 more points to keep you entertained. The app is basically a story with a couple of nice artistic pictures.  Way over priced. You can buy a book for less at Barnes and Nobles and still get twice the amount in content. The the amount of money they ask for engery in this game is ridiculous. Don't be silly  and spend money that you can do better with. Just play for free or not at all.

I think it's a good game but... Let's be fair you don't get to play for long each day before you run out of energy and have to wait 24 hours and even then it's only a few minutes play.... The lack of play time makes me loose all interest in what I believe might be a decent game

So. This is an addictive store. The main characters are very well thought out. A few Grammer error and hick ups in game play. Although this game can be expensive if you don't make the right choice. I had bought the same secret scene twice and it still asks me to buy it. This is the second time this has happened. All in all great game.

I find it aggravating that your energy goes down so fast. You get a few seconds of free play per day. I've paid to get more. But I can't and won't keep doing that when even paying for extra doesn't last long. 😒

Carter and based in New York.You immediately get on well with your work colleague, Matt Ortega. A charming and sweet guy, who seems to always find words that make you smile. I choose to devote myself to my job.”Gabriel Simons : ManagerOutgoing, manipulative, insolent, tactile.28 years old, single, “serial lover”.Distinguishing feature : Uses his seduction asset.Star sign : Leo.“ I fought to get where I am. I know how demanding one must be.”Cassidy Sparke : Human Resources managerCold, haughty, social climber.25 years old, single.Distinguishing feature : is very self­confident.Star sign : Capricorn.“I can ruin your career with a single snap of my fingers.”Colin Spencer : programmerCurt, terse, mysterious;25 years old, single, somber.Distinguishing feature : leader of a heavy metal group.Star sign : Pisces.“Hey.”Lisa Parker : secretaryGentle, sociable, competent, loyal.24 years old, single.Distinguishing feature : is always smiling.Star sign : Virgo.“On bad days, I look at my smiley post­it and it helps me smile.”Fantastic illustrations.The further you go in the Otome game, the more beautiful pictures you will unlock which will illustrate your romance!But beware of the choices you make! descriptionHTML:
The second Otome Game (dating game) in our « Is it Love? » series, is now available in English.
Try out this brand new love game with a French Touch!

SYNOPSIS

For three months now, you’ve been working at Carter Corp a company founded by the mysterious R. Carter and based in New York.
You immediately get on well with your work colleague, Matt Ortega. A charming and sweet guy, who seems to always find words that make you smile. You feel extremely attracted to him and have set your mind on seducing him. But the moment you move up a gear, his brother steps in and his arrival may well change things...

This is YOUR story!

You are the heroine of this free scenario game! Beyond simply reading, the choices you make influence the story and its final outcome.
New stories and new chapters are regularly released allowing you to live the love story you’ve always dreamed of.

CASTING

Matt Ortega : graphic designer
Teasing, sensitive, creative, sporty.
25 years old, single, epicurean.
Distinguishing feature : Warm­hearted Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“I know, I’m so bright that I light up your days”.

Daryl Ortega : Undisclosed.
Insolent, daring, passionate.
25 years old, single, audacious.
Distinguishing feature : Latino Bad boy.
Star sign : Scorpio.
“Each and every forbidden pleasure is worth living”.

Ryan Carter : Founder and director of the company.
Magnetic, charismatic, guiding, bright, intimidating.
28 years old, single, multimillionaire.
Distinguishing feature : Control freak.
Star sign : Sagittarius.
“Miss, there is nothing that I can’t have.”

Mark Leviels : Managing director of a company branch.
Intellectual, ambitious, calm, accessible.
28 years old, work addict.
Distinguishing feature : never without his smartphone.
Star sign : Libra
“Choosing means dropping something. I choose to devote myself to my job.”

Gabriel Simons : Manager
Outgoing, manipulative, insolent, tactile.
28 years old, single, “serial lover”.
Distinguishing feature : Uses his seduction asset.
Star sign : Leo.
“ I fought to get where I am. I know how demanding one must be.”

Cassidy Sparke : Human Resources manager
Cold, haughty, social climber.
25 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is very self­confident.
Star sign : Capricorn.
“I can ruin your career with a single snap of my fingers.”

Colin Spencer : programmer
Curt, terse, mysterious;
25 years old, single, somber.
Distinguishing feature : leader of a heavy metal group.
Star sign : Pisces.
“Hey.”

Lisa Parker : secretary
Gentle, sociable, competent, loyal.
24 years old, single.
Distinguishing feature : is always smiling.
Star sign : Virgo.
“On bad days, I look at my smiley post­it and it helps me smile.”

Fantastic illustrations.

The further you go in the Otome game, the more beautiful pictures you will unlock which will illustrate your romance!

But beware of the choices you make! They influence the unravelling of the illustrations and the unlocking of secret scenes! But no worries, you’ll still have the possibility of playing the game or a certain chapter again to unlock the pictures you might have missed!

And much more...

Discover the secret love stories, the new flirt stories and much more.

Follow us on Facebook simply by liking our page: https://www.facebook.com/Is.it.Love.Games.world and stay informed of all our updating news.

Any queries? Any questions? Contact our client support directly in the game’s Menu by clicking on Support or through our website: http://1492studio.freshdesk.com

Free Download

“Is it Love” is a free game. You do however, have the possibility of buying bonus points. You can deactivate your purchase possibilities through your device set-up.

Internet connection required, some additional fees may be applied.

comments: Love playing but have 2 suggestions. We need another mill.  When we have large orders to fill it takes forever to complete those orders because the mull is tied up all the time. Maybe every 40 levels add a mill purchase option. When selling on the market, we need an option for a blind add or a neighborhood only sell or trade.. make these upgrades and so far game would be perfect!

It's great to be able to buy from other farms in theory. But there are WAY too many times that you click on something and it's either sold or not even in the roadside stand at all. The for sale paper needs to update quicker.  Also, it's very hard to accumulate any 'west bucks' in this game and you need them to do almost anything, so the game is a big money suck too. I'm deleting it.

I love these type of games just like hayday. I have noticed it freezes and takes ages to load the newspaper. Also would be helpful if it could tell you who needs help in the newspaper would help filling orders quicker. Also I have noticed alot of people selling the same parts and harder to get others and it's extremely rare to get the land parts without paying

The game doesnt give enough case vs things to buy or fix.  Also have issues with getting product into the alloted spaces.  I thought it was my screen but had it cleaned thoroughly and it still happens.  It takes several attempts!!!  The story is cute.  The graphics are cute as well.  Ive noticed it has a couple of choices from other games Ive played on older phones. I would suggest the game to others but get the issues fixed and itll be a 5star game.

I love playing these games. I'm not sure why we are rating gameplay they offer apps not a game. It's crazy how they ask us to rate game at the beginning of game. We haven't learned the bad points. This game makes us pay for treasure chest instead of giving us to them free like most games. Which means we have to pay for everything. Totally not fair. Takes the fun out of game.

The game itself is fabulous. Cute farm. Good graphics. Good work on that front. Yet being a bit more generous with westbucks in game or making some things more payable with your coins. I get that games don't create themself. But I personally am more likely to pay for games you can actually play for a bit after doing a purchase. And I don't really get that feeling here. But none the less the game itself is a work of art 😊

The Wild West awaits you!

comments: It's ok It has many features, has nice graphics, has a big map, has cool clothes... But there is one problem... If I download the game it will copy the files then extract it so it is still ok... But when it's done the game instantly closes... It doesn't say "Unfortunately, app has stopped" it just... Stops... So please, fix this bug I really wanna play this cool game... Thanks and have a great day!

Been pretty active for two day now... and in the process found some bugs and glitches... playing it for too long can hamper with the system. There were instances encountered when the door wouldn't open and you couldn't jump out the windows, and you can't use any weapons..wish these problems would be fixed soon 'cause so far I'm starting to like this game...cheer y'all

If u ask me I can tell u one thing and that is one of the best fps and online mic game for android if I was u then I would immediately down load it. I love it and if u get it I hope u love it to? Thank u NetEase Games keep it up and. The only problem is it glitches u out a lot so netease please fix it and make it so u can get 50 dimands if u win.

i like this game. but these last patches my screen just got stuck on 00001% even though my system says im downloading. please wth is this.?  EDIT : continue being awesome guys!! the latest update is so cool i can play ultra graphx with my oneplus 3t now.

Hello NetEase, thank you for this wonderful game. I have been playing RoS for a few months now. Lovely game but after the last update, my game freezes at the server screen. After several attempts if at all the server menu loads, the game kicks me out when I try to login my account. I tried repairing the game many times, reinstalled it too many times, but the same problem persists. Hope your team will look into the matter soon. Thank you!

I love the Game. Great Gameplay and Controls.. but maybe the Worst in technical issues. Reinstalled dozen times and Repaired using there repair icon on start menu (because of always server busy). Game always updates especially on patches .. Spent more time on fixing the game to make it work than playing it. And ..l.. for your latest update. Btw. My phone is s8+. And got decent internet connection.

comments: I love this game.  Huge problem with the daily prizes, as clicking twice on the button to speed up the graphics actually closes the offer and no free gift for the day is claimed.  It's a free gift, why would closing it out workout collecting even be an option?

Enjoyable and would have been 5 stars if not for the fact that you can't transfer your items between phones, even with Facebook save game syncing. So if you upgrade your phone, all the items you saved up are going to stay with your old phone. That's pretty maddening.

Great game, but when I change devices, my power ups aren't there! This has happened twice now where I connected to my Facebook and then switched devices only to lose my boosters. This has made me lose over 100 boosters. It is a serious problem. I would not recommend investing in the game if the boosters just delete between devices. I have enjoyed playing it but that is a big problem.
BEWARE!! It's So Addicting! I love this game... Every Once in awhile it will freeze up and close out, but it's very rare that, that happens
The last update is extremely buggy. Freezes and crashes all the time. Early versions were really great, but newer are worse and worse in control response and stability
Chalanging relaxing game. Don't want to stop once I start

comments: Starting my second character. Look to all you perfect people out there who never do anything wrong and have it all figured out. This game isn't perfect but have to say that it's the only one I can think of that I have played for more than a year straight and have now started a second! Even my Wife started playing her own character and that is saying everything if you new her. P.S. Good luck if you are ever unfortunate enough to meet me on the field of battle.

The game itself is good fun, but it's ruined by anything but normal missions can't be completed without buying gold from the Gree store, the most frustrating thing is the constant crashes. I am running a completely up to date, vanilla Pixel2 and a 25mbps network and it will crash almost every time, no amount of updates to the game over the past 3 or more years, or my multiple platforms, has changed this. There is massive lag everytime you conduct an action, or change screens. Please, please make it more quick & stable!

Gree support sucks. They don't typically solve problems, or even provide appropriate responses to questions. Tapjoy doesn't pay out gold offers and isn't held accountable by Gree to stand by their offers. Game has come down hill over the years.

Game was good when was under the hands of Funzio.unfortunately ever since Gree takeover, there had been nothing but glitches, dishonest scrupulous non-ethical in-game strategies to trick players of their progress and money. I wouldn't advise players to continue spending or start playing this game

Very slow, lags, when you tap on anything, attack, raid, change base, deploy units, buy units.  Just takes forever. That's on Android phone, and on iPad 2, takes 5 mins to start, then will just crash, used to work sometimes.  I have been playing for a few years, and it just gets worse.  Otherwise would be good, but if you spend money on gold, it should work.

Gree either just doesn't care about the customers that play this game,  or they have  hired a bunch of bumbling idiots. Always have the same mistakes and problems every time anything is changed, new campaigns, etc. Hard to advance if you don't spend real money, but why spend money on a game with such a crappy team running it?? Don't waste your time unless your goal is aggrivation and frustration.
description: Build a global military empire and destroy your enemies in Modern War by GREE! World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern War, the popular combat game where you face off against enemies for control of country after country, until you rule ‘em all.Taking over the world isn’t for the weak. Build strength in numbers by teaming up with other players and pooling rewards from individual missions. Then, declare war against rival factions during monthly three-day World Domination events for the chance to put your name on the map—literally. Because in Modern War, it’s not enough to want power, you have to take it.Features:• Free-to-play MMORPG military combat game• Form a faction with friends and other players• Fight in monthly LIVE World Domination events• Attack rivals for control of countries and territories• Run a command center and build fortifications• Get elected as a faction “Defense Leader”• See your winning faction’s name on a world mapVisit our Forums: funzio.com/forumFollow us on Twitter: @ModernWarLike us on Facebook: facebook.com/GREEModernWarWatch us on YouTube: youtube.com/GREEgamesNOTES:• This is an ONLINE ONLY game. You must be connected to the Internet to play.• Modern War - World Domination is suitable for fans of strategy, rpg and mmo games.
descriptionHTML:
Build a global military empire and destroy your enemies in Modern War by GREE!

World Domination is now within your grasp! Join a faction and join the fight in Modern War, the popular combat game where you face off against enemies for control of country after country, until you rule ‘em all.

comments: I actually really like this game, graphics are beautiful and the concept is fun... problem is, I've had it a week and been in the game 4x. It doesn't load... like ever. I've restarted my phone, uninstalled and installed and nothing. It just sits on the opening screen, sadly I will have to delete. Wish I didn't have to but it's just wasting space on my phone now. Otherwise, I did enjoy it.

Its completely pay to play. You have to use diamonds to expand your land, but you can't earn them. You have to buy them with real money. It would be a problem if you could buy a small amount for like $0.99... But the minimum is $10 Its ridiculous.

I would love the game,if there was really something to do, no interaction,from what I've read this is a useless app.i got on after the update today,and my screen is blank except for my buildings,the scenery is gone,black! I am on a mobile and can't use any of the great functions everyone talks about. I can't even help my team,totally disappointed,that's for sure. And I've spent quite a bit of money. I am so bored.Theres only a couple things to enjoy on it.Come on ,why can't you get this game together for Android users?

Playing on the phone app. I am disappointed that I cannot play the full version. I cannot send messages to my fellowship members, I cannot see their cities, I cannot participate in the events with my teammates. All I am doing all day every day is trying to build up resources for upgrades, and those are high compared with how much you can make. You cannot earm free diamonds, and many of the buildings you cannot get without them. Will rate higher when these things are improved.

The game is beautiful, but its a bit to complicated. And the in app purchases are rediculus. I'd love it if you could actually advance in the games. There are just too many things needed to advance in the slightest. It's too bad cuz the game it has great graphics.
Game is great. Love building games. Only letdown is that is pay-to-win. It would be better if non-paying players would have little more easy time with game, like give more builders at least... 😉
description: BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENARChoose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.CHOOSE YOUR RACEPlay as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fitSTART INSTANTLYCity building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active communityEXPLORE THE WORLDDiscover new provinces to expand your cityTRADE WITH FRIENDSTrade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplaceADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATIONUpgrade your buildings to supply your growing populationWELCOME NEW CREATURESCreate a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy racesElvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account. Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
descriptionHTML:
BUILD THE CITY OF YOUR DREAMS IN MAGICAL ELVENAR

Choose between elves and humans to build a beautiful, fantasy city. Discover a world of magic and mystery as you constantly build, develop and expand your realm. You decide how to advance your city as you gather resources, trade with other players and research ancient technologies. Whether you want to build a whimsical paradise or a well-organized metropolis, it’s easy to create a home for fantasy creatures and enjoy the detailed beauty of Elvenar.

CHOOSE YOUR RACE
Play as powerful humans or magical elves to build as you see fit

START INSTANTLY
City building is quick and easy with a friendly introduction and active community

EXPLORE THE WORLD
Discover new provinces to expand your city

TRADE WITH FRIENDS
Trade goods and resources with fellow players and merchants in the marketplace

ADVANCE YOUR CIVILIZATION
Upgrade your buildings to supply your growing population

WELCOME NEW CREATURES
Create a home for dwarves, fairies, dragons and other charming fantasy races

Elvenar is based on the successful browser city-builder, published by InnoGames. Now players can enjoy the online fantasy fun on mobile, tablet and PC browser – all from the same account.

Elvenar is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, you can disable in-app purchases in your device’s settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/en/imprint
developerAddress:
InnoGames GmbH
Friesenstraße 13
20097 Hamburg
Germany
recentChanges: Our Easter Event The Phoenix Cult is available! Log in now and get some great new and unique buildings for your city!
With this Event, a new type of building is introduced: the Wishing Well. This building will regularly grant you a random resource, including Diamonds!
You can now use the Enchantments you produced in the Magic Academy!
summary: Create a flourishing fantasy city and discover a magical world full of mysteries
title: Elvenar

comments: Customer service does not reply nor do they address issues. So keep that in mind when in app purchase are charged to your account but items fail to be uploaded to tour device. This app has a long road of updates and improvements before it can be considered to be a game worth playing.
Pack buying glitches, Game glitches,  non responsive customer service.  Too bad they are ripping off some genuinely nice people.  DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME  AT ALL...VenusFlytrap

Bought a 48.99 eve of war pack but never received it.  Customer support does not respond.  This could be a good game but until they fix the pack buying glitches and customer support the game will not survive. And now you can't even log in lol. I won't be recommending this game to anyone now!!

I purchased a Valentine's gold pack (£70.99) on 15/3/18 but received no in game items or gold. I have been leaving messages in game and also through the customer service email but still have not received a response. Could someone please contact me conversation name JOYCEY  Edit: you have responded to other people's reviews please respond to this one, I am 70.99 out of pocket with nothing for it and nearly a week one I've received no support at all - 2nd edit Day 8 and no sign of my purchase and no customer support except a "you'll get your purchase soon sorry for trouble" which I received about 12hrs ago, I'm less than hopeful ..

At first it was great until I bought a $99.99 package but my items were not delivered. I emailed them about the problem and they wouldn't respond. I emailed Google Store and they got them to respond to me. They told me they will look into it and that was 2 days ago. Still no items or refund.
Bought loads of packs last week around 10... 3 of them I never got and therecasking me for all sorts of things which I can't give them... Dam joke
description: Become the Supreme King in Game of Kings: The Blood Throne, the newest FREE real-time strategy, and MMO of 2017! Gather your Resources, Build your Empire, Train your Warriors, Lead your Armies, Destroy your Enemies, Sit on the Throne and Dominate the World on your Phone! Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely FREE to play!***AWESOME CHRISTMAS GIFTS***To celebrate a wonderful 2017 Christmas GOK’s developers decided to prepare many events and FREE gifts for all players. Starting from Thursday 21st until January 2nd GOK players will find a beautiful Christmas environment and a beautiful Christmas tree in the middle of the city, will also have the opportunity to: ✔ Collect FREE gift from December 25th. Tap the Christmas tree to receive your big gift.✔ New monsters to fight in the map with new materials to get. ✔ 2017 Xmas Special Gear. Players will have the opportunity to get new powerful gears, be sure to get yours fast because they will disappear at the end of Christmas event.✔ Cross Kingdom Royal Rumble. Wage war to to other players from all the other servers.✔ Play the Roulette and have a chance to get wonderful items. One free spin a day is on the house.✔ GOK will enlist the best players in a yearly ranking position list and reward them with special badges and trophies.✔ Pictures sharing competition and 3 different kind of rewards. Game of Kings: The Blood Throne features: ✔ Players vs. Players Epic Wars.✔ Explore the world map, seek and attack different Monsters and get precious prizes.✔ Gather 6 different kinds of resources (food, iron, stone, wood, silver and gold) to use to build and upgrade buildings, train armies and research new technologies. ✔ Gather hundred of thousands of soldiers among Swordsman, Archers, Knights and Siege Machines, in 4 increasingly powerful tiers! Attack other players and defend your Empire!✔ Create or join alliances and wage war to other coalitions, win them all and dominate the Kingdom! Make friends with other players, develop together and fight your common enemies like brothers!✔ Forge Epic and Legendary weapons to become immensely powerful!✔ Power up your Hero with 2 different skill trees system. ✔ No language barriers! Talk to anyone freely with our real-time in chat translation of 34 different languages.✔ Frequent events with free gifts and engaging activities. Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely free to play, however some items still can be purchased with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store. For any questions or comments, please contact us via Email: gameofkingsservice@gmail.com

✔ Create or join alliances and wage war to other coalitions, win them all and dominate the Kingdom! Make friends with other players, develop together and fight your common enemies like brothers!
✔ Forge Epic and Legendary weapons to become immensely powerful!
✔ Power up your Hero with 2 different skill trees system.
✔ No language barriers! Talk to anyone freely with our real-time in chat translation of 34 different languages.
✔ Frequent events with free gifts and engaging activities.


Game of Kings: The Blood Throne is completely free to play, however some items still can be purchased with real money. If you don’t want to use this feature, please disable this function in your device or the setting of store.
For any questions or comments, please contact us via Email: gameofkingsservice@gmail.com

This game of strategy is quite refreshing, doesn't fit into the same ole style as a carbon copy...totally customizable, where everyone has a chance at succeeding.  Highly recommended, give it a try, it has been quite refreshing that a game as this is so addicting
Well an average game. But I will appreciate the work of developing team. Too much can be there, need improvement in gameplay. Graphics are good. Units are great. Sound average. Campaign bad.

descriptionHTML:
An immersive combat game in a massive multiplayer online world, War Commander: Rogue Assault delivers a stunning, fully 3D battlefield experience like nothing you've ever seen on mobile. Command your army and launch strategic strikes against your enemy for control of War Zones.

As one of the few surviving commanders after World War 3, defend your base, customize your units, and attack enemies to survive. Become the ultimate warrior in this online military strategy game by battling to gain control of the world.

Rogue Assault is the most realistic military game on mobile to date. With direct control of your tanks, helicopters, and infantry, shoot your way through enemy hordes and become a master of combat.

• Immersive 3D multiplayer military strategy game
• Individual or player-vs-player combat
• Real-time, individual unit control
• Immediate access to riflemen, heavy gunners, and rhino tanks
• Level up for access to powerful units and military might

Website: http://warcommander.com/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RogueAssault/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/rogueassault
Developer: https://www.kixeye.com/

Build an Empire
Build your base and lead your army to victory. Discover new defense systems, research state of the art weapons, and destroy any enemies that stand in your way.

Fight in Strategic Battles
Blend foot soldiers, light vehicles, tanks, and aircraft to coordinate devastating strikes. Attacking the enemy never felt as good as in this realistic military game.

Defend your Fortress
Customize your defenses to repel enemies and control the world’s last resources. Alternatively, play offense and use your army to turn around, attack, and take what’s yours.

• Infantry: Standard warriors required in any battle. Exceptionally well-rounded and diverse, they are great for attack or defense.
• Aircraft: Perfect for launching surprise strikes against an enemy base. The right aircraft can provide a strategic advantage over grounded units who can’t shoot from so far below.
• Vehicles: The backbone of your force. With huge damage output and defensive capabilities, these units are a must have for any invasion

No Build Times
Don’t have time to assemble an army the old fashioned way? Don’t worry. With no build times, you’ll be ready to get into the action in no time.

Join an Alliance
Forge strategic alliances with other soldiers and form battle tactics in the group chat, or seek advice from a pool of commanders in the live world chat. Those who join an alliance are better set up to thrive in this war-torn world.

Monthly in-game Events
Show off your military prowess in monthly events. Fight strategic worldwide battles to top the world leaderboards.
developerAddress:
KIXEYE, Inc.
268 Bush St., STE 2008
San Francisco, CA 94104
recentChanges: - New base upgrades have been added for CC10. Take your gameplay to the next level by building these upgrades that improve your offensive and defensive power.

- Added directional arrows to the War Zones highlighting the attacker and defender in PvP combat. This will help make War Zones activity more clear, and let players identify who they are being attacked by even faster.
summary: War Commander: Rogue Assault is a fully 3D, real-time combat strategy game.
title: War Commander: Rogue Assault

comments: I liked the game so much. No! I love it, but it's just that I'm now on level 65 but I'm stucked since I only have few gems left and I needed to extend the time, and buy some customers which I find amazing just to save your energy and the stage but I also find it hard since I have already completed 3 stars from lower levels and why is it that I can't play the levels I have already completed? I would really suggest that lower levels would still be played just to be able to collect gems. I hope you can fix this issue though. I'm so loving this game and I'm getting addicted to it. I got stucked on level 65 on my two days of playing. Thank you

Moving on is hard on some levels because they are specifically designed for you to use gems and they are hard to come by. However, If you are patient enough you can eventually earn them. I enjoy that you don't have to drag the items to the customers. It's definitely an enjoyable and challenging game. I'm currently at a "coming soon" stage where I can no longer move ahead. I've been waiting a long time and do not want to wait forever. Please do an update soon!!!

I love this game! So few games actually suck me in, but this game had me addicted right away. I play on my phone and laptop. Yes I have two different games at different levels lol. I love how upgrades are so easy and it isn't impossible to upgrade or move on. It gets challenging as you go up levels but it's so fun.

Great game but some levels really hard I cant pasd this one level im on for days maybe update make it easier pass level I'm on I just did update...I hope so... love game anyways great game to.. identical cooking joy to map was a great game to but also hard get passed certain levels that game to n I can try play fast with my hands to still cant pass to not playing  cooking joy anymore going stick with this one see if game gets easier to

It's fun till you run out of energy. They get you too rate the game right away while you are having fun with free lives. Give you enough lives to rate it good then the lives end and you have to watch a min advert or 30 mins for one life Regen. OR PAY. They just want your money at that point. So sad.

Brilliant little time waster of a game.. yet.. once you start getting to the higher levels.. the less chance of earning gems and i aint noway paying for them.. last time I stupidly paid for gems on cooking fever..and got my account hacked into! Big lesson learnt! I do still play this alot tho so overall, definitely a good game. 👍
description: PREPARE 🔪, COOK 🕑and SERVE 🍕 delicious meals from all over the world 🌎 in Cooking Madness!  Become the master chef 👨‍🍳 you have always wanted to be! This year it’s this highly addictive time management game that’ll bring you the best digital cooking experience!  Get yourself in a real cooking craze. Cook like you’re a MAD CHEF in Cooking Madness! Did the cooking fever caught on and you can’t get enough of 🍨 cooking games? Then this is THE cooking game for you! You’ll be serving delicious dishes 🍩 to hungry customers in amazing restaurants in a ⏩ FAST pace. No challenge that can’t be beaten by you. Dash from restaurant to restaurant on this magical map. You will discover and unlock many places as you progress on your journey. 🌄 Get the restaurants back to business and attract more and more customers. Let the Cooking Madness begin! comments: This game is a great way to pass the time but the controls leave something to be desired. Frequently you will click on the wrong thing whether it be a building, tourist, or pop up. Its also far too easy to accidentally spend resources you didn't mean to or without the intended outcome.

Halfway in the game my sicial capabilities have been blocked due to suspicion of cheating. I dont even know how one can cheat on this game. I love the game but will not recommend it due to the fact that you get suspended for no reason at all and support does not provide feedback

I liked the 1st one. This 1 has some bugs to fix. Not getting the credit for viewing the ads and not able to complete tasks because the people aren't showing up. Some tasks, I have done 10 times and for some reason, the task won't complete either. Gets frustrating.
Couple of minor glitches. Couple buttons r hard to get to respond. Only just started and not so aggrevated i have deleted yet..... Like the game n graphics and story.

Stupid game!! Had finally over 400 crystals and some stupid thing popped up and when tried to close it, instead it pressed button next to it and used up almost all crystals!! So stupid that there is so much things on the screen you dont have space to click what you need!! Biggest waste of time i ever had in my life!!

This is a fantastic game very time-consuming and relaxing great graphics not only myself but my grandkids enjoy the game thank you for making it thank you for making the game just wish it didn't have energy so you can keep playing for however long you want to

descriptionHTML:
The sequel to the legendary game that captured the hearts and minds of over 100 million players is here!

Warning: Paradise Island 2 is highly addictive even if you’ve never played this kind of game before.

"Paradise Island 2" is a game for everyone who loves the sun, the sea, and the sand!

Tear yourself away from work and build your own resort on a sunny island and become the ultimate hotel mogul!

Don’t you think it’s time to start your own business? Wealthy tourists are already flocking to your sunny shores! Entertain them in casinos and entertainment centers, build hotels, restaurants and stores, and provide plenty of amusements! Build your own empire of entertainment! Turn your island into the best resort empire and learn to manage your own business.


Key features:

✔ Build over 300 buildings drawn in a unique style.

✔ Improve and develop your island, invite and entertain guests, and earn huge profits!

✔ Help and feed animals in danger, build your city in tune with nature.

✔ Save an adorable leopard cub and get a loyal pet in return.

✔ Assemble a collection of unique animals and natural phenomena.

✔ Find all the hidden ancient treasures.

✔ Play fascinating mini-games (arcades, platformers, puzzles, pairs, PvP, PvE and more) with daily rankings of the best players and their achievements.

✔ Complete ambitious projects: find and rebuild ancient pyramids, abandoned farms, and world wonders!

✔ Take part in competitions against friends and other city managers for the best places in the game rankings.

✔ Win in fun PvP fights called Beach Battles.

✔ Play in offline mode. Enjoy it on a plane, on the subway, or on the road!

✔ Play with your friends: visit friends’ islands to find hidden objects and receive gifts!

✔ Unique events with special game mechanics and lots of amazing quests.


Build your own tourist city with luxury hotels, receive guests and complete exciting tasks. Paradise is within reach! Take the reins of power and show the world that you can be a successful magnate!

The long-awaited sequel to one of the best economic city-builder simulation games!


"Paradise Island 2" Facebook community: https://www.facebook.com/ParadiseIsland2/

comments: I thoroughly enjoy this game.. graphics are smooth and bright, gameplay is fantastic.. a highly recommended mobile game.. perfect mix Action/RPG.. Great XP Farming Levels.  This game can be very difficult, I suggest you do not just auto-battle everything.. Take some time to learn your characters and all the glyph combinations.. Its almost endless. You will enjoy this one much more!
So far it is very addicting. My number one issue is that it constantly "goes out of sync with the servers". Also, maybe I'm just early in the game but coins should be easier to obtain than they are

Evolution is retarded, seriously. Having to sacrifice 2 other creatures of the same level to evolve makes the game insanely difficult for noobs to get anywhere fast. Come on devs, that's just bald faced greed, try a little more finesse if you ever want to see me invest in this game.
Great disappointment, when I heard that this game would come I expected something epic like heroes of might and magic V. Not this generic game that looks like all other games in the play store.
New to the game but so far so good. Some of the rules are a little vague but YouTube is filing in the gaps. Lots of variety. Well put together.
Summoners war clone with all the same problems...get lucky summons or lose...spend 10 minutes and all your crystals upgrading a rune 1 lvl...the game is all luck no skill

descriptionHTML:
Enter the world of Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians - a fast-paced strategy RPG based on the medieval fantasy realm of Might & Magic.
Journey through enchanted lands, collecting fierce and fantastic elemental creatures, and evolve a team of mighty warriors to summon to battle on the path to victory.

ENROLL IN THE ACADEMY OF MAGIC
• Create, customize and level up your own hero
• Choose a House of Magic: Materia, Chimera or Anima
• Use the mystic powers of your House to triumph in the arena

SUMMON A LEGENDARY TEAM
• Discover and collect hundreds of fantastic beasts and iconic creatures
• Watch their evolution from cute companions to legendary war allies
• Equip your team with arcane Glyphs to enhance their abilities

TRAIN & BATTLE
• Level up your creatures to unlock their true might
• Compete in the PvP Arena to rise up the league leaderboards
• Participate in Live Events to win epic prizes and rare items

LEAD YOUR TEAM TO VICTORY
• Face fierce opponents in fast and strategic RPG battles
• Use the elements of Fire, Water, Air and Earth tactically to gain the advantage
• Cast epic spells and use magical abilities of different elements

BECOME A HERO OF LEGENDS
• Journey through the fabled fantasy realms of Might & Magic
• Complete diverse daily quests and earn special rewards
• Enjoy beautiful graphics and unique creature designs

Compatible with Android 4.3 and above.

This app contains In-App Purchases which allow you to buy in-game currency. In-game currency can also be collected by playing the game without requiring any purchase.

comments: The recent update changed the way you deal with Chef Panda and make and receive items. I was making something before the update, when I played the next time Chef reminded me my item was finished. I clicked on him an was taken to a totally different layout. I have clicked on everything and nothing happens. How do I collect?
Need to turn off hints. Comes up straight after I have my go. Very annoying. I do want to play without hints or delay the timing.
The updates are better, still addictive! Good, fun game, can be annoying at times. Improvements and more rewarding would be to earn coins after a level or when you move on to the next island.
Better than Candy Crush and other Match 3 games!!! One of the few I have stuck with. Awesome graphics and not overly difficult to pass levels!! Great job Dev!
I only wish we could get coin rewards every time we either complete a stage or replay it successfully so we could farm our coin amounts faster. Can you allow us to have such feature, please?
Please bring back the 2× animation speed!!! It's so much slower now and makes me boring. We need 2x animation speed!!
description: Cookie Jam Blast is a delicious new match-3 puzzle game filled with hundreds of yummy dessert themed levels and candy-like treats that are sure to satisfy your craving for fun!  Hop in your airship and embark on a new bakery adventure with Chef Panda and friends.  Swap, match, and crush scrumptious candy-colored pieces to create mouth-watering combinations and play challenging new game modes filled with all new characters and your favorite sweets, like waffles cones, candy, cupcakes, chocolate, ice cream, and of course... COOKIES!  Level up your Chef Panda and craft delicious recipes!  Complete puzzles levels to earn stars, unlock ingredients to craft some tasty treats, like chocolate chip cookies, cake pops, ice cream sandwiches, apple pie, and more!COOKIE JAM BLAST FEATURES:● Crush your highest score with hundreds of fun and challenging puzzles ● Match 4 candy-colored pieces to create a Jelly Bee!  Use it to help shake up your board● Reveal the Yumsicle popsicles! Swap cookies and candy to uncover hidden treats ● Collect energy to move the Cupcake towards the truck● Break the Waffles before you’re out of moves● Catch all the Topplers before they move to win ● Jam through levels and earn stars to unlock ingredients to bake recipes● Connect to Facebook to sync your progress, send/receive lives & Helper Bees from friends● Spin the prize wheel daily to earn rewards like boosters and ● Earn rewards along the way and collect limited edition airships in special events!  You’ll want to check back often to see what’s in store!Got a sweet tooth? Download Cookie Jam Blast today and satisfy your cravings! DEVELOPER INFO: Jam City is the leading developer in truly cross-platform social gaming! Check out our other free match 3 puzzle games! You'll love to crunch through ever expanding levels and events. Jam through each sweet puzzle game & check back often to see what we've added! Begin your bakery adventure on this free match three puzzle game today!
descriptionHTML:
Cookie Jam Blast is a delicious new match-3 puzzle game filled with hundreds of yummy dessert themed levels and candy-like treats that are sure to satisfy your craving for fun!

Hop in your airship and embark on a new bakery adventure with Chef Panda and friends. Swap, match, and crush scrumptious candy-colored pieces to create mouth-watering combinations and play challenging new game modes filled with all new characters and your favorite sweets, like waffles cones, candy, cupcakes, chocolate, ice cream, and of course... COOKIES!

Level up your Chef Panda and craft delicious recipes! Complete puzzles levels to earn stars, unlock ingredients to craft some tasty treats, like chocolate chip cookies, cake pops, ice cream sandwiches, apple pie, and more!

COOKIE JAM BLAST FEATURES:
● Crush your highest score with hundreds of fun and challenging puzzles
● Match 4 candy-colored pieces to create a Jelly Bee! Use it to help shake up your board
● Reveal the Yumsicle popsicles! Swap cookies and candy to uncover hidden treats
● Collect energy to move the Cupcake towards the truck

comments: I can't get in the game its get stuck on the loading screen 3/25 Loading it shows and stays there it doesn't load past 3. I have tried uninstaling and reinstalling it does nothing so I don't know if it's a problem on my end or yours.

This last update has broken a major part of the game. Spirit Rest runs rely on speed and now it seems after 10-15 minutes (of inactivity, in an idle game) the game becomes unresponsive until you force close and restart, potentially losing what progress you had made. I know this is an implementation to stop bots but it has only made the game more cumbersome than ever before for living players. Please reverse this Ekkorr! Surely you can find some other way to combat bots without placing such a heavy burden on the rest of us.

I found out the solution just uninstall the game and then install it again dont pick any google acc just skip it and then it will work again sorry for bad english

descriptionHTML:
Legendary heroes join an endless idle RPG battle that began over a thousand years ago! Fight legendary monsters, enter online PvP role playing battles and end the reign of the Dark Prince in Endless Frontier!

Travel across endless stages of fantasy RPG action with online PvP games, offline RPG guild wars and plenty of treasures to unlock! Upgrade your character with limitless fantasy RPG power ups and take control of legendary heroes in the Endless Frontier!

After failing to defeat the dreadful Prince of Darkness, Erin vows to revive himself again and again to organize the Knightgage of Dimension! Join the automatic fantasy RPG action!

Endless Frontier Features:

1. Idle RPG Fantasy Games
★ Idle RPG gameplay in an exciting fantasy adventure!
★ Lead your knights into the heat of battle and defeat the dreaded Prince of Darkness in epic autoquests!

2. Legendary Heroes
★ Heroes number over 150 and have their own powers – Which ones will you command?
★ Monster trainer – Recruit more than 50 pets to aid you in your quest!
★ Command more than 100 kinds of army units, to become legends of war!

3. Endless Inflation RPG
★ Grow stronger each time you revive with progressive gameplay!
★ Endless levels for endless fun! There’s no limit to the amount of power you can obtain!
★ Level up and tap your way through an expansive frontier of over 9000 stages!

4. Online PvP Guild Wars and Dungeon Games
★ Online multiplayer awaits with endless PvP battles and 200 vs. 200 guild wars that offer endless fun
★ Dungeon boss battles award you with 20 kinds of unique treasures and rare gifts

5. Find Gifts and Treasures
★ Discover more than 200 relics to aid you in your autoquest
★ Get treasure chests in each stage for even more great rewards!
★Obtain gold automatically the longer you stay in the frontier, the more chances you’ll have to tap and find more treasures


Traverse the frontier, take on your friends and see why Endless Frontier is one of the best idle RPG games on the market, today!


■ Rights Information
We request the following permissions for smooth gameplay.

[ Modify or delete the contents of your SD card (READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE, WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE) ]
Use an external storage such as SD cards to save and load game data.

[ Find accounts on the device (GET_ACCOUNTS) ]
This right is need for the linkage and notification between your game account and google account information.

[ Read cell phone's status and ID (READ_PHONE_STATE) ]
Inquire the device information for the advertising services provided within the customer interaction and game. (Manufacturer, model, OS version, etc.)

[ The approximate location (network-based) (ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION) ]
Use the network/wifi information to provide the advertisement in one of the advertising services because items can be obtained free of charge after seeing it.

comments: Sometimes it's fun and most of the time will really piss you off. Like as soon as you log in someone has already got 20 kills. Or you get matched up with people that are at a much higher level. It can be very frustrating,  my guess is that there trying to get you to spend lots of money.

I think this game is awesom.. sometimes I get in a shootout and I'm taken out before I can get a shot, that just makes me want to shoot better.. but most the time I'm battling it out till the till the time play stops, then I get to view everyone's score on both teams and see what rank did what.. Not only is this game  challenging and exciting,  but NO ADS.  5 stars from me
Sometimes opponents do not die even after hitting 10-12 headshots.. quiet unfair check on that.. I would give you 5 stars
Everytime I'm on this game I can't put down the phone. I have to charge my phone or I get disconnected by the Wi-Fi Z

Great way to kill time. Not loaded with ads. Easy to earn upgrades. Really fun game. Was fun then came all the useless changes. Points. Cups. Penalties. It is a punishment to build a squad from the ground up these days

description: Sniper! Enter the arena and become the #1 SHARPSHOOTER in this thrilling ‘sniper vs. sniper’ LIVE COMBAT game! Compete against more than 500K SNIPERS worldwide, climb the leaderboard, and ENJOY EVERY BATTLE in this premier mobile experience! Feel the pure adrenaline rush, and lifelike combat emotions in the heat of the battlefield, right in your hands on your mobile screen. Jump into the action and join the battle right away, it’s FREE TO PLAY!• Enjoy breathtaking 3D GRAPHICS: the world’s best SNIPER RIFLES, superbly realistic and authentic in every little detail, and 4 spectacular combat locations with authentic sniper firing positions, beautifully designed in terms of game logic and the balance.• Try intuitively easy controls - SWIPE, ZOOM, SHOOT! Compete in 3 game modes: Deathmatch, Team Deathmatch, and Domination with up to 8 real opponents on the map, whoever shoots the most enemies wins the round.• Develop your SNIPER CAREER, from recruit all the way to the rank of Phantom, with a variety of daily tasks and a detailed ranking system. Unlock and upgrade modern PROFESSIONAL EQUIPMENT: sniper rifles, ammunition, camouflage and special equipment.• Ally with your friends and create an UNSTOPPABLE SQUAD! Lead them to the top of the leaderboard, defeat other teams and win territories in Domination mode.This game requires stable INTERNET CONNECTION to play. The gameplay involves real-time online match ups with players across the globe, shared server for any mobile device, and LIVE-CHAT.For more info and all the latest news check out: https://www.facebook.com/SniperArenaGame/

comments: It's a good story and all. But I only wish they would let me save up energy or at least give me a little more. It gets frustrating when I can't Carry on, I'm not a patient person. Graphics are good. Controls are good. Story is great! Loving most of this game so far. I just hope they change the energy part of it. Though I guess it's a lot easier to read thn most episode stories.

I love the story Line just like I've been reading in the comments the energy sucks I know it's just to keep us from reading the story so fast an to blow our money on, but if there was another way instead of us waiting for so long for just a little energy it's defently keeping me from downloading another game like this.. it takes so long to receive the 300 energy I done forgot an really not into the story Like I was when I 1st downloaded it.

The story and art art great, like in the other game, and I love the music too.  I have 2 major complaints though: 1. It's not indicated anywhere in the appstore that this is a work in progress (there's currently 4 chapters in English). This particularly bothers me since I bought energy so I could get immersed in the story, only to be torn out of that immersion by an incomplete story. 2. The energy system. I mentioned this in my review for the Drogo one as well, and plenty of people pointed it out here so I won't go into detail.

I think all of these Is it love stories are absolutely amazing. The writing has given me inspiration to read more romance novels. But I don't like the energy system. I foolishly paid a lot of money to read/play longer and I'm glad the author and developers get the money for a product I thoroughly enjoy. I just wish the daily energy was 1000 or something

Amazing story... When will there be more chapters?! I also don't like how I have to buy energy in order to not just have five minutes (maybe) of reading the story and making decisions. Please come out with more chapters soon!

Loving the story so far and the graphics.. It's all so beautiful. Only wish that they would give you more energy over time to read it.. when you lose time to read you lose interest in the story by the waiting. Help us stay interested!
description: Is it Love? Peter - Vampire is an interactive game (choice game). A game with vampires, Witches, and werewolves.Like in TV sitcoms, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released. You can download this interactive love game (choice game) for free.In each episode, you'll have a lot of choices to take in order to make it YOUR story, YOUR romance!Story:"Having had supernatural faculties since your childhood, you decided to leave everything to go get some answers at the strange Mystery Spell University. You found a job and accommodation at the Bartholy Manor. In exchange for your services, taking care of the younger sister, Lorie, you live with them. The city's inhabitants fear them terribly, the evil shadow of their father weighs in all consciences ... Many mysteries surround the Bartholy brothers and you will quickly discover that the whole city has things to hide. Many people at Mystery Spell have strange secrets ...However, only one inhabitant is always on your mind and arouses your curiosity, and that is Peter, the most mysterious and most melancholic of the Bartholy brothers. Will you manage to tame him without putting yourself in danger? comments: Extremely addictive! First day I played I overshot my bus stop by 5 minutes because I forgot to look up.  There is always something to do in the game somewhere - and the micro transaction bit doesn't feel forced, and you can easily progress without it.  It kept me occupied for days - unfortunately I had to delete it because I got too caught up.  So if you're looking for a game to grab your attention and keep you entertained on long commutes and the like, this is great for that

Fun little game, but I would love for food, and water, to be a little bit faster. Also maybe rise up the rush chances. I do have 1 suggestion, maybe when the people off to the Waste Lands, they can find some rare stuff, like gems or maybe clothes/weapons. This game is really fun, even though I've just started it, keep up the great work! 👍🏽

I figured my old ass phone wouldnt run this game when first announced, just confirming for folks it sure doesnt. I thought there might be a chance it would cos my phone is rooted and I have full control over how my ram is utilized. Thank bob for android emulators on desktop, can't wait to play :)

Look, I can kind of understand dwellers not dropping their assignments to fight raiders, but can we have the ability to assign fighters to the raiders themselves. It's a massive and unnecessary pain to constantly remind my few armed dwellers to actually fight the raiders instead of just looking cute in the room they just left. Weapons are scarce in this game, and raiders move too often to play pass the gun. It would also be nice if there was a pause feature, but that would reduce the butler-bot purchases.

Fantastic! A resource management sim that is incredibly fresh and charming thanks to the richness of the Fallout franchise. Keeps you coming back for hours. From the quirkiness of the dwellers to the depth of the side quest system, this game is deserving of your time. Finally, the game is totally playable without paying. Still, throw the devs a few bucks! You'll sink hours into this title.

Absolutely love this game. If you're a die hard fallout fan, or even someone new to the series this is the perfect game for you. You'll get a sense of nostalgia pulling your first legendary dweller, or a sigh of relief when you obtain that last part for the weapon you've been looking to craft. Fallout Shelter is the perfect mobile game for any fan of the series. The game is slow and hard in the beginning but when you get on your feet you'll never want to put it down. If you're on the edge about downloading it please do, it's worth all the time and space!
description: ** Google Play Best of 2015  **Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE AwardsWinner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game"Might just be the best free-to-play game out there" - GamesBeat"Probably the best game of E3 2015” – Gizmodo "Fallout Shelter is simple to play and addictive as hell." - GameZoneBUILD THE PERFECT VAULTCreate a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.OVERSEE A THRIVING COMMUNITY Get to know your Dwellers and lead them to happiness. Find their ideal jobs and watch them flourish. Provide them with outfits, weapons, and training to improve their abilities.CUSTOMIZETurn worthless junk into useful items with Crafting! Customize the look of any dweller in the Barbershop.PROSPERA well-run Vault requires a variety of Dwellers with a mix of skills. Build a Radio Room to attract new Dwellers. Or, take an active role in their personal lives; play matchmaker and watch the sparks fly! EXPLORE THE WASTELAND Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!PROTECT YOUR VAULTFrom time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.
descriptionHTML:

Mobile Game of the Year - 2016 DICE Awards
Winner 2015 Golden Joystick Best Handheld/Mobile Game

BUILD THE PERFECT VAULT
Create a brighter future…underground! Select from a variety of modern-day rooms to turn an excavation beneath 2,000 feet of bedrock into the very picture of Vault Life.

EXPLORE THE WASTELAND
Send Dwellers above ground to explore the blasted surface left behind and seek adventure, handy survival loot, or unspeakable death. Find new armor and weapons, gain experience, and earn Caps. But don’t let them die!

PROTECT YOUR VAULT
From time to time, idyllic Vault life may be disrupted by the dangers of post-nuclear life. Prepare your Dwellers to protect against threats from the outside…and within.

Vault-Tec has provided the tools, but the rest is up to you. What are you waiting for? Get started building your Vault today for FREE.

This is why I am changing the rating I previously gave of 5 stars to 3.  Also, you should really have more of the Glenda versus the Wicked Witch challenges.

Great game but I really wish that daily rewards are better. It used to be you would get a crystal ball often, money and other things that to help with game, but lately it has been stuoid little rewards like two coins or one row clear. What happened to good rewards for players that come on every day and expect to get a little help in the game play

I love this game except for ONE big aggravation.   When you win extended life you don't get to choose when to use it.  It starts immediately and sometimes you've been playing to complete a sprint or another section and you CANT play another two hours.   That means you lose that extra time.   Today I've lost a 3 hour extra play and now I'm about to lose another 2 hour play.   Very Annoying!

comments: The good:  Better than WB1 where the same words kept showing up throughout even at difficult levels.  It's also nice that it shows your previous progress in a puzzle after you're forced to clear/restart it.  And although you'll still see lots of words that aren't part of the answer, the puzzles are themed so you can ignore those non-answers.  The bad:  The ads are very loud and you can't always silence them before they play.  It does not remember your sound choice so don't even think about playing this in the library.  Also, the game now has a ridiculous background that obfuscates the answer boxes making the game almost unplayable.  Finally, there are way too many boringly easy puzzles that you have to go through before you get to see the fun ones.  I almost uninstalled before getting there.

Between the gears, springs, cash, gold bars, weapon tokens and car tokens all with three tiers to keep track off it's very confusing.  Heaven help if you've done all the things and are stuck with no way to earn anything.  Could be better by simplifying the buying and upgrading, but now it's just taking up space on my phone.
