descriptionHTML:
Guns, cars and zombies! Who wants more?

Smash through zombies in this action-packed post-apocalyptic racing game. Pimp your ride, mount your gun and drive through various dangerous locations full of deadly enemies. Do you have the skills to survive the attack of zombie hordes on the road?

Guns, Cars, Zombies! is the most epic post-apocalyptic racing game where you have to battle zombies for survival.


▶ CUSTOMIZABLE CARS ◀
Choose your style and build your unique zombie survival car!
Muscle cars, hot-rods, sport cars, pickups and other crazy vehicles to choose from.
Every car is fully customizable with dozens of unique parts.

▶ DEADLY WEAPONS ◀
Mount various weapons to the car to be more deadly.
Shoot zombies to survive.

▶ PLAY THE STORY ◀
Play through four campaigns and complete more than a hundred levels.
Each campaign has its own location to drive through, special enemies to kill and unique missions to complete.

▶ FIRE AT WILL ◀
Get out of the driver’s seat, hop in behind the turret and shoot down all of the zombies!

▶ SCAVENGE ◀
Visit abandoned places to find loot

▶ CHALLENGES ◀
Can you survive a road full of zombies and obstacles?
Challenge your driving skills on dozens of special levels.

▶ ONLINE TOURNAMENTS ◀
Compete against other real players and win big prizes in daily tournaments!
Climb up the leaderboard, get promoted to higher league and show the world that you are the best survivor of the apocalypse.


▶ HOW TO PLAY ◀
Hit zombies and avoid obstacles on the road
Shoot zombies for bonuses
Build a zombie-proof car to be unstoppable
Collect resources to purchase, upgrade and customize your vehicles and arsenal

▶ HINTS ◀
PLAY every day for valuable free rewards
Complete QUESTS to get resources
FORGE resources to craft powerful items
Visit the BOUNTY HUNTER for rewards
Buy LOOT BOXES to get tons of resources
KIll a lot of zombies to activate THE BEAST inside you


Make sure you play with your device connected to the internet to gain access to the latest content and features, and link the game to your Facebook account to ensure that your profile is backed up.

PLEASE NOTE, this game is free to play and everything can be unlocked for free with a reasonable amount of effort but it offers items and packages which can be bought using real money. You can toggle these purchases on/off in the ""Restrictions"" menu on your device.

★★★★★ Please rate it to support cool new updates and write an honest feedback to make the game even better!

The game was fun for a little while, but it becomes quite monotonous. The game isn't interactive enough to keep you coming back for more. You more or less just watch your heroes battle which takes a lot of possible fun out of the game right away. If you spend any cash at all on the game, you unlock the ability to "raid" your already completed missions. So then when you need items, you will just mash the raid button until your energy is gone. And the energy recharges VERY slowly. You can play for free, but will progress substantially slower than the pay-to-play player. So overall, it's fun for a short while (a week or two), but you will quickly grow tired of it due to poor interactivity. If you are looking for a game similar to this that will keep your interest and has much more to offer, I would recommend Summoners War.

Game apparently 'malfunctioned' and the heroic chest kept saying open free.  This was after I spent $25 US dollars so of course I thought why wouldn't I get some free opens?  I didn't know they were charging me 200 emeralds a pop.  Customer service was NO help.  Hopefully I can get a refund from Google Play.  Don't download!  Bad programming, scam in game purchases!
While the game seems nice enough, it is nothing like the advertisement I watched. Complete misrepresentation gets one star.

descriptionHTML:
League of War: Mercenaries is an exciting war strategy game where you can make choices that have real impact and outcomes. Immerse yourself in this 3D war game to build your base, grow your army, and battle your way to victory.

3D battlefield mixed with a unique tug of war deck-based combat system, giving you an exciting tactical war strategy game that will keep you playing for days! Build a fighting force of extraordinary magnitude to wage war on corporations and nations. Take on hundreds of missions or compete with fellow Mercenaries to claim victory around the globe and enjoy the spoils of war!

In League of War: Mercenaries, players act as mercenaries, taking on military contractors that play out on the battlefield to claim victory around the globe. Upgrade your army with futuristic tech, battle your enemies, and come out on top in this tactical war.

= LEAGUE OF WAR: MERCENARIES FEATURES =

3D GAME - EXPERIENCE A LUSH 3D BATTLEFIELD
★ Battle your way through stunning 3D content, from your military headquarters to intensely fast-paced combat!
★ 3D war visuals with stunning, visceral combat that plays out in real time

WAR STRATEGY - YOUR CHOICES HAVE AN IMPACT
★ Build and strengthen your army with tanks, helicopters, infantries and more.
★ Strategize the units you use to ensure your victory on the battlefield
★ Advanced warfare tech will help you dominate your enemies and rule the planet
★ Strategy and tactics will make your army the strongest

REAL TIME STRATEGY COMBAT – UPDATE TACTICS IN REAL TIME
★ Tactical wars have enveloped the world. Battle for control in intense RTS combat!
★ RTS games challenge you to strategically configure and prepare your squad in a variety ways to counter sophisticated enemy units
★ Real time strategy combat challenges you to always stay one step ahead of your enemy

BASE BUILDING - EXPAND & UPGRADE MILITARY HEADQUARTERS
★ Build and upgrade the ultimate military HQ with sophisticated base building tools
★ Defend your base by leveling up your military fortress
★ Building games lovers will really enjoy this fast paced, action packed RTS

AMRY UPGRADES – BUILD A BETTER MILITARY
★ Armies are upgradeable so you can always utilize new tactics
★ Tanks, aircraft and more are at your disposal as you clash with enemies

UPGRADE MERCENARIES - CUSTOMIZE MILITARY UNITS
★ Upgrade & equip units with a vast array of technology for specific roles to defeat your enemy!
★ Build your army, from tanks to infantry, and put a personal stamp on your mercenaries
★ Mercenaries grow stronger as you gain new tech and tactics

ALLIANCE BUILDING - FORGE STRATEGIC ALLIANCES
★ Alliances let you bring your military might down on enemies
★ Online multiplayer - Create an Alliance and band together against enemy for powerful rewards!
★ Play with friends! Join your friends for deeper engagements and battle together

MULTIPLAYER MODE - TEST YOUR STRATEGY IN 2 PLAYER BATTLES
★ Defend your base and battle to be the best!

comments: Red crystal lvls should be targetable by one click...now you must scroll the whole map. Crates/actives should be tradable 2useless for 1 you want...late game you end up with tons of useless ones and 0 of those you use. Magnet should be an upgrade(like boss dmg and shield mitigation)...chasing bloops late game is a nuinsance.

This game was awesome until i loaded it up and noticed that ALL MY PROGRESS WAS GONE!!! I ALMOST HAD AN EPIC DART THROWER!!!!!!! When i tried to get my progress back using Facebook/Google Play. It was gone too. Please fix.

The game is surprising addicting and offers plenty of content! The progression is decent so far and I really liked the idea of the endeless game modes with leaderboards that reward you! My only gripes about it so far are:  - doesn't support 18:9 aspect ratio - the rewards for the endless game modes could use a boost imo - Only offers one control scheme (there's a game called skyforce: reloaded that offers a manual control setting, essentially the player doesn't follow the finger and the whole screen becomes a joystick, this helps with the game's clarity)   Great casual game otherwise, would recommend giving it a shot 🙂
Great Game. Can't see anything wrong with it. Totally recommend not just ninja kiwi fans but everyone! Thoroughly enjoyed it

I must say that this is better than the older one. However, in TD5, players can buy forever constant upgrades, such as the X2 money and the double village boost area. I recommend that augmentation is needed. It likes amulets and rings in RPG games. For example, a pair of boots that increases firing rate.  I hope my recommendation is not too difficult for skillful developers like you guys.

As a fan of Ninja kiwis work with Bloons series and Sas this will be inherintly biased a minor amount. Now that's my disclaimer.  To anyone thinking about purchasing the game I would say go for it as the price is low (When I bought it), the gameplay is fun and lots of customisation, the graphics could be touched a small bit on but that's me being picky also I would suggest them having faster moving speed for the supermonkey and it feels a small bit slow.  The game is fun and my criticism with the graphics and the movement speed of the monkey should be either disregarded or taken with a grain of salt it does not ruin the gameplay in any way, shape or form.

comments: This is a fairly clever game, my son (5)and me enjoy the strategy.  Once you learn the importance of each character it becomes even better. The main negative is it's completely fixed to try and lure you to purchase better cards and upgrades. You can win 8 games in a row then you lose them, it's about that number every time, coincendence? I think not. it's very hard to even get to castle 6 and we've been trying for about a month.

Your game server is from the stone age.  Too slow. Ruins the entire game.  You charge money for this game.  At least fix the server. Also opponents get gems faster at times.  Prob server issue also.  Editors choice?  They must of played it for 30 min.  Played for a few months. Fed up with frustration.

1.The player with the highest data speed wins the war. 2.I wish  mana can be looted from opponents. 3.I wish there is a clan war. 4.Some epic cards are too expensive that they can never be owned by poor players.  Just a point of view.
Hey developers I need and improvement. Make another section in the shop where we can see 30sec of video adds to get a reward of 1️⃣ GEM or 💯 COINS. So, what do you say?
Great game except for the. Incredible imbalance in pvp gameplay. Can pretty much tell who will win or lose as soon as u see the players specs. Getting bored of this quickly.
I'm addicted!! Love the game. It's awesome how you guys are constantly updating & making the game even better. Thumbs up, good job

Test the skills of a true master in the new mode Survive In Impasse. Obtain hidden martial art scroll the Great Vajra Finger. Get in the adventure full of dice, sand, and gold. Learn the fourth internal skills, Indefinite Breath Skill! Are you ready to Overturn Heaven and earth?"An awful lot of things just right!" – Pocket Gamer"Best Mobile Game at E3” – OnRPG"Excellent visuals and aesthetic martial arts!” – Touch Arcade"Sure to be a gorgeous, action-packed game for all to enjoy!” – App AdviceEnter a Stylized World set in Ancient ChinaExplore a visually stunning virtual world filled with peaceful peach blossom orchards, bustling city streets, and scorched battlefields! With full 3D animations and PC-level graphics, Age of Wushu Dynasty transports heroes to Ming Dynasty China, with stylized era outfits and authentic environments modeled on real locations!Struggle for Power with 7 SchoolsChoose from seven Martial Arts Schools to join on the path to discover the power within! Each school offers unique opportunities in an deep character customization system – master the Taichi Sword as a noble Wudang hero, or rain ninja death from the shadows as the cunning Tangmen. Join a school, master the arts, and compete with opposing schools to discover your destiny!Heart-pounding Revolutionary CombatBecome a true master of martial arts with Age of Wushu Dynasty’s revolutionary combat system. Go beyond simple hack ‘n slash mechanics with tactical real-time combat. Block incoming attacks, time your parry, and execute feints to break through defenses and defeat your opponent. Master unique skill sets to fight with blades, staffs, daggers, and bare hands! Ignite your Kungfu fire with powerful Rage attacks and destroy your adversaries!Challenge Rivals in PvPWho will be the ultimate champion of Jianghu? Enter a cut-throat world of ninja assassins and Kungfu heroes, as players battle it out in organized and open world PvP. Fight your way to the top in 1 on 1 Arena battles. Sneak behind enemy lines with Spycraft, and join together in Guilds to battle for supremacy in PvP Guild Raids!==Connect==Visit our official site to learn more about Age of Wushu Dynasty: http://aowd.snail.com/en/Join the Age of Wushu Dynasty community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum: Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ageofwushudynasty Community Forum: http://aowdbbs.snail.com/en/
descriptionHTML:
The New update for Age of Wushu Dynasty is finally coming to Android platform! Be prepared for the challenge from the legendary faction, Murong Manor. Test the skills of a true master in the new mode Survive In Impasse. Obtain hidden martial art scroll the Great Vajra Finger. Get in the adventure full of dice, sand, and gold. Learn the fourth internal skills, Indefinite Breath Skill! Are you ready to Overturn Heaven and earth?

"An awful lot of things just right!" – Pocket Gamer
"Best Mobile Game at E3” – OnRPG
"Excellent visuals and aesthetic martial arts!” – Touch Arcade
"Sure to be a gorgeous, action-packed game for all to enjoy!” – App Advice

Enter a Stylized World set in Ancient China

Explore a visually stunning virtual world filled with peaceful peach blossom orchards, bustling city streets, and scorched battlefields! With full 3D animations and PC-level graphics, Age of Wushu Dynasty transports heroes to Ming Dynasty China, with stylized era outfits and authentic environments modeled on real locations!

Struggle for Power with 7 Schools

Choose from seven Martial Arts Schools to join on the path to discover the power within! Each school offers unique opportunities in an deep character customization system – master the Taichi Sword as a noble Wudang hero, or rain ninja death from the shadows as the cunning Tangmen. Join a school, master the arts, and compete with opposing schools to discover your destiny!

Heart-pounding Revolutionary Combat

Become a true master of martial arts with Age of Wushu Dynasty’s revolutionary combat system. Go beyond simple hack ‘n slash mechanics with tactical real-time combat. Block incoming attacks, time your parry, and execute feints to break through defenses and defeat your opponent. Master unique skill sets to fight with blades, staffs, daggers, and bare hands! Ignite your Kungfu fire with powerful Rage attacks and destroy your adversaries!

Challenge Rivals in PvP

Who will be the ultimate champion of Jianghu? Enter a cut-throat world of ninja assassins and Kungfu heroes, as players battle it out in organized and open world PvP. Fight your way to the top in 1 on 1 Arena battles. Sneak behind enemy lines with Spycraft, and join together in Guilds to battle for supremacy in PvP Guild Raids!

==Connect==
Visit our official site to learn more about Age of Wushu Dynasty: http://aowd.snail.com/en/
Join the Age of Wushu Dynasty community and learn more on Facebook and our official Forum:
Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/ageofwushudynasty
Community Forum: http://aowdbbs.snail.com/en/

comments: Challenging game against live players. Lots of contests and bonuses. Levels of play from beginner to world class. One drawback: all levels are open entry, so more experienced (and less ethical) players will enter into Beginner to collect quick victories. The designers should change the game so that once a badge is completed, players should not be able to enter games on that level again. This would be fair play for beginners, encouraging them to continue playing. Hope this is implemented in an update.

Game graphics and play are great. However dice rolls are seriously flawed. Doubles way too often. Not even close to real rolling. I've seen 2 sets of doubles in way to many starts of the game. If doubles are so common why don't you ever see 3 doubles in a row to start. Don't ever leave a piece open because the next roll will knock you almost every time. The developer obviously likes frustration proven by the childish limited chat emojis.
They need to fix the dice roll. Its absolutely a big cheat...no way can some roll exactly what they need to get out of a tight position that often. Its really horrible it ruins the whole game.

I think it's safe to say based on the dice timing, that this game app, like all the rest, is favoring a particular player in order to end the game quicker. The auto play is annoying and not possible to turn off.. but the layout is nice.

It's the worst game i have ever played , they are thieves , when you double and you lose they deduct twice the bet and when u win they only give you 45 percent of ur total winning money.I played a game and won 255 thousand , but they only gave me 120 thousand , and when i lost they took out 255 thousand from my money.If you dont believe me count ur chips and see.They suck so go to hell with this lame unfair idiot game.
The dice rolling is not random at all !  It gives ridiculously lucky dices and game over in 3 or 4 turns. Do not play it. NO RANDOM DICE, NO FUN AT ALL !!!

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

I think its fantasic i would like to see more coin bonuses as i dont always have the money to buy. Highly recommend it! 👌 be refreshing to see replies to good rateings not just the bad ones. Seriously who cares about the bad. 😂

comments: I think it is a great game and great concept. Then in the stories characters would send pictures and videos. Great except you have to pay to see them. Not pay and boom you see stuff permanently, but its a weekly, monthly, or yearly thing like its a PlayStation plus account. There are ways of making money without doing this, its called advertisements. Yea they are annoying but they work. I would rather deal with ads and experience the full game then have the game be free but I have to pay for parts locked behind a pay wall. Aside from that the game is great.

Well the reason I put a zero on the graphics was bc I didn't get to see them.😢 I just wanted to let you know that I want to request a update on the game maybe just like let people see the video chats and not the pictures. It was really hard knowing what it was talking about. Overall I like it!😀

Most stories are good but its Very very very pay to read. With weekly and yearly subscriptions. After reading every story in 1 day, i canceled my free trial and uninstalled. I refuse to pay 3 dollars a week. Or even 50 a year to just sit and wait for them to come up with more material. On top of the subscription cost they ALSO have gems you buy and spend on making the fun choices in the stories. So my advice it to start your free trial, cancel it, read every story in a day. And then uninstall and thank me for not spending money to wait weeks for one more story.

I love these stories because they're  breathe taking, mysterious, juicy, horrifying, gruesome and just amazing. I find clifhanger inspiring because it gives me bazaar ideas for when I want to write a horra story. However, I don't like the idea of paying because when I first downloaded this app I read the first story and while I was reading the story a blurred picture appeared so I was so excited but when I went to click on it, it said I hat to pay which was quite disappointing but other then that I feel like this app was a realy good idea I feel like it was well made well organised and well planned

I understand this would be good entertainment for some, but honestly the set up you have is bad. having to pay multiple time to see a video or anything that is added as an extra is bad enough, having wait time are worse. On top of all of it the stories are lack luster. Please fix it.
I love the app it's amazing. I advise u to download it but pls put ads bc u have to wait 14 mins I mean I'd rather watch ads than wait 14mins it just makes me angry.

I love it! It is so fun to play! Thank you for making this! The only thing I hate in this game are the scammers. They make me so angry and upset. But like I said, I love this game!

Good Game Keep It Up! Its A Really Fun Game And I Wish That You (Ubisoft) Would Make The (Ignore List) Unlimited So Players Can Ignore Spammers Cause Everytime That There Are Spammets I Have To Remove 1 Spammer From My Ignore List And Ignore The New Spammed (Please Fix It)  ☺

I love the game but issue with new update in my iphone 6 plus every things are too small cant read even the controler not easy to use i have to scoll up the down bar this i hate the game now i need update like before size wise or control wise that was porfect for me and for all

comments: Not really easy to understand how to get started playing the game. I had to figure out a lot of it for myself but having to do that got frustrating so after a few days I just decided to uninstall it. It presents as cute and entertaining but trying to learn a game with minimal instruction doesn't give a great first impression

This is one of my favorite mobile games. My only issue recently is I spent money on coins after a level to finally finish it but the game crashed and I ended up having to start the game over smh it keeps crashing but this is the first time it crashed without fixing itself...hope you guys do something about that

Update: I read where you stated" Our developers only release levels after they personally ensure that levels  are beatable without the use of purchase's".  I was wondering, do they play a level for a week like I am so far trying to complete it? Are they really playing or it's what the computer tells them? I doubt that any of you are actually playing this game.

I have played this game for months and it was fantastic until the last 2 updates. After those the levels became so hard it's impossible to beat them without spending money. If you enjoy playing the same level for weeks at a time then by all means download. Otherwise don't waste your time unless you want to spend money.

Fun game but today while I have been playing, when I hit give up it keeps going to the 25 coins for 5 more moves no matter how many times I hit it. I have had to exit the app and reopen it to play the level again without spending coins. I hope this is just a glitch and not trying to get people to spend more money.

I love this game however, it has taken multiple lives from me for no reason. The game starts you off with 5 lives & then I accrued 10 lives from winning multiple lives from extra spins. All of a sudden the lives just disappeared and I was reduced to just 5 lives again. This is the 2nd time this happened to me which sucks cause the game is fun as hell.

comments: I absolutely love this game (app)! My Mom and I live in different cities about 3 hours apart... we both play, ok maybe battle is a better word!! We battle to take the lead and to see who has the most chips! It's a fun and exciting way to keep in touch with her. Thanks for this game/app!!  Sincerely,  Long distance daughter & Mother 🤓

Fast paced game and love it! Chances to keep getting extra coins and bingo credits by watching the short video or I found out by playing lower levels you had completed to play them again to get more of what you need! The higher levels you go you need more bingo credits so this works to your advantage! Great game and love it!

I really like this game as you get plenty of credits to play and alot of games to choose from. The only thing i didnt like was that i was in the middle of playing a bingo game and i lost internet connection and i didnt get my credits back from that. Other games on other sites if something happens when you are playing a game such as getting a phone call or losing connection you will get your credits all back for that game.  I just wish there was that option on here

never gives your bonuses after watching videos.  when trying to get your daily bonus and others it plays a video before you can get them. then gets hung up on boot after you close out.  have to reboot game every time and it still does the same thing.  fix updates please. Not getting keys for watching videos

There used to be an option of buying 3 power ups for 500 coins, now I have to click on an ad. Or buy 4  FOR 1000 COINS.  I ALSO NOTED THAT YOU ONLY GIVE BONUSES AT NIGHT, . People like me also play in the daytime.

comments: The game is great! Love the handling and graophics... But I would suggest making the drift angle wider. So instead of hitting 90° and then the counter says "combo broken" it could be something like 100°! Cause I mean... Reverse entries are awesome! And you should make the hoonicorn Mustang 4wd instead of rwd in the drift setup!!

I really enjoy this game. Ive maxed out purchases on tracks n cars, modified them all. Now its TOO hard to gain coins to open cars and much exciting tracks.. no updates on additional tracks.. think the optjons should be reviewed. Its now once you get where you are the only way to gain more is to go online to TRY and get coins to get anywhere... which sucks!!!!!

This game won't let me purchase anything. Everytine I start the app I get the "validation error" pop-up. I've sent mails to support, left multiple comments but nothing happens. I just get ignored. I am truly over his game with the level of support I am receiving, which is absolutely ZERO!

One thing: (two things actually)  Please make the drift school car available to buy with at least in-game cash maybe for a limited time? And please add a feature that gives you the ability to save replays, that would be really cool.

I think it should have ALOT more cars. I also think that they should alow custom decals and visual upgrades. Also a better online platform. Like a real time multiplayer. Other then that it's an OK game.  Its not been over a year and...it seems like they update this game every...6-7 months, really bad. Gets reallly boring 🤦🏽‍♂️

Love the game! But since the update I'm unable to purchase cars/cash. Every time I open the game it says I need to connect to the internet to make purchases even though I'm connected and can still play multiplayer etc. Any help would be great

comments: There is a LOT of things to do and keep track of in this game.  Definitely more than just a single point and click - theres some semblance of depth and especially with alliances, attack, and defense.

This game is a complete copy of Clash of Kings (same company, different name, different address in Kowloon), but it's well made and fair in terms of team play, and if you choose to pay, doesn't require a ton of money.  If you enjoy team play, it's a great game.  If you want a sim-city game where everyone leaves you alone, good luck!

The "gameplay" videos are fake. You do not get to have huge wars with the undead. It's nothing more then a waiting game unless you spend large sums of real money and even then the game is a lie it is not what they advertise and should be taken down for this reason alone. There are enough scam games as it is but this one is just depressing.
I love the game the only problem I have had is loading my Avatar after uploading it and spending 1600 in Gold I still do not have it loaded yet.
Uses gameplay from other games in their false advertising campaigns. Apparently, they also buy good reviews.
There’s a problem with game regenerating new rss that’s why you can see any rss and their levels. i mean you cannot see any new rss and their level
description: Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.Features:Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.
descriptionHTML:
Art of War: Last Day is a mobile strategy game with a future theme. Build a Base, Arm your Troops, Plunder Resources, Defeat Zombies. All for your survival.

When humans fought fiercely in Doomsday war with the self-aware AI System, ADAMS, its evil plan was being carried on quietly. Discovering humanity’s real fear: their dead relatives and friends due to the war between human and AIs have come back in an unexpected way…Having experienced a certain kind of unknown cruel tests, humans have realized those cold-blooded AIs have disappeared and been replaced with those without a single thought, who only know attacking…the Zombies! The civilization on this planet is at risk!

In this epic strategy game, use your forces and strategy to defeat Zombies and out of control AI Robots.

Build your Base, defeat the out of control AI Robots and mutated Zombies. Ally with players from all over the world, compete for the title of City landlord. Lead all players toresist the invasion, bring peace to your City, protect the planet’s civilization.

In the world of Art of War: Last Day, you have to fight for your survival at every moment.

Features:

Train 8 Units of 4 types and forge powerful arms and equipment to protect yourself;
Recruit strong Heroes, match the Heroes’ Skills cleverly to form the most powerful Army;
Upgrade your Commander, use the features of their Talents to Build the most powerful Base;
Research Technology in every field in the Tech Center to increase your power;
Join other players’ Alliances or create your ow Alliance to face the challenge from players all over the world;

When Resources are scarce, whether you should scheme carefully and wait patiently, or launch combat to plunder other players, you should always be determined to make decisions during the development process.

The combat has already begun! Join Now! Defeat enemies and restore our beautiful home!

Please pay attention! Art of War: AI Uprising is a free-to-download game, with some in-app payment options. If you do not want to use this function, please disable the in-app purchase in the settings of your device.

Are you having problems? Send an email to aowhelp@betterfun.net to contact us, or contact the support staff by tapping on the Customer Service building inside of your base.

comments: This game was absolutely perfect and was very much enjoyable, but now to unlock the full experience you have to pay. One of the reasons I enjoy this game and recommended it to my friends is because it is one of the only games that isn't locked behind a paywall. Overall, I have had countless hours playing this game, and trying to land on everything and return successfully. Instead of the microtransaction, why not institute a merit-based system for unlocking parts?

Very great!  Here are a few suggestion from me to make your game more enjoyable :)  1. Can you please make the earth scale correctly because its diameter is around 12.000 km and moon orbit is around 380.000 km  2. Please make a smaller powerful engine like the 9 engines of the falcon 9  3. Please make a button that is simple to cycle from another rocket to another one to ease the attempt of landing a booster  4. Please add an ocean on the earth for some splashdown  5. The last one. Im a free 2 play player and i cant enjoy a majority of the new update :*(

This game is awsome. Loads of fun. Told my friends about it. Could you add a free sandbox mode and more free parts. Thanks. Keep up the good work. Shouldn't have added micro transactions. It just ruined the game for me. Had to take it from a 5 star to a 3 star. Please bear this comment in mind for future updates. This game was 100% free when i downloaded it in december last year. Since then, you added a new build system, free parts which make the game absolutely amazing, and then you add pay for parts. Thats just buzzkill.

Very fast and simple rocket building and great graphics. I wish there was a sandbox mode with infinite fuel. Also there is no indication for loading screens when you hit the launch button. Somethimes you think you tapped the button and end up sitting there for a minute or two wasting time.  Edit So glad they made a small payment option. Well worth the money and glad to support

Great!  Only thing I miss is the ability to rendezvous and dock with another object.  In a moon landing, you could leave a stage in lunar orbit and pick it up for the outbound burn.  Also, karman line should be 100 km??  Edit:. Great updates.  I have no idea how to use docking to reattach parts that have been undocked though.

Can you please add option to center the map on the rocket/vehicle when being in the map mode? It is difficult to switch between near objects in the current version, since I assume the map is stationary relative to the body in which influence sphere we're in at that moment. Also, a "docking guide" would be cool in some future update
description: This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.• Realistic orbital mechanics• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.Current planets and moons:• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9CVideo tutorials: Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQMoon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8
descriptionHTML:
This is a game about building your own rocket from parts and launching it to explore space!

• Realistically scaled planets, with some up to hundreds to kilometers in size, and million of kilometers of space between them.
• Realistic orbital mechanics
• Open universe, if you see something in the distance, you can go there, no limits, no invisible walls.

Current planets and moons:
• Venus ( A planet with a extremely dense atmosphere)
• Earth ( Our home, our pale blue dot)
• Moon ( Our celestial neighbour)
• Mars ( The red planet with a thin atmosphere)
• Phobos ( Mars inner moon, with rough terrain and low gravity)
• Deimos ( Mars outer moon, with a extremely low gravity and a smooth surface)

Discord: https://discord.gg/v8u5Y9C

Video tutorials:
Lift off tutorial: https://youtu.be/vPbPrbR0qcQ
Moon landing: https://youtu.be/5RgPDlBNaN8

recentChanges: Added: Fairings, Probes, RCS, Solar panels and one new engine [Free].
Increased build space height by 2 [Free].
Added option to get a parts extension with: Docking, Rovers and Big parts and Extra build space (The extension also includes ALL future parts), I really tried to make this the best deal I can :P
Quick fix: Fixed problem with purchase, if your problem is still there, try restarting or reinstalling.
Major performance improvements.
Added clear all debris button.
summary: Space has never been this easy, or this hard!
title: Spaceflight Simulator

description: Run to chase after the robber and explore the endless running worlds of Talking Tom Gold Run! Race to catch the fun with loads of FREE CHARACTERS and the SPECIAL NEW CHARACTER, PRINCESS ANGELA! She lives in a magical place called MEDIEVAL TOWN. So, get ready to go for the gold in this exciting SIDE WORLD. Or test your snowboarding skills in the Snowboard Side World! Race snowboards on the snow! Rule the slopes! And have endless fun playing one of the best infinite runners out there! Whether you’re a kid, or just young at heart, this cool game will have you running, jumping, and getting an EPIC ADRENALINE RUSH IN NO TIME AT ALL! ★ Get a rush as you run through the subway tunnel to the new side world, Medieval Town. ★ Race down the slopes and ride the halfpipe on your new snowboard – it’s super cool!!!★ Meet special guest star, Princess Angela, and spend the winter with your favorite characters, Talking Tom, Talking Angela, Talking Hank, Talking Ben, and Talking Ginger!GET READY, GET SET, RUN!! Come and have fun for free with this amazing endless runner! Chase after the robber who stole your gold and unlock new worlds. Do you have what it takes to run through all the worlds and win? It’s not super easy to be the best, but we believe in you! Start running and racing now. It’s time to go for gold! Run to chase the robber – he’s got your gold! Use the gold bars you get back to build and upgrade amazing homes for Talking Tom and Friends! The finished homes will then unlock new worlds just for you! So, what are you waiting for? Let’s run for fun this winter! ★★★ENJOY THE FUN OF TALKING TOM GOLD RUN★★★ENDLESS FUN: With endless running, racing, and snowboarding, the fun never ends!!!MISSIONS AND REWARDS: Win missions to get cool rewards! BUILD AMAZING HOMES: Use the gold bars you collect to build homes for Talking Tom and Friends! UNLOCK NEW RUNNING WORLDS: Explore even more fun worlds when you upgrade your home! RUN WITH SPECIAL CHARACTERS: Run even faster and do cool tricks with the help of special characters!PLAY FOR FREE! This app contains:The possibility to use and connect with friends via social networks;The option to make in-app purchases;Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money (build progress, in-game functionalities, etc.);Promotions for Outfit7’s products, as well as advertising;Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player’s progress;Videos to watch starring Outfit7’s animated characters via YouTube integration; andLinks that direct customers to Outfit7’s websites and other apps.This app is PRIVO certified. The PRIVO safe harbor seal indicates that Outfit7 has established COPPA-compliant privacy practices to protect the personal information of children. Our apps do not allow younger children to share their information.Terms of use: http://outfit7.com/eula/Privacy policy: http://outfit7.com/privacy-policy/Customer support: support@outfit7.com

comments: Nice Game! At the start its easy, like many players said, but maybe they didnt stick through to further their games,I believe the easy start is needed to build for the later part of the games specially if you are a f2p player. Though being F2P isnt as bad here as it is on other games (speaking from experience). I like thier new updates now and specially the "sweep" requirement. Thanks Devs! my only hope is that please make planting/ crops a little easier on us common folks,it gets a little bit tiring to have to press from seed>plant repeat (depending on your available field). Anyway, besides this i do not regret playing the game, easy controls, f2p friendly, graphics is good, controls are good. Keep up the good work devs!looking forward to more updates
For the love of God let me grammar check your game...
Very nice and addictive game, i like it.  Would be nicer if pvp is already availble
Nice game. I just hope more free diamonds to be given during quests :)
I love the game but what happened to pk cus you guys are an different company

Downloaded the game just to see LoL heroes like Ahri and Sona on action only to found out most of them in preview screenshots doesn't exist in-game. But overall a fun game and f2p friendly.  Edit: upped my rating to 5 after 5 days playing, you guys deserve it. Keep up the good work. :)

comments: Das sind manchmal voll leichte Rätsel, manchmal voll schwere! Das find ich ne gute Abwechslung! Die bei vielen erwähnte Werbung kommt bei mir nicht sehr oft! Also ist es super! Voll cool! 😎 👍 Cool! Cool! Cool! Cool!!!!!!!!!!!! Danke des Spiel ist super!

Hatte beim Ligaspiel gerade folgende Situation: Die Runde war zuende und mein Gegner und ich hatten beide 2 Punkte, also unentschieden. Also wurde die Zeit gemessen, um zu gucken, wer schneller war. Auch bei den Punkten, die wir nicht hatten. Warum? Und wieso kann ich über 100 Sekunden gebraucht haben, wenn ich nur ca. 30 Sekunden Zeit habe? Wo ist der Sinn?

Funktioniert, ist aber katastrophal nervig aufgezogen. Es gibt viele gute Alternativen - im Rahmen von Rätselspielen - sofern man des Englischen mächtig ist. Mir hat diese App sogar Deutsch aufgezwungen, der Rest meines Handys inklusive des Betriebssystems ist auf Englisch
This game is quite difficult when you don't speak more than maybe 5 words of German....
Macht Spaß und man lernt was auch
Manchmal geht's RubbeldieKatz,dann wieder schwer am Denken.Toller Mix.Super !!!👍

comments: Hey... I would give this game 5 stars but there is 1 main -VE POINT. FUEL takes TOOOOOOOO LONG TO RECHARGE.  The point of this game is to playyyyyy the game. I don't want to keep waiting. I downloaded your great game TO PLAY it. Please try to solve this issue. I will definitely give you 5 stars if you fix this. Please listen to us and read our comments. Most of us are mentioning this 1 -ve point. Thank you

Great game but seriously?  The feul tho.  It takes 30 minutes to charge and it's only 5 as the limit.  Cmon that's bad!  I love this game and it has great graphics and it's a great time killer but please make the fuel like to 10 or make it 10 minutes to recharge.  If so I'll rate 5 star$

This game deserves to be the best game of the year. Its so simple and yet mesmerizing. It is also very fast so you won't get frustrated and could play this game for hours (or until the fuel runs out :-P). This game is quite exciting and the visuals are also nice. This game deserves more than 5 stars. The music blends in quite well and jobs make it more fun. Their are many sources from which you can get rewards which makes it easy and challenging to play. I love this game. Also you can buy more fuel slots in the shop for 100 diamonds. Its expensive but I don't need it beacuse I have to keep track of the time and only play until the fuel runs out.

Really good idea let down massively by the developers. Progress is extremely slow due to fuel taking so long to recharge and having to use gems to buy new vehicles. So unless you want to spend all your money on a free game, it doesn't really feel like you're getting anywhere.

Not too bad. I would have like to see the car while playing, and the graphics could be a touch better. I would honestly like an option between dragging your finger and using buttons on either side of the screen. That alone would have given this a 5-star rating from me

It shouldn't be easier to level up rather than actually playing game. I wouldn't say that the gameplay is difficult to play, but the purposefully placed trucks that shoot you is a bit ridiculous. Other cars are in the way which ultimately eliminates you before you can attack the shooting trucks. There really is no challenge except trying to beat your previous score. I give this game an eh out eh.

descriptionHTML:
THEY TOOK YOUR CITY. THEY SHOULD’VE TAKEN YOUR CAR!

Reclaim your No.1 position as you blast past other players and outrageous gang bosses in Fastlane: Road to Revenge!

Pick-up this FREE classic arcade shooter and play anytime OFFLINE!

BUST OUT THE BIG GUNS
• 20 exotic cars to collect and upgrade.
• 10 unique & powerful UAVs.
• Game changing vehicle transformations to rain destruction on your rivals: Talon Gunship, Vulcan S-22, Tempest C-3.
• More gear and gadgets than Elon Musk!

CHALLENGE PLAYERS WORLDWIDE
• Blast your way past players the world over.
• Overtake rivals to steal their score bonus.
• Race through 30 player leagues with escalating difficulty.
• Challenging environments and lethal obstacles.
• Can you reclaim your status as top boss?

RICH STORY CAMPAIGN
• 11 crazed bosses hell bent on stopping you in your tracks.
• Complete the campaign and reveal the identity of the boss who took over your turf.

HUGE SOUNDTRACK
• Actual in-game radio allows you to select your own beats.
• Wide selection of in-game music.


Please note that Fastlane is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases. You can play Fastlane offline but a network connection is required for in-app purchases and League Promotion.

_____________________________________________

Visit our official site at http://www.fastlaneroadtorevenge.com/
Follow us on Twitter or like us on Facebook to get info about upcoming Fastlane changes:
https://www.facebook.com/fastlaneroadtorevenge/
https://twitter.com/FastlaneRTR/

recentChanges: For Gus our beloved Pug, it has been a long journey. He has been to many places, seen many things, and crashed into far too many rockets.
In this bumper update he is bringing you experiences from around the world with a huge series of events, stay tuned to play them all!
We’ve also spent some time at the gas pumps and made it easier than ever to refuel your car.
Now go take back the city!
summary: Fastlane: The best new SHOOT 'EM UP that will entertain you for HOURS! 🔥🔥🔥
title: Fastlane: Road to Revenge

descriptionHTML:
Blast into a new Angry Birds puzzle adventure game! The birds are trapped inside balloons, and you can bet the pigs are behind it all. Tap matching balloons to blast them to smithereens and free the flock!

Use your balloon-bustin’ skillz to outsmart the pigs and save birds in over 600 egg-celent levels! Find the smartest way to solve puzzles, crack high scores, and earn three stars.

Grab rewards every day in the Daily Quest. Already got ’em? Then go join the weekly events or chase down this month's puzzle pieces. Blasted through those? How about taking on the world in the global leaderboard?

There’s plenty to do, and an ever-growing number of levels to master so get BLASTING!

Features:
· 600+ FUN LEVELS – with more added weekly!
· PICK UP AND PLAY – any time, any place even OFFLINE!
· TEASE YOUR BRAIN – with challenging & strategic gameplay!
· CREATE BOOSTERS – rockets, bombs, laser guns!
· DAILY CHALLENGES – earn free rewards and boosters!
· WEEKLY EVENTS – Mighty League, Treasure Hunt and more!
· PUZZLE CHASE – find pieces to new puzzles every month!
· PLAY WITH FRIENDS – connect to Facebook, yo!
· GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS – earn your spot with high scores!


----------------

Need some help? Visit our support pages, or send us a message! https://support.rovio.com/

----------------

Angry Birds Blast! is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, you’ll have a blast! Get it? I’ll see myself out...

comments: Relaxing stressful mind
Excellent

It's a great game that challenges thinking! But gameboard STILL freezes up when there's more than 4.5mg of cache. So u can be getting into the game, but no matter how much battery phone has or how clean other phone memory is, once you reach 4.5mg of cache board freezes til it's cleaned, wasting lives & time. PLEASE FIX!!

Average game without extra programming for finishing the level with all your boosts on the table being ignored at the end of a level. Also ticked off that you've intentionally placed the 'Spend 10 gems- Buy full lives' button exactly where the continue or end game button appears. So I had 10 gems and now I don't. Not going to keep the game.

description: Cash is the name of the game in Cash, Inc. the ultimate cash clicker game! Tap your way to fame and fortune and you’ll become the most popular billionaire in this business adventure!  Tapping money games were made for you, boss. Make money by clicking your way to the upper echelon. Tap to build one business, two businesses, three, and so much more! After all, a business tycoon has to start somewhere. Click all day and then let rich superstars take your biz to the next level! Become a money-crazed business tycoon as you see your riches grow. The rich life lets you accumulate millions and billions of dollars while your workers do all the work for you. The idle clicker adventure to fame starts now!Cash, Inc. Features:TAPPING GAME THAT MAKES YOU RICH• Tap, tap, tap and get rich while barely lifting a finger!• Idle clicker paradise - profit from your businesses without actually being there!• Tapping will make you a fortune. Use your earnings to invest in various businesses and then sell them to win the public’s sympathy! • Make money and pile up profit so you can spend your money on what YOU want.BUSINESS TYCOON AMENITIES:• Click and tap to upgrade your businesses and keep the money flowing!• The idle tycoon lifestyle means you get to manage profitable businesses while hanging out with superstars.• Billionaire’s paradise: Lead a lazy, yet productive life while everyone takes care of you and your businesses!• Make money while you renovate your business tower. More money means having better and more stunning tower appearances!• Hire celebrities and make more money while enjoying your fame!• Money is no object when you can earn free gifts from the Spin Wheel like tickets, crystals and time jump to build your riches even more!SHARE YOUR WEALTH• Rich List – Work your way up and join a community of business elites in the Cash, Inc. leaderboards.• Make it rain money and brag about your riches on social media!• Be a money machine and compare what you own against other business tycoons around the world.Tap to keep your cash flow healthy and thriving as you continue building your business, fortune and reputation. Get famous and become the most successful business tycoon in this idle clicker game. Watch as the rich and famous fight for your favor in Cash, Inc.!Download now to start your own business adventure to fame and fortune!Disclaimer: Playing Cash, Inc. requires a secure internet connection. P.S. Got problems? Questions? Suggestions?We’re ready to assist you, Boss! Talk to us via info@alegrium.com.

comments: Love this game but when you are competing with SWGOH for mobile SW content I expect it to be better end game and more Special events. At lvl 8 and there's no more rewards or incentives , so I guess I'm done.   Also, As a busy person I have limited time to play and taking the entire game offline for maintenance, like right now is not a good way to keep me interested.  Dumb move devs.   Edit: good job with update but still need light and dark missions past level 7

You should be matched with someone in your Tier, not 4 Tiers above you. When you play against fellow Guild Members you shouldn't have your levels edited. There should be an option to leave matches during the match. It doesn't make sense to lose because you had something else to do. And here's my biggest problem "Oh hey, you won that match, here's 30 points." "Oh you lost that match? Lemme just have 51 points from you." It also doesn't make sense to have heroes with blasters against melee heroes. They end up at a disadvantage.  Fot example, I was just matched with a level 3 Kylo Ren, as a level One Padme. Sooo fair.

First the unbalance between the factions. Now the match making.. Are you folks fckng serious about it? Your matching a lvl 11 to 13 or 14? How could I win with my lvl 10 troops vs lvl 15 troops? No matter which side I play.. I have a lvl 3 hux and your great system matches me to a lvl 5 anakin with lvl 13 af walkers? Tell me this is a joke.

Won't let me put cards down at mid Battle again and again. Connection will slow you down not your opponent it seems run into this issue way to much. Then issues like won't let you move or play anything but energy goes up

Absolutely love this game. As a life-long Star Wars fan this ticks NEARLY all of the boxes. However, there is one thing that bothers me, hence the "nearly". And that is the matchmaking. I'm in tier 5 division 3, and for some reason it decides to pick a person from tier 7 division 2. Of course, I lost because it's unfair. Please sort this out.

My favorite game on mobile right now. It's a mix between a MOBA(League of Legends)  and Clash Royale. You control a hero AND manually deploy different troops in your lane. I've never spent a dime and own all the heroes in game so it is not really pay to win at all. All around great game.

comments: Amazing shooter game, awesome hero collecting game, great multiplayer game. Definitely suggest that you at least try it out. But one thing you should look out for, it's pretty easy to sink between 5 and 20 dollars a week into this. Sometimes even 40 to 60. But, it's pretty free-to-play friendly if you can't afford to buy some gold.

I love this game. It's very dynamic and the gameplay is good too. The only problem I have is every single time I do PvP... It pairs me with an opponent far greater than what I can hope to beat. Sure, that's great for improving, but it disheartens me and makes me feel like a horrible player when I can't even beat ONE PvP opponent, ever, while playing the game. I would suggest to the devs that the matching system be a little more flexible when pairing. Give us a matching system that will actually give us lesser prepared players too so we can have the fun of winning, as well. Also, I am disconnected every single time I do PvP battles and bounties. Quite unstable, unfortunately.

I really like the game. It's fun and has enough activities and quests to keep you occupied for a while. My only complaint is how they match people up for the PVP missions. Sometimes you get matched up with people with far higher power and Team level menu which makes it nearly impossible to win. other than that I really enjoy the game

Super fun game. I haven't got bored of the game because there's always events going on which is good. One of the better if not the best shooting game I've played. I think there is a slight glitch when using Steele. Sometimes after I activate his open fire skill he doesn't shoot when I press the shoot button.

Latest update definitely made the game harder. I used to run 4 gauntlet levels with little issue but now I can't get through 1 without losing people. Resurrected characters are completely unwelcome and unfair in pvp when you tell on kills for money. Probably going to uninstall, you're welcome for the money Hothead

Starts off ok but then the pay walls creep in and you are constantly bombarded with prompts to spend money. The PVP is absolutely pointless, highest power rating wins every time without exception so you know if you've won or lost as soon as it picks an opponent. Needs a lot of work before I'd consider dropping any real money on it.

comments: Awesome job! Keep up the good work! Just one issue, I updated before I received the updated message and when I went to mail i saw the update message and tried to get my rewards and I did not receive them. Please resolve this ASAP. I will spend real money on the game but not until this issue is resolved. Thanks p.s.- same issue again! Updated latest version and did not get the rewards for updating! Please resolve!

Up until I updated the game it was working perfectly and very much responsive but now it slow and lagging especially in the campaign section  Please please fix this problem then maybe I can change it to a 5* rating.  Had the update message so I updated it and it is not letting me collect from the update message sort it out pleade

I really started to enjoy playing this until problems hit upon trying to contact the customer service it was made so difficult that I just gave up, it's a good game but in all honesty with the amount of problems that are actually in this game I wouldn't even bother not until they've sorted out their lives and got something done about the problems that they're actually having. The customerservice page also seems to be a Facebook page, where upon successful contact of the customer service they will ask you for your device model your gamer ID they will ask you way too much information that they do not need as this is all computer based and should be quite self evident as to what server and person is contacting them. I had no choice but to contact Google regarding this as it doesn't seem like a normal practice given the amount of games that I have played from the Google Play Store of this type.
4, would add one more when it stops crashing when I look at certain officers (mainly new ones)

After the latest update, all production boost items can't be used, A pack I bought wasn't given to me, subsequently I can't make Amy more purchasE's, it just doesn't go to payment.   Also, update rewards in mail can't be claimed.

descriptionHTML:
"Zombie Siege" is a global online apocalypse survival RTS modern war game. FPS elements bring you face to face with the walking dead and allow you to strike back firsthand.

City-Building Game – Fort Building Strategy, Emphasis on Teamwork
Gather resources, build an army, and resist the zombie horde.
Join an alliance and find allies. Enlarge your territory and fight other powerful contenders.

Whole World Online
Compete and socialize with survivors from all around the world, and view wars breaking out worldwide in real time.
Summon Officers
Officers possess unique active and passive skills to supercharge your army.
Mech Fighters
Mechs are a powerful solo-fighting unit that survivors can own, capable of dealing huge damage to enemies all by themselves, as well as defend your city.
Your City
Create your very own city and build a powerful army to protect it.
Shooter Elements
One-of-a-kind FPS elements bring you the thrill of slaughtering zombies firsthand.
Team Battles
This unique style of play lets you assemble your allies and strategically deploy them in battle. Unleash your command skills.
Apocalypse Survival
In these end times, you can stay neutral, or you can play the part of a looter, gathering resources through battle and constantly growing your territory.
All-new Soldiers
Newly-added zombie soldiers allow you to resurrect soldiers that you lose in battle and enhance your power.

Download now! Enter this temple of battle and experience the art of war. Become the strongest commander!

PLEASE NOTE! Zombie Siege is free to download and play, however some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please set up password protection for purchases in the settings of your Google Play Store app. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download Zombie Siege.

Have any questions or issues with the game from Elex Tech?
Reach us at: zombiesiege.help@gmail.com

comments: This is a great game! Everything u is free unless you wanna buy more energy. It takes Wi-Fi to play, which is one of the only things I don't like about it. The other is the story line goes a little slow. But after all I love all their story's.

Love the concept. Hate that you have to wait for only 300 energy each day that barely gives you anything. Also, if you've made the wrong choices, you can't watch the secret scene without paying. There should be an alternative to that.

Fantastic gameplay, blushing scenes and beautiful artwork. When I ran into a little issue during the game, customer service was absolutely darling! Their patience and kindness really lighten my mood! Would recommend! ~(^-^~) (~^-^)~

The game is a good one but the lack of game time you are given for free each day means you only get a minute of game play every twenty four hours... As much as I enjoy playing I can see I will get tired of slow progress and eventually delete it.... I know we all need to make money and all but you really don't stand a chance to enjoy these games with such little game time.
I LOVE Drogo, and Ryan! I'm on chapter 5 or 6 of Gabriel and I don't even know the point of the story. It drags on and eats your energy up but literally nothing has happened yet

Dear publisher,  though I enjoyed the game I do think that you should give more energy or at least two times to refill per day. Many people (including me) are impatient. Some might give bad reviews and even delete the game. Your dearly, Nina

Or will you have fun simply flirting? Install today create your own story, and choose your own adventure on the most breathtaking visual novel. Your workload is overwhelming, as is the endless amount of faces you encounter, but you manage to make sense of it with a few good friends at your side including Lisa Parker, the loyal secretary with a big heart; Matt Ortega, the playful Graphic Artist; and many more mysterious characters you will encounter along the way.Your manager is the dreamy Gabriel Simons, who has established a reputation as a serial romantic with many broken hearts following his trail. Will you be one of those girls, or will you beat him at his own flirting game? Has something for you! Will you choose drama? Will you choose romance? Write your story and choose your own path!

comments: Ive been playing this for a year and a half and i can say this game is NOT a pay to win. Pull rates are pretty much the same as in any other game, and units are tradable 90% of the time so its possible to get units you want even if youre not lucky enough to get them from packs. Platinum units are super helpful and are now much easier to get thanks to golden medals which are pretty easy to get in events. Theres different events, some are for unions, some you play for yourself. Also, a game with most friendly users ive met in games, willing to give a lot of help and advice to new players. All in all, ive played for a long time and i dont see myself stopping any time soon unless theres drastic changes

I love this game. Though they don't explain how to obtain platinum medals or how unions work very well. And I would like it if we could exchange 7s units better. I could list 10 units I'd rather have then idun. I would love to exchange her for a Gilles de rais or a fenrir. But no I have to keep this unit I don't want. Because my idun can't even be sold on the bazaar. Though those are my only problems. I'm addicted to this game.

It's really a good game. I've been playing this for a long time. The reason I didn't give 5 star is because there is a player who start arguing with the other player for no reason and i hope i can report this to the game developer but my friend say it would never work.

I've been encountering some problems with the game in terms of going through a quest. It just suddenly bonked me out of the game everytime i get to the boss. I've tried clearing the cache  and reinstalling it but  to  no avail.  I'm using an oppof1s  and whether I connect through  Wi-Fi or other means. It does the same thing. Would like some help with this

I have two copies of this 7* card that is essential to my deck at the moment. Unfortunately they screech this annoying Yossshh yaattaadaraa!!!!!! EVERY freaking time they launch a special. Then freaking golden apples fill up the screen. Unfortunately they are two of my strongest cards. Thinking of dropping this game.

Been playing for a long time seeing the game develop but as of recently when they switched to parade. Pay to play has been so heavily support worse than other games from the platinum club or vip to basically making it impossible to win or even compete without spending money in events especially when they make event units untradable this has not happened for 2 years the game has been out and now they r just plain greedy this game is committing game suicide and it was such a great game before but now they always have their hands out for money its really disappointing.

comments: Great game but lousy customer service.. i reached level 190 and can not go further.. created 3 tickets (inquiries) and i always get the same useless answer.. too bad.. loved the game but hated the support  I am sorry.. finally i got a straight reply to my question... however i find your reply is meaningless... why?.. it is very easy for you to find the 5 TICKETS i created.. my player name is   " saaaaad"

Don't play.. they just wanna make money by keeping good planes with themselves.. You can't buy new planes.. A game must be such that when you unlock a plane, You must be able to use them or afford to get them. Greedy company owning the game. Waste of time.

Hiya, vip 4 here... Great games overall. But one light issues i think. In assault mode, the plane cards does not varied much. I keep seeing laserbite, sometimes 2 blaster card and flamer card every assault mode is opened... I have a hard time collecting other plane card...

They rip you off after purchasing high items and pretend you have been forgotten by either sign in. Facebook or Google play games. They Rip you off from the money you spend. It's been done twice to Mee. And no one gets back too about complaints

Previously 5*. Coop and graphics are great. Recently the game has become quite unstable. Units that can't be destroyed, app hangs and crashes, poor object collision detection and many coop games dropped. Most frustrating when your copilot is next to you on wifi and you are watching an unsynced game that suddenly drops.

I have been playing for quite a while until I had to make a reset to my phone (not because of the game of course 😊) but now after the reset I am continuously desperately trying and retrying to reinstall the game but when it  reaches 100% installation it interrupts and tells installation can't be done and go to troubleshooting. Followed the troubleshooting instructions but still same issue 🙁. I would appreciate any help please.
description: One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies’ fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.– Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!– Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!– Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!– Perfect Shoot ‘em up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.– Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets. – Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your «phoenix» and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!– Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say «wow» and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!  Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
descriptionHTML:
One body is nobody! Gather your bros and kick the living heck out of tyrannical Autocrat's armadas in a series of breathtaking aerial battles! The enemy outnumbers you, but you're never alone -- the unique co-op mode allows you to join forces with either your bro or a new friend! Shooting never ends.
With a broad range of aircraft and upgrades to choose from, a variety of missions and challenges, Hawk is a good ol' adrenaline overdose. There's absolutely no way you'll ever get bored! So be ready to attack.
Maniac bros will help you choose the best guns and surprise the enemies with destructive missiles. Keep your strongest weapons reloaded to deliver a crucial strike to the enemies’ fighter jets. True bullet hell where metal melts.

– Exciting campaign: more than 190 levels full of enemies and breathtaking action!
– Unique co-op multiplayer: team up with your battle brothers to overcome challenges or join forces with random players for even more fun!
– Additional modes: Arcade, Team-up and Assault, each of them radically changing the gameplay!
– Perfect Shoot ‘em up: Lots of fighter jets, battle companions, ammunition and guns, and devices to choose from: your personal armory is packed with hi tech!.
– Huge bosses: battle and defeat enemies that are so big they don't even fit the screen! And wipe out swarms of their minions! Find pieces of the Danmaku barrage of bullets.
– Great visuals: Tired of space and lasers? Try out flying! Amazing 3d graphics will make you forget that this game genre is old school. Vertical shooters have never been better. Epic sky wars are full of excitement. Choose your «phoenix» and free the country from invaders. The symphony of air war and heroes' charisma are unforgettable!
– Retro modernized: Played Shmup (STG) games before? Think this is retro? We prove you are wrong. This top-down shooter will make you say «wow» and revive the best impressions of your scroll childhood. No matter you are a fan of Strikers, Tyrian, Ace Squad, Razor or Airborn or you participated in battle actions in 1945. You will become the fan of our freedom squadron!

Take your Broforce to victory. Feel the bullet force.
developerAddress: Barbara Strozzilaan 201, 1083 HN in Amsterdam

summary: Grab your bros and plunge yourself into a breathtaking air combat action!

comments: I would love to be able to play the game again.  The new update has now given me minimal play time as it continuously crashes.  Like I would've thought that the crashing problem would've been fixed by now,  but it just gets worse every day.

It's great! Stop spamming me to rate!! [ Edit ] Okay, I guess at the beginning it did it a lot more but eventually slowed down. Would be nice if it just stopped entirely after rating. I've raised my rating by 1 star.
This game crashes more than drunk drivers on a Saturday night. It was the fun the first day but a day later it crashes without even getting through the loading screen?? Fix your game.
Well made game, lovely graphics, and not very pay-to-win. I love it. Never encountered any of the bugs/crashes the others mentioned so I can't say much about that. It's a smooth experience for me.
So many crashes. Daily 50-100. I cant take this anymore. I think I might quit if this problem will not be resolved. Cache cleared many times. This game is not worth daily constant crashes.

Enjoyable on every front EXCEPT when I receive fb messenger notifications and I use the "quick reply" without opening the app, the keyboard slides the entire application up half way and after I send it takes up to 30 seconds to correct itself if it does at all.  Idk but maybe make it so it allows over lay of keyboards? Or whatever coding nightmare that might bring...just figured I'd mention it
