comments: It's a good bingo game with a good amount of variety. Love the fact that you can play in different rooms and get bonuses with the puzzles! I was wondering if buying the elite pack is a one time purchase or a monthly fee. Couldn't find the answer anywhere. One tip to make it even better would be to make the tickets a little easier to get. Otherwise would give 5 stars!

My only issue with this game is that u almost have to end up purchasing tix to continue to play. The further u move on in the game, the more tix each card costs & ur only given a certain amount thru a daily reward. App should provide ways to earn more tix, either thru a daily spin or higher rewards. *(since app developer replied to this review, I changed my review to 4 stars)

The game itself is very fun.  However, if you run out of tickets, it is way too difficult to earn more.  Apparently, they made it easier to earn tickets but after playing many other games, the update isn't enough.  To continue playing, you must buy tickets.  I may have to delete the game which is a shame because it really is a fun game.    3/18/18... They tell you to play lower cost games to get more rewards but it doesn't.  It just takes you a bit longer to go through your tickets but you don't win anything.  Time to delete.  Graphics were great and games were fun but without tickets you can't play.

Really liked this game. Now i cant play it because its near impossible to get more tickets. I cant complete daily tasks as I have no tickets and ive got to wait ages to get daily tickets. Even then there gone within 5-10minutes and cant get no more until following day. Games dont pay out enough either when you win

It's been nice...I'm happy to share: they heard us. We can earn power now, the games are fun, excellent pace. Thank you "Dataverse", I appreciate your changes 💯 ☠☠☠☠☠ UPDATE: n again 1/11. again: I ventured and came back. I can buy credit in January. Cuz we HAVE to have boosts to play long. Here I go !Update. I like a lot. Spent 20 but you simply can't spend enough.  must buy boosts too. Boosts get stuck

I really like this Bingo  game.  A few upgrades and it will  be better than all the other Bingo games.  I love the amount of tickets it gives you to play.  I love the extra stuff you can earn and not have to pay for.  A couple of things that would  make this game better would be all 4 cards on one screen in tablet mode, the power ups being applied automatically  and being able to daub that last number that's  called cause usually that's the one needed for Bingo.  Otherwise its great.  I hope  you find this useful.  I understand  if you can't  fix all three of these but the first 2 are more important  than the last and i understand  there can only be a certain amount of bingos i guess.  Thank you.  Real close to being a 5 but those 3 issues really hold me back as I'm  sure it does others as well.

description: Be bewitched by the Lucky Lady's Charm™ Deluxe slot machine and increase your chances of winning. Ten paylines across five reels in the regular game, as well as numerous bonuses, will make you a winner. The aim of the game is to achieve a line of 5 like symbols across the reels. In the regular game the win pattern starts at the first reel on the left and follows the payline across to the right. To win, the symbols must be adjacent (without any other symbols between them). The Lucky Lady symbol is a joker and it substitutes all of the other symbols, except for the scatter symbol (the Crystal Ball), and it doubles the Twists. Lucky Lady's Charm™ Deluxe is one of the numerous games provided to you by GameTwist. By completing a quick registration you’ll have your very own GameTwist account and you’ll be ready to go!  Would you like to enjoy more of our entertaining games on the move? Then download our GameTwist app! Our apps are available on all Android phones with a resolution of 320x480 or higher.

comments: It's sad to see people complaining and giving bad reviews about crashing but not knowing it's probably because their device is  g a r b a g e. I have j3 6 which is pretty bad and still runs well. Very optimized, sleek game. Also alot of updated to keep the game fresh and the microtransactions are very fair.

Very fun game, wish it wasn't energy based, would definitely enjoy it more. The fishing is 'new' right now and i have to say the percentages are garbage. 75 percent is more like 50, 50 percent is like 10 percent,  25 percent is closer to 50. This is just my personal experience. The games is really fun though, expect to get annoyed with the fishing percentages however. Also energy gets spent super fast in this game, very fun yet very limited.

It's good and alot of fun but it's a bit of a tedious grindfest. 150% item find and I found nothing after going through ten dungeons. I want to keep playing but it's just another pay to win type. I understand you need to make money but I can buy a full loadout of epic equipment and run through a great portion of the game in no time. It's definetly worth giving a try but unfortunetly it's not for me.

I fell in love with this game as soon as I opened it the first time. But there is a problem which forces me to give it a 2 star rating. It kicks me out of the game every 5 minutes and that way I can't get any progress done. I absolutely enjoyed the little playtime I got and I want to play it more but it won't let me. Great job otherwise devs!
Fun and amazing game, great time killer for me, I just love these pixelated games so much.. to be fair it sounds like it's more Terraria and pokemon mixed typa thing y'know.. 5 stars

Been playing this for about a week.  It's a lot of fun with a variety of different things to do.  Running out of energy for doing dungeons doesn't matter a lot as there are three or four other things to do in game that don't require energy.  Will be making a purchase to support the devs.  Good game!
description: Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. Prove you’re the mightiest hero in the land by competing in the PvP arena, Raids, and weekly events for awesome prizes! Take your most powerful friends and guildmates along to battle at your side!Key Features:*Retro dungeon crawling adventure!*A statue in the main town of the top global PvP player!*Six vast zones with over 70 randomly-generated levels and raids.*Thousands of mix and match pieces of loot to upgrade, craft, and recycle.*Capture and evolve over 100 creatures to fight by your side! (including powerful bosses).*Equip fantastic pets such as floating pizza, tiny unicorns, and more!*Team up with friends to tackle ultra-difficult dungeons to find great treasure!*Level up your guild to unlock a special shop with powerful bonuses.*Share stories and swap strategies with World Chat and Guild chat.*Original chiptunes soundtrack that sounds like it was ripped straight from a NES cartridge.PLEASE NOTE: Bit Heroes is free to play, but some extra game items can be purchased for real money. descriptionHTML:
Explore a vast new MMORPG world inspired by your favorite 8-bit & 16-bit dungeon crawlers.

Bit Heroes captures that charm and nostalgia of your favorite RPGs, delivering them seamlessly to your mobile device.

Collect and craft thousands of pieces of loot to increase your power. Build your team by capturing monsters and bosses to fight at your side in old school, turn-based combat. comments: This game is rigged!!!!  Get dealt two seven of clubs as a pocket pair.  Get a seven of spades on the river and lose to someone that had two pair.   And I have a pic saved of my pocket pair.   Last time I checked it is impossible to be dealt two of the same card.   And in what world does a three of a kind lose to two pair.   Will never spend money on this app again!!!!!!!    So glad to receive a generic response...   It would have been nice if you actually read the review.  It doesn't matter how lucky you are. You cannot get get 2 of the exact same card dealt in the same hand.  And no matter how lucky you are 3 of a kind shouldn't be losing to two pair.  That just the rules of poker.

Use to be Terrific, last 2 weeks the game froze on my winning hand causing me to loose to Those Ugly Figurines..... No matter how my h or how I play this game is RIGGED to have those Monsters, break you...  Every Time ...... Beginning Not To Respect This Money Vaccum

comments: Greetings Making Fun,  Let me start off by saying that I absolutely love this game. It's entertaining, challenging and addictive. The storyline is engrossing and the graphics are spectacular as well. You can easily tell how addictive a game is by the amount of time you spend playing it at a stretch. Let me just say that I've been playing this game ever since I installed it. Whenever I sit down with my device, I start playing it and I keep on playing for at least two hours before I divert my attention to other matters. It's a really lovely and delightful game. Making Fun seems like the most suitable title of the developers because they've made something that is really a lot of fun. Well done. I highly recommend this game. DOWNLOAD IT TODAY.

Awesome game. Good graphics, great sound and music, intricate leveling up system and character build, easy controls, variety in enemies, lots of replay value, lots of gear to find, and doesn't take much data space. Reminds me of a Diablo type game. The developer's really do deserve a lot of praise for creating such a quality game and not making it a p2w. This is an example of doing it right. I can tell that a lot of thought and care was put into it. Absolutely brilliant. I can't praise enough. A rare gem on the play store, and completely free. Just awesome. 6 out of 5 rating. Thank you so much for such a great game.:) Edit: Thanks for the update. You guys rock.

Good looking game plays very smoothly. Fun to play and not too hard or too easy. Nice little details like the way your hero talks and has other party members. These things help make the single player game seem less lonely. I don't know if I am going to hit a pay wall or loose interest. The story is engaging enough. I just don't give out 5 star reviews.

Good game. Defintely like that you can play offline. Most of my issues with it are really minor except for the fact that the background especially things like walls, trees and hills can sonetimes block your view. There have been a bunch of tines where I couldn't see enemies that were right next to me because a wall was there.

Great game so far! Love the old school feel to the game! Resembles Diablo a lot! But I love the Diablo series so being able to play a game like that from the palm of my hand...GOLD! Tons of customization from characters, skills and equipment upgrades. Most of the better items are obtained just by playing! No need to buy items, save those gems for more skills to adding more companions to fight along side you! Running low on gems...just keep playing! Love a game that rewards you just for playing! Keep up the good work guys! I don't post reviews unless it's worth it so......see you out there!

The gameplay is the best ive seen for an android RPG Diablo type game. Slick graphics, awesome sound track and effects, no slowdown and you can play offline!! Absolutely love the game. Only down side is the worry of repetitivness of the game but i guess only time will tell
description: Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.
descriptionHTML:
Eternium is an amazingly fun and beautifully crafted Action RPG, reminiscent of the great classics.

Eternium stands out from other mobile Action RPGs by its effortless “tap to move” and innovative “swipe to cast” controls, and its player-friendly “no paywalls, never pay to win” philosophy.

With the exception of a couple of online-only features, the game can also be played offline after the content download completes.

Drawing signs to cast spells is easy and rewarding. The tap-to-move control is more natural and relaxing than thumbsticks, and it’s also truer to the vintage point-and-click Action RPG experience.

The game can be really played for free, as more than 90% of our players do. Purchases are completely optional. Gems, the game’s main currency, can be collected from enemies and quests. There is no limiting stamina or energy. The best things in the game are obtained by playing, not paying.

Eternium has been launched in 2014, and is actively being improved by the original development team. Through years of polishing, and feedback from millions of players, the quality of the game has steadily increased, making it now one of the highest rated games on all app stores.

As of fall 2017, major new features are in advanced stages of development, including real-time multiplayer, town portal, and a fourth world.

Enjoy the visceral satisfaction of responsive, fast-paced combat, with spectacular special effects, pleasing sounds, rewarding damage numbers, all set against immersive backdrops and atmospheric, inspiring music scores.

Play as a Mage, Warrior or Bounty Hunter, wielding a sword, axe, staff or gun. Level up to learn new abilities and increase your attributes.

Battle skeletons, zombies, automatons, aliens, demons, dragons and many other creatures, across three beautifully hand-crafted worlds, or in endless generated levels.

Venture into dark caves and dungeons, explore forests, villages and graveyards, lay siege to demon controlled castles, brave snowy mountain peaks, travel to the moon to slay strange creatures among craters and canyons, and beyond, to the deserts, pyramids and jungles of the red planet.

Open treasure chests to loot gold, gemstones and battle gear. Equip shiny breastplates, menacing helmets and hoods, spiked shoulder pads, mysterious cloaks or capes. Protect yourself with a shield, or choose to wield two weapons as a warrior.

Rescue your tank, healer and ranger companions who will join you in battle. Use their abilities together with yours to create rewarding and powerful tactical combos.

Experience a refreshing storyline, filled with interplanetary intrigue and seasoned with funny characters. Hunt your arch-enemy, Ragadam, across the worlds, while trying to uncover and undo his twisted plans.

Progress from common to rare, epic and legendary gear. Find gemstones that fit in your armor’s sockets. Craft socketed rings and amulets, and fuse three of them into a higher quality one.

Unleash awesome offensive abilities, such as Whirlwind, Shockwave, Arc Lightning or Blizzard, control the enemy crowd with Frost Nova, Vortex, Silence, or sneak and assassinate with Smokescreen, Traps and Snipe.

Each hero class has access to about 20 abilities (skills or spells), and each of your three companions has four more. The game starts simple, but culminates in a flurry of tactical possibilities at high levels.

Once your hero reaches level 70, your experience points go into Champion Levels, which are unlimited and yield steady stat upgrades. Champion Levels are also inherited by your new heroes, so they will have an easier time growing up.

Aside from the three story acts, an endless progression of beautiful, randomly generated levels awaits in the Trials of Valor game mode.

Eternium is crafted with passion by a small band of old-school RPG fans, who love making the game they always wanted to play.

summary: A tribute to classic RPGs, made with passion, not greed, by old-school gamers.
title: Eternium

Grow Empire: Rome is a captivating game, mixing tower defense (TD) and strategy mechanisms with role playing (RPG) elements.
You are Caesar, mighty leader of the Roman republic, your objective is to defeat other civilizations in ancient Europe with an army made-up of roman soldiers, siege weapons, heroes and barbarian mercenaries. Be ready for War!

Turn a small republic in the heart of the Italian peninsula into the greatest civilization the world has ever seen. Lead a bunch of weak peasants into the fierceness of battle to turn them into invincible warriors.
Upgrade your stronghold to defend from the most fearful barbarian's clans and armies from Italy, Gallium, Carthage and Iberian peninsula. Conquer them to expand your dominions and see your nation wealth grows.

The glory is awaiting for you Caesar!
Veni Vidi Vici!

- Connect puzzles and inflict damage with dragons, magic heroes and monsters
- Play multiplayer rpg puzzle game with great opportunities for pvp fights
- Find secret cards in hidden quests
- In this free match-3 mmorpg puzzle game you can play with your friends and develop your own game of war strategy to become the best warriors

Explore mysterious dungeons and fight dozens of different monsters. Open new regions, kingdoms, charge your magic heroes, and rush dangerous bosses for rewards in this free pvp mmorpg game with epic battles.

Choose your own game of war strategy to raid other summoners, clash with clans and seize their treasures in these wars. Find your war strategy in guild online battle games. Clash with clans, build a town and turn it into an impenetrable fortress with strong tower defense. Summon rare monsters, puzzles and dragons, train them and use their magic abilities to protect your castle during clash of clans in pvp online battles. Use magic soul stones to summon warriors, rogues, mages and archers with special roles and unique fighting and defense skills.

Forge of Glory is a free mmorpg match 3 puzzle game with pvp battles that require great strategic skills. In this 3d multiplayer strategy game you can build your own army, defense towers and summon powerful heroes for epic wars. Take part in online pvp battles and game of war and magic.
Use puzzles to summon mighty dragons and monsters. Take part in epic magic wars of mighty empires. Find secret match 3 quests and get a set of epic armor and weapons for your army commander and for tower defense.

Enjoy the excellent 3d graphics and art and dive into the amazing fantasy game of war and magic! Start your enthralling mmorpg online adventure and prove your bravery in a great number of pvp fights!

Start your enthralling adventure in online battles and prove your bravery in this legendary game of war. Summon your army of magic heroes and get ready to enjoy the most challenging match 3 puzzle role playing game you’ve ever played!

Please note! Forge of Glory is a free multiplayer mmorpg game, but there are some game items that can be purchased for real money. If you want to prevent using this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s settings. You must be at least 13 years of age to play or download the Forge of Glory strategy rpg match 3 puzzle game.

Follow Forge of Glory mmorpg match 3 puzzle game on Facebook for the latest news and game updates: http://facebook.com/ForgeOfGlory/

comments: I had to change my rating for this game because I seriously believe it is rigged for me to stop advancing. Everything was great until I made it to pro level and now I'm noticing that whenever I am tied with another player with gems, an extra gem magically appears in the hole making me lose that round. How is it possible that I made it to pro level winning a good percentage of games and now I have played at least 50 rounds on level 3 and can't win a single one?

A great app to download. Great format and graphics. Lots of fun and challenging. Rated everything 5 star other than gameplay. It's good but not great due to the water hazard or out of bounds shots.  Players can hit into the water yet still finish on par. Water hazard should automatically be 2 shots. If this gets changed it would be 5 star no doubt and best golf app.  Single mode would be fantastic to practise

To many play just to attack your ball after you hit. Regardless if they don't play well they win. A bit eh. The way it's done barely allows you to win. I agree with many others reviews. Something fishy about the scoring system and who you are placed against. Won't keep long if it continues. Could be awesome if it wasn't unfair. O.o

This game is ok at best. More about luck then skill. Fun and addictive, yes at times. Ive collected all the trophies from 3 of the maps and was on a roll. Then out of nowhere a 15 game lose streak. You will get to the point past anger. There are a lot of pretty good/lucky players from around the world.

Overall, game quality is pretty solid. Few graphic glitches here and there but can be expected. It would be nice to rotate to see a better perspective and easier to hit.   One must improvement needed is that when you play a bot, it's way too noticable. You need to improve the bot intelligence! I understand why bots would be needed time to time.  Coins could be cheaper too.  EDIT: Game froze on a Pixel XL, cost me lots of coins! Not happy.

Not bad. Sometimes freezes a little during game play but usually resolved itself. The wind is usually fair for each player's turn so that's good. Overall a good little time waster game. The only thing I would suggest is to make it a little easier/more often that gold bricks get collected. I've played for over a month now and got about 8 since starting.

Putt your way through wonders. Golfers' wildest dreams finally come true! Let's ride tube slides, swing on drawbridges, jump over pyramids, explore mazes with bomb traps, and reach farther and fly higher with accelerators and jump pads! So if you want to relax with a nice PvP game which is easy to pick up, instantly addicting and hard to master, this will be the best game for you. Start your epic tour in the quest to be the next Mini Golf King!

★★ Download Mini Golf King - Multiplayer Game for free NOW! ★★

description: Es bricht ein neues Zeitalter in Clash of Lords 2 an. Dein Heldenteam bereitet sich auf neue Herausforderungen vor, denn das ultimative Strategiespiel wächst immer weiter. Lasse deine Helden noch mächtiger werden, durch die neue Funktion Erleuchtung! Haben deine Helden das Zeug, um bisher ungeahnte, in ihnen schlummernde Kräfte zu erwecken? Clash of Lords 2 ist ein Strategiespiel, welches eine Menge Spielspaß liefert und den Spieler zahlreiche Innovationen erleben lässt. Rekrutiere Helden aus einem Arsenal von über 40 Charakteren und ihrem Team aus Söldnern. Baue deine eigene Basis, um dich gegen Angriffe der Gegner zu verteidigen und spiele mit Freunden gegen Gegner in zahlreichen PvE und PvP Spielmodi. Mach dich bereit zum Clashen! VERBESSERE DEINE HELDEN: Wähle aus einer Vielzahl von Helden aus, die alle einzigartige Fähigkeiten und Fertigkeiten besitzen! Verbessere die Fähigkeiten der Helden und ihre Ausrüstung!GÖTTLICHE FÄHIGKEITEN: Zeige in Echtzeitkämpfen deine Macht!SÖLDNER WAHNSINN: Stelle ein unbesiegbares Team mit Helden, Hilfshelden und Söldnern zusammen!ACHT VERSCHIEDENE SPIELMODI: Erlebe Action ohne Ende. Beherrsche die Liga der Lords, Ressourcenüberfälle, Solofeldzüge, Heldenarena, Clash-Feldzug und mehr!GILDEN: Führe deine Gilde in spannenden Gilden Modi zum Sieg! SPIELE GRATIS: Tägliche Anmeldebelohnungen im Spiel, werbe neue Helden an und erhalte  kostenlose Juwelen!LORD, DEINE HELDEN BRAUCHEN DICH!
descriptionHTML:
Es bricht ein neues Zeitalter in Clash of Lords 2 an. Dein Heldenteam bereitet sich auf neue Herausforderungen vor, denn das ultimative Strategiespiel wächst immer weiter. Lasse deine Helden noch mächtiger werden, durch die neue Funktion Erleuchtung! Haben deine Helden das Zeug, um bisher ungeahnte, in ihnen schlummernde Kräfte zu erwecken?

Clash of Lords 2 ist ein Strategiespiel, welches eine Menge Spielspaß liefert und den Spieler zahlreiche Innovationen erleben lässt. Rekrutiere Helden aus einem Arsenal von über 40 Charakteren und ihrem Team aus Söldnern. Baue deine eigene Basis, um dich gegen Angriffe der Gegner zu verteidigen und spiele mit Freunden gegen Gegner in zahlreichen PvE und PvP Spielmodi. Mach dich bereit zum Clashen!


VERBESSERE DEINE HELDEN: Wähle aus einer Vielzahl von Helden aus, die alle einzigartige Fähigkeiten und Fertigkeiten besitzen! Verbessere die Fähigkeiten der Helden und ihre Ausrüstung!

GÖTTLICHE FÄHIGKEITEN: Zeige in Echtzeitkämpfen deine Macht!

SÖLDNER WAHNSINN: Stelle ein unbesiegbares Team mit Helden, Hilfshelden und Söldnern zusammen!

ACHT VERSCHIEDENE SPIELMODI: Erlebe Action ohne Ende. Beherrsche die Liga der Lords, Ressourcenüberfälle, Solofeldzüge, Heldenarena, Clash-Feldzug und mehr!

GILDEN: Führe deine Gilde in spannenden Gilden Modi zum Sieg!

SPIELE GRATIS: Tägliche Anmeldebelohnungen im Spiel, werbe neue Helden an und erhalte kostenlose Juwelen!

LORD, DEINE HELDEN BRAUCHEN DICH!

comments: Wish the hearts were half price and that I could replay episodes without paying a new ticket. I've spent an embarrassing amount of money, about 900usd and counting. The overall quality of the stories is good. The variety of characters is good, but it would be nice to have more than one female love intrest per story. Go Persephone! 😻😚💘

This is great! The best romance game I've come across. Only thing is maybe more female love interests and definitely have a system that gives you like 5 hearts a day? Just to get those back because I haven't played the game in a week and a half because of no hearts.

Hearts are too expensive and the hearts needed for some choices are way too high. Daily loggin rewards don't have a good enough chance to get them either. Stories are great and I enjoy them very much. Would recommend for others even those who don't want to spend the money. I myself haven't paid a cent because of the high prices.

I really enjoyed reading different stories. Loving this apps.Just please add more tickets... and also it takes forever to waitq for the next season or episodes..it spoils my excitement.. please don't make us wait .. your stories are all really good..just make it more fast in adding new season or episode please please please

I've been playing the game for a really long time now since I was 13 or 14 and am now 17 turning 18 this year and I'm sooooo happy with how it's grown but the one issue I have is the hearts thing. I can't pay the specific amount to get a whole stash of heart and it really bugs me because I love the options that you give us but I don't have hearts...can you please look into it and come up withe something ?

This game is addicting and is very fun I think you will love it.I did so try it out and see what happens.The one I loved the most was gangster love ash so I advise you to try that one out if you want.Also with the gangster love series try out chance he's fun
description: "Choose your ideal romance and enjoy the love you’ve always wanted to in this unique visual romance novel game! Find a story that captures your heart and decide who you want to fall in love with from a  selection of 50 unique characters! Current available series are:VILLAINOUS NIGHTS: In a world of super powered humans, you find yourself with a group of powerful Super Villains and discover that  love can bloom even in the darkest of nights. HAVENFALL IS FOR LOVERS: Vampires, Werewolves, and Demons, oh my! Find your Supernatural Soulmate in this mysterious and exciting story! GANGSTERS IN LOVE: The most dangerous and sexy gang in Los Angeles is after you… and your heart! LOVE & LEGENDS: Destiny takes you from your everyday life to a world of swords and sorcery! Now you must tie your fate to one of seven fantasy heroes.STARSHIP PROMISE: Explore the universe and discover a galaxy of love in this exciting spacefaring romance set far in the future!ASTORIA: FATE’S KISS: The fate of the world will change with just one kiss!  Fall in love with the Gods and Monsters of Greek Mythology! TO LOVE & PROTECT: One minute you are a normal college student, the next, you are the secret love child of the President of the United States! CASTAWAY! LOVE’S ADVENTURE: A pleasure cruise gone wrong leaves you stranded on a remote island with 5 Sexy Strangers! SPEAKEASY TONIGHT: Enjoy the glamorous but dangerous world of a speakeasy filled with illegal booze, hot jazz, and even hotter romance! "

comments: Really fun at fisrt, but after a month or two of playing planet shields become way to strong. Even with the dark matter bonuses and increased infectivity from your bacteria slots it takes too many attacks and nanos. The game desprately needs a way to penetrate shields, or reduce shield strength.

One of the best idle clickers out there, excellent progression and upgrade systems, lots of extra features that keep you playing. I played daily for about 60 days in a row. Got bored after the 3nd black hole for some reason.
How does one get the achievement No Time To Lose?  And, please fix the scrolling.  Whenever I scroll any list, it snaps back again. EDIT: The best I've seen of its kind.

The game is a decent enough time waster. However, when you begin getting into higher numbers the game breaks. I have over 100x the required about of bacteria to destroy a planet but it still says i can only take out 99.48%.  I have currently 75.528 oo bacteria and the planet Esloytis says it requires 47.310 nn bacteria to complete, but im at 99.7%. The numbers being dealt with are literally astronomical and unfathomable as a human, but following the progression of the game so far it would seem i have fathoms more bacteria than should be required.

I am not really happy with the new update... The colony prices have been increased... Now it would take even more time to collect the amount of bacteria needed to destroy a planet... Please change it back to its old colony costs... Overall, the game is awesome...

Good game, but $3.79 a month to remove ads? Most games have a one time payment to remove ads and it's usually less than that. Only $13 a month for World of Warcraft. There's SLIGHTLY better value for your dollar there.

descriptionHTML:
Welcome, Doctor! We've been waiting for you. Everything is prepared for you to take over and start cultivating bacteria to initiate BACTERIAL TAKEOVER!

We will start by taking over the smallest planets and move on to more difficult ones with a larger population and stronger infection resistance. We will need billions, trillions, quadrillion and even more bacteria to attack these planets. Which means your expertise in expanding and upgrading our bacterial colonies will be irreplaceable!

Build colonies, buy upgrades and generate bacteria on your own till you have enough to destroy planets and discover new powerful mutations! Remember that Plague is caused by the bacteria and it is our strength.

Bacterial Takeover is a mobile clicker and also idle game which allows you to become an evil genius that is set out to use biological weapons to destroy the whole Universe.

Main Features

- Explore universe and Destroy Planets
- Produce Nanobots and Bacteria
- Research Black Holes and Planets
- Evolve, Irradiate, and Mutate new Bacteria, overcome bacterial resistance
- Choose your Playstyle, a Tapping (clicking) or Idling
- Hoard Minerals, Gene Strands, Dark Matter and much more…

Join the community
https://www.facebook.com/bacterialTakeover/

Learn more
http://wiki.bacterialtakeover.com

comments: Love the game except for the new update. I have been saving up for a while for an elite pack and now that I have enough to purchase an elite card pack, you get rid of it! I have been wanting a diamond character and now you took it away from me. How can anyone get a diamond level character now. There is no way to purchase them either as they are elite pack exclusive cards. Not very happy. Waiting for this to be fixed until I'm satisfied.

Best game I have played, however after the updates i can't seem to see other game modes like faction wars challenge mode and even quest mode. I have reinstalled a couple of times, I have seen those missing modes in a novice account but whenever I log into my wbaccount they disappear leaving me with normal mode and  the tower mode.

Love the game. Hackers though ruin it, especially in faction wars in hard and fatal battles. For the ones who just updated, faction wars will show up within 12/24 hrs however not sure bout quest mode. Been playing actively for over 2 years, but still don't have All maxed out equipment or all maxed out characters. Hackers have everything maxed out which makes a mockery of our equipment.

I love the game so much, it's fun and gory but I used to play this on my IPhone and I got a new phone and I can't transfer my data even with my Facebook connected to it. My new phone is a galaxy s8 and I wonder if I can transfer my iPhone account to my galaxy. I don't to start over while my other phone have great and exclusive characters. Please help.

I love the game and new update. But i am soo disapointed, that you promissed us Injustice raiden and klassic mileena, still there are no challenges about them. Please make a new challenge a bout those charecters. Also injustice scorpion, undercover cassie cage and others. Please make this right.

Favorite Game This is my all time favorite game. I have an old phone I use just for this game with nothing else on it because it's so big. Even with nothing else, I still have to do a factory reset on my phone to delete everything just to reinstall this game every time they decide to do an update!
description: Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game. Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERSCollect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.  Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D’Vorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIESMortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERSCompete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.  Rank up in your own Faction’s leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLEFind other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAMEPlay the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. Playing the console version unlocks rewards in mobile as well.NOTICE:* Mortal Kombat X features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.** A minimum of 1.5 GB of free space is required on your device.Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.
descriptionHTML:
Experience the over-the-top, visceral fighting of MORTAL KOMBAT X!
Bring the power of next-gen gaming to your mobile and tablet device with this visually groundbreaking fighting and card collection game.
Assemble an elite team of Mortal Kombat warriors and prove yourself in the greatest fighting tournament on Earth.

BRUTAL 3 v 3 KOMBAT
Create your own team of Mortal Kombat fighters and lead them into battle to earn experience, new special attacks, and powerful artifacts.

MASSIVE ROSTER OF FIGHTERS
Collect Mortal Kombat veterans like Scorpion, Johnny Cage, Sub-Zero, Sonya, Kitana, Ermac, and many others.  Discover the newest additions to Mortal Kombat such as the insect-like D’Vorah, fiery Cassie Cage, bloodthirsty Kotal Khan, and the mysterious Kung Jin.

JAW DROPPING X-RAYS AND FATALITIES
Mortal Kombat X brings its trademark Fatalities and X-Rays to mobile, with stunning graphics, these over the top moves punch you right in the guts.

CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS
Compete with other players in Faction Wars, an online competitive mode where players engage other player teams.  Rank up in your own Faction’s leaderboard to earn weekly prizes.

SUMMON ALLIES INTO BATTLE
Find other players to be your Ally. Borrow a kombatant and strike a decisive blow against your enemies.

UNLOCK REWARDS IN BOTH THE CONSOLE AND MOBILE GAME
Play the game and unlock exclusive rewards for the console version of Mortal Kombat X, including ultra rare characters like Klassic Kitana and Injustice Scorpion. Playing the console version unlocks rewards in mobile as well.

NOTICE:
* Mortal Kombat X features high quality visuals. Performance is not optimized on devices with less than 1GB RAM.
** A minimum of 1.5 GB of free space is required on your device.
Content is generally suitable for ages 17 and up. Contains intense violence, blood, and gore.

Also, stay tuned for more Relic Hunt! Now Fight!

description: Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!Can you dig it?Join Diggy as you dig through diamonds and unearth special treasures. Epic adventures await you in the lands of Diamond Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond.  Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure! Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures!Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/termsDiamond Digger Saga features:● Bright and colorful graphics● Friendly and fascinating characters living in a fantasy world● Color bursts, line blasts and dynamite to lend a helping hand● Unlock boosters and special treasures hidden beneath the ground tiles!● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master ● Over 700 levels to complete filled with wondrous delights!● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internetAlready a fan of Diamond Digger Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:facebook.com/diamonddiggersagatwitter.com/diamond_diggerLast but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Diamond Digger Saga!
descriptionHTML:
Diamond Digger Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga & Farm Heroes Saga!

Can you dig it?

Join Diggy as you dig through diamonds and unearth special treasures. Epic adventures await you in the lands of Diamond Dale, Turquoise Meringue and beyond.

Diggy finds a treasure map, sparking his underground search for gems! Lead Diggy through a world full of diamonds in this wonderful digging adventure!

Dig a path by clearing away a group of 3 or more diamonds to reach a target score. Use the water to make your way through the rooms and discover treasures!

Unearth gems and rescue fireflies in this beautiful game of wonder and delight.

Take on this delightful Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score! 

Diamond Digger Saga is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or lives will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Diamond Digger Saga features:

● Bright and colorful graphics
● Friendly and fascinating characters living in a fantasy world
● Color bursts, line blasts and dynamite to lend a helping hand
● Unlock boosters and special treasures hidden beneath the ground tiles!
● Easy and fun to play, challenging to master 
● Over 700 levels to complete filled with wondrous delights!
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Already a fan of Diamond Digger Saga? Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for the latest news:

facebook.com/diamonddiggersaga
twitter.com/diamond_digger

Last but not least, a big THANK YOU goes out to everyone who has played Diamond Digger Saga!

summary: Can you dig it?
title: Diamond Digger Saga

comments: It's okay. The graphics are endearing. Controls and gameplay are smooth and easy to understand. A freemium game to be sure. It openly offers over-priced items like they are a great deal (they aren't). Most of it's purchase items are more expensive than other games. It has a gem subscription but for only 10 days, most simular games offer it for the full month for the same price, while offering more gems.

OMG THIS IS AWESOME PEOPLE DON'T KNOW WHAT THEY ARE MISSING THE GRAPHICS AND CONTROLS AND EVERYTHING ABOUT IT IS GREAT!!!!!! Except for the part when you raid somebody and the opponent's team always kills you before you kill them. ANYWAYS IT'S STILL THE BEST keep the updates coming IT IS SO FUN DESPITE NOBODY I KNOW EXCEPT FOR MY FAMILY EVEN KNOWS IT EXISTS GREATEST GAME EVEEEERRRRRR!!!

Multitude of heroes to make your team. Not stingy about giving the player stuff. Potential fun for all, as casual game. Has PvP elements. Energy bar system replenishes when level up and even progresses in size as you advance. Should not be an issue until you get farther in, random energy gains also occur on maps with a little luck. Short tutorial at game beginning is torture to endure but is over in under 5 min. Great free game!

Love the game so far. You could say I'm a try hard because I've only been playing the game for a month and a week and I'm already level 52. With 100% win rate and 83% defense rate  have one of the best teams in the game. And like I said before love it so far but for the next update. You'll should add friendly battles. Such as battling with your friends, clan mates, random players. Etc.

Pretty fun game but I had an issue happy pretty quickly into the game and I'm hoping devs see this and help out.  I bought ten common portals for the 100k gold, after opening the first one the game decided to crash and I am no longer able to redeem my 9 other chest. I change to 5 star if we can this resolved. Thanks

comments: This is probably the best horse game I have found so far. The porportions and the way the horses move are very accurate. A lot of horses in games I have seen have disporortionate bodies and are, over all, very unattractive.  The art style is similar to Spirit. Which was a big head-turner for me.

Can't log back in to my old account which I spent money on. Can't get the game to log back into my Facebook and I'm on the same Google account. The game crashes. All the time. When are the problems going to be fixed. This is worse then my beta tester games. Very unhappy also don't expect Ubisoft to help u

I'm playing this game for almost two years, and never get bored. I uninstalled a lot of game's on this time except Horse Haven: World Adventures. At this moment I think we need a Grand Stable for fantasy land, and another land for exclusive horse's, they are so much now on the game. Thank you Ubisoft for this awesome game. ❤️

I would definitely recommend this game to horse lovers. However, it doesn't satisfy me and the quite some Dutch players since it has our neighbouring countries Germany and France but not our own. It feels as if our country is just being neglected. It would be great if someone could do something about this issue.

description: THE WORLD IS YOURS, MAKE IT THE PERFECT HORSE HAVEN! Create and manage a dream horse farm spanning multiple exotic sites all over the world. Raise the perfect horse companion and join together in fun steeplechase races and activities!- CREATE YOUR DREAM HORSE HAVEN around the world: a majestic ranch in the USA, a charming stud farm in France, an enchanting valley in Germany, a picturesque rural town in England and a gorgeous Fantasy Island.- RAISE THE BEST HORSES: pet, nurture, feed, and groom your equine friends to help them grow from foal to adult!- BREED over a HUNDRED unique HORSES and PONIES from the most famous ones: Gypsy Vanner, Black Forest, Arabian, Thoroughbred, Clydesdale, Shetland Pony, Quarter, Mustang and more. - Mate your champions with your FRIEND's to unlock the rarest and best horses!- CUSTOMIZE your horses with stylish saddles and fancy leg wraps.- CAPTURE and SHARE their best looks with your friends.- RUN STEEPLECHASE AROUND THE WORLD and compete in the most gorgeous backdrops: The hills of Rio de Janeiro, Lapland’s Northern Lights, Japan’s cheery blossoms, and more.- CHALLENGE YOUR FRIENDS to win trophies and climb the daily leaderboards!Join your community!Facebook https://www.facebook.com/HorseHavenWorldAdventures/Instagram https://www.instagram.com/horsehavenofficial/Twitter https://twitter.com/HorseHavenWA

description: Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself. Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive! ◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro! The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News ▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade ▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo ▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro ▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint ▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play ▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN ◈◈◈Features: ● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed) ● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management) ● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful) ● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?) ● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!) ● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved) ● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements ● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon) P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references! Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!◈◈◈Like Plague Inc. on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc Follow me on Twitter: www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations
descriptionHTML:
Can you infect the world? Plague Inc. is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation.

Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero'. Now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself.

Brilliantly executed with innovative gameplay and built from the ground up for touchscreen, Plague Inc. from developer Ndemic Creations evolves the strategy genre and pushes mobile gaming (and you) to new levels. It’s You vs. the world - only the strongest can survive!

◈◈◈ #1 top game globally with 200 million+ games played ◈◈◈

Plague Inc. is a global hit with over half a million 5 star ratings and features in newspapers such as The Economist, New York Post, Boston Herald, The Guardian and London Metro!

The developer of Plague Inc. was invited to speak at the CDC in Atlanta about the disease models inside the game!

▶ “The game creates a compelling world that engages the public on serious public health topics” – The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
▶ “Best Tablet Game of 2012” - New York Daily News
▶ “Plague Inc. will snag your attention in all the right ways and keep it there” - Touch Arcade
▶ “No denying Plague Inc.'s high-level of quality” - Modojo
▶ “Plague Inc. should not be as much fun as it is” – London Metro
▶ “Will leave you hoping to destroy the world, all in the name of a bit of fun” – Pocket Lint
▶ “Plague Inc.'s gameplay is infectious” - Slide to Play
▶ Winner – “Overall Game of the Year” – Pocket Gamer
▶ “Killing billions has never been so fun” – IGN

◈◈◈

Features:
● Stunning HD graphics with a highly polished interface (Contagion guaranteed)
● Highly detailed, hyper-realistic world with advanced AI (Outbreak management)
● Comprehensive in-game help and tutorial system (I am Legendarily helpful)
● 12 different disease types with radically different strategies to master (12 Monkeys?)
● Full Save/Load functionality (28 Saves Later!)
● 50+ countries to infect, hundreds of traits to evolve and thousands of world events to adapt to (Pandemic evolved)
● Full game support for scoreboards and achievements
● Expansion updates add the mind controlling Neurax Worm, the zombie producing Necroa Virus, Speed Runs and real life Scenarios!

Localised in English, German, Spanish, Brazilian Portuguese, Italian, French, Japanese, Korean and Russian. (more coming soon)

P.S. Give yourself a pat on the back if you got all the themed literature references!

Special sale price to celebrate being the 15th most popular touchscreen game of 2012!

◈◈◈

Like Plague Inc. on Facebook:
http://www.facebook.com/PlagueInc

Follow me on Twitter:
www.twitter.com/NdemicCreations

comments: Bad physics are bad. The trucks always roll. You have to grind the first stage over and over and over and over to upgrade your truck. Even after you unlock stage 2 you can't get any points from it because your truck is so bad. It makes this game frustrating rather than challenging. The only way to go faster is to upgrade truck.  Not a huge fan.

Great game for killing time.. Having an issue with sound though.. Sound is fine with no headphones or wired head phones but the moment I try to play with my wireless headphones the sound gets choppy and one second of sound take 5 seconds to play.. This needs to get fixed please

DO NOT import gt. All it does is reset your progress and give you 1 more upgrade slot. So stupid. I uninstalled after this. Disgusting to lose a couple days progress to false advertising such as this.
Great game, but one level seriously needs to be looked at. Snow: Mayhem Marathon 1 is nearly impossible to beat. It's 99 percent luck on that level. Fix that and I'll give the game 5 stars all day.
The game is great. Anyone else have problems with beating pro racers I with the apc in under 57 secs? Stuck on that one...

Developer forces you to watch ads which is excessive considering most people will choose to watch ads for free items. Plain greedy. Stop wasting my time with your ads on good games. Let the player choose to watch the ads for rewards.

comments: It's a fun game but pvp is a big part and can take a week building up an army just to have it crushed when you log on. Has caused me to not play for a day or two because of this but also what makes me come back it offers that challenge that is often lost in most games like this where is the fun of there is no risk. Not to many tedious tasks after about day 5 no longer logging in every 3 hours to start a build project or something.

Other people might think its a boring game, but this game really fits for someone who doesnt want to get stressed out in a game.. really love the concept. Been a player here for almost 6 years now.. tried other games but still going back to this game.

Should add a few features like: 1. Able to share your battle report with other players. 2. Cancel troops in training. 3.See incoming attack on Hamlets you're holding (Or add a lost art which helps to see it).
My most resource hungry app on the tablet. Need to buy too many stuff to be a top level player. Lately, more stuff to buy and twice as expensive. Don't recommend this game.
Complex empire builder, takes time to learn. Definitely a pay to win. Lots of people with alts and coin hacks. Still lots to do. It's fun, but not worthy of serious commitment.
Reviving soldiers for sapphires must be the most ridiculous idea of all. My handful of soldiers need 2000 of those that are already impossible to acquire. :(
description: Immerse yourself in the dark world of fantasy and myth! Stormfall: Rise of Balur™ delivers epic battles in one of the most challenging and popular MMO strategy games available. The empire of Stormfall has fallen, and rival warlords join the battle across the continent as an ancient evil rises once again. You have been chosen to defend and protect the lands of Darkshine, and lead your people and your army through these dark times and into the light. For the first time, this popular free strategy game has been brought to mobile as a standalone, epic, multiplayer adventure, featuring groundbreaking graphics and genre-defining gameplay. Attack enemies, forge alliances and gather resources as you defend your castle from constant enemy attacks whilst simultaneously building and expanding your empire. Carefully plan your strategy and join clans in order to defeat rival leagues in this ultimate MMORPG. comments: Would of given 5 stars if it wasnt for the 300 energies as it doesnt go very far, would be better if it refilled twice a day instead of once. Why do you have to spend money on special scenes they should be unlocked if you picked the right choices not pay for them. Apart from that love the story and the graphics are great if these issues could be sorted that would be great

I downloaded this due to the narrative and the reviews, but I am not a fan of this game. 300 energies (30 sentences) is very short I get through it in about 3 minutes and then you wait an entire 24hours for another. I love the storyline and the graphics so therefore this would be good for someone who is a slower reader. It's a shame but I will be uninstalling.

Wish there was more energy or like an easier way to get more energy. I get 450 energy for the day with the initial 300 and playing the mini game which gives 100 and watching the adds which is 50. But it's not enough I feel like I only get about a couple sentences in and then I run out. Maybe if you could play the mini game every hour or two to get the 100 energy and watch the ads around the same time to get 150 instead of waiting 24 hrs it would be better. The story progresses too slowly with that little amount.

The game has me hooked. I'm big on reading so I fly through the 300 energies. I've spent $10 repeatedly, even $20 for energy and it feels like it was gone in the same amount of time as the 300 energies. If you allowed maybe 4 refills a day, it would be amazing, or some other way, maybe to just keep playing the minigame. There has to be something more other than 20 energies for a video once a day. But despite the lack of energy, this game has me so disgustingly hooked. I love it so much.

I think this game is really good. I just have one problem. Even though it says my energy is full, it feels like I have nothing. And also the mini game 100 energy seems to last longer than the initial 300 you receive. If you could fix this taht would be great. And if it's designed like this can you make energy spending more efficient?

This game really addictive!! The only problem is they don't give you enough energy.😒you either have to buy energy or play a mini game to get more energy. The highest energy points that you can get is 100. Plus the 30 points if you watch a video. Other than that the game is AMAZING. The graphics are realistic. It has a lot of romance too. You should definitely download this game if you're not bothered about the energy points.

descriptionHTML:
Is-it Love? Drogo - Vampire is a otome in English interactive.
Like for television series, new episodes (chapters) are regularly released.
This love story (Romance game) is free to download.

Story :
"You have decided to move to Mystery Spell to follow the exciting and esoteric course of its unusual university. Engaged as an au pair for the Bartholy family, you are in charge of looking after little Lorie.
Your hosts, Two rich and quite eccentric brothers, arouse the curiosity and fear of the inhabitants of the city who see them as evil ... The word vampire floats on all lips without ever being pronounced.
But the Bartholy's are not the only ones to have secrets. You will discover that students and teachers also have things to hide. But more surprisingly, you will learn more about yourself ...
You will have to side with all these strange characters and use courage to face the most impetuous of them: Drogo. You may even be able to tame his destructive character and discover in him a passionate lover ..."

✓ It's your game: Your choices, your interactive story

description: Enjoy one minute of explosive match-3 fun from PopCap Games! Detonate as many gems as you can, 60 action-packed seconds at a time, in the hit puzzle game played by over 125 million people worldwide. Match three or more and create cascades of awesome with Flame gems, Star gems, and Hypercubes. Use powerful Rare Gems and upgradable Boosts to compete against friends, or challenge other players and top the global leaderboards.DISCOVER EXPLOSIVE EXCITEMENTCollect special Boosts like Scrambler to scramble the board, or Detonator to blast all special gems, and add extra power and fun to each match. Then upgrade them up to 10 times for scores that reach the stratosphere! Use Boosts any time and without spending Coins. Boosts never expire, so you can focus on upgrading the ones that work for you. PERFECT YOUR STRATEGY WITH RARE GEMSAmazing and unique Rare Gems like Sunstone and Plume Blast provide big scores and even more excitement. Combine them with Boosts to achieve unbelievably high scores. Play your way when you create mighty combinations of glittering Rare Gems and three Boosts to develop your own personal approach. TOP THE LEADERBOARDSChallenge your friends to beat your best 60-second score or compete with players worldwide in local and global leaderboards. Track your performance with helpful tips on how to improve your game. And, compare your strategies with top players by looking at their Rare Gem and Boost combos. SPARKLING NEW CONTENTFeast your eyes on fresh visuals and enjoy remixed audio that has been overhauled to improve your experience. Play live events with players around the world and complete special tasks each week to earn exclusive rewards. Plus, get in the game faster than ever with a rebuilt user experience and simplified navigation."Important Consumer Information. comments: This game is quite good. The graphics are pretty nice for a kid's game, and I do appreciate how there are vents to win power up. That is a very nice update. It seems like Disney took the kids element a little more into consideration.  The later stages do get understandable harder. But after the 100th stage is almost impossible for kid's standerard, but I don't mind it since other games do the same thing.

The game WAS great..spin the wheel, watch an ad, get a gameplay reward.  Great. But OMG now there's an BETWEEN squares AND for  rewards??!!! After you refused to give me back lost features  & said "Disney had NO INTENTION of doing that in the future", I had to think whether to uninstall the game, or suck it up & gimp along. Think you guys made the decision for. Too bad, I really enjoyed the game. Thx for what USED TO BE fun.

This may not mean much to most. After suffering from a head injury, my memory was terrible. Level 250, memory coming back strong. I play daily on 2 devices. Just wish you could win gems, you have  to buy them except 22 in beginning. All in all 3-4 stars.

I love love love this game!  BUT....THE ONLY THING I HATE IS THAT YOU CANNOT SAVE YOUR PROGRESS...IVE HAD TO REINSTALL THIS GAME 3x's AND LOST ALL PROGRESS! Maybe if i wasn't on level 280 it wouldn't be an issue! You should have this as a feature by now! UGH! 😠😭

Impossible to save or synchronize progress! As mentioned in many other reviews, it is not possible to save game progress, even if you link to your Facebook account. App support website confirms this functionality is simply not supported. Absolutely unbelievable. Just unbelievable. Don't waste your time on this game - it really will be _wasted_ time.

This is a great game and you can have fun for hours. I'd rate it 5 stars if a few things were changed. First, you need to be able to sync on other devices, especially if connecting to Facebook. I have other games that sync, no reason why this game can't get with that technology. Just got a new phone, was at level 346, and now have to start over on new phone. Luckily old phone will still be used. Second, it's impossible to earn gems. There should be special events to earn gems. Yes, you can spin to win, but the odds aren't in your favor to earn them. Third, there should be more opportunities to earn helps. The event to pass 5 levels is extremely difficult and there aren't many other opportunities to earn helps. I'm not spending money on this game. Take tips from Farm Heroes! Overall, this is a fun game and the graphics are cute.
description: WINNER OF GOOGLE PLAY’S BEST OF 2015 APPS! From the creators of Frozen Free Fall and Where’s My Water?, Disney Interactive brings you this one-of-a-kind bubble-shooter based on the hit Disney•Pixar film, Inside Out!   Growing up can be a bumpy road, and it’s no exception for Riley. Like all of us, Riley is guided by her Emotions — Joy, Fear, Anger, Disgust and Sadness. Join Riley's Emotions on a journey to match, sort and burst memory bubbles, as you travel through unique locations inspired by the film — Family Island, Dream Productions, Boy Band Island, Imagination Land, Train Yard, and more! Play this bubble shooter that twists the puzzle genre inside out! • SHOOT & MATCH memories• UNLOCK characters and play over 1000 levels• UNLEASH POWER-UPS – Create sunbursts with Joy, let the rain pour with Sadness, blaze a fiery path with Anger, repel matching memories with Disgust, and scatter orbs in frantic fun with Fear!• OVERCOME obstacles like Brain Freezes and jump ahead using boosters like Brain Storms! • CONNECT to Facebook to gift and receive free lives, and to see how you stack up against your friends!• IMMERSE yourself in the world of the film through stunning 3D animation and gameplay featuring voice actors from the film!Before you download this app, please consider that this app includes advertising, some of which may be targeted to your interests. descriptionHTML:
Ultimate Match-3 game in the jewel world with addictive and exciting adventures!

Jewels Legend (from LinkDesks Inc.) is an addictive and exciting adventure match 3 game filled with colorful jewels crunching effects! This jewel game has well designed puzzles for you to play in anytime and anywhere! Be the Jewel Star and unlock all castles in this jewel saga game.

HOW TO PLAY
★ Match 3 or more jewels in a line to crush them.
★ Match 4 jewels to create special lightning jewels. Lightning jewels can make a blast to destroy all jewels in a row or column.
★ Match 5 jewels with T or L shape to create special jewels bomb. The jewels bomb can destroy all jewels around it.
★ Match 5 jewels in a line to create special color jewels. Color jewels can destroy all jewels with the same color of selected jewels .
★ Match 6 jewels can create a more powerful lightning jewel.It can destroy all jewels in a row AND a column.
★ Combine 2 special jewels together to make different kinds of fantastic effects to help you pass the level.
★ Reach different level target to pass levels in your adventure.

JEWEL LEGEND MATCH 3 PUZZLE FEATURES
★ Easy and fun to play, challenging to master.
★ More than 550 addictive jewel quest levels - more added regularly.
★ More than 150 challenging castle levels.
★ 5 completely different best match 3 games types.
★ Helpful magical boosters to win jewel stars.
★ Daily free bonus in best jewel games.
★ Auto hint when you jewel quest but could not find one match.

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
★ Connect to Facebook and play with friends!
★ See your friends on the map!
★ Synchronize the game on multiple devices and platforms!

EASY AND FUN PLAY
★ Easy to control, fun to play, great graphics!
★ Just swap & match with your single finger!

NO TIME LIMIT
★ Play at your own pace!

NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM!
★ Games you can play offline.

Classic Match3 games in Google Play. It is simple and fun, but also quite challenging. Easy to play, difficult to master. All levels are designed attentively. Your mission is to win the Jewels Stars. Pass these match 3 jewel levels and try to get all jewel stars in each level to unlock castles.

This best Jewel match-3 game is completely free to play, but some in-game items such as extra moves or jewel quest hints or lives will require payment.

Contact us for any problem: JewelLegend@linkdesks.com.

Match 3 Jewels and never stop!

comments: Played this on PC, and really enjoyed it for its simple, quirky playstyle. While it does trail off at the end when you've mastered everything, the entertainment value is still strong. Particularly like going back to this title every now and again for a no-pressure, casual simulation game. Surprisingly, Game Dev Tycoon is pretty smooth on mobile, so kudos to the devs!

Just gave this game 5 star everything. When this game first came out on PC I couldn't afford it, so I pirated it. Sorry Greenheart! Now I have the chance to purchase your game and I'm glad I have. I know I'm going to play this for hours on end. It is definitely the best indie game I've ever played. Looking forward to your next project Greenheart!!

Loving the game! Not sure where else to try to contact the devs, but I am having an issue. My auto save is from Year 15. I am currently in year 22, and so is my manual save. However, whenever I try to load my manual save, it only takes me back to the year 15 autosave. I know it's just a game but it's pretty upsetting to not be able to access that lost progress, so any tips or response would be awesome. Great game!

It's good. 80 hours on PC version. This has some extra bits. Just want to support Dev, but am looking forward to playing it more on phone. Haven't had a bug yet either. Controls are great, they really lended themselves to mobile!

Played for days on the PC version. This one is just like it, except in the palm of your hands. No micro transactions, coins, or loot boxes. One price for the full game. Amazing!  In Game Dev Tycoon, you make games and build a company to from your parents garage, to a fully fledged AAA Studio. The controls are awesome. Your first games will be tests to how and what gamers like. You'll develop games for real life hardware (with names changed for licensing issues). Eventually, when you get to late game, you can create your own console and compete with other companies, releasing exclusive titles of your own, and dominating the market share.   You'll easily lose if you're not careful with your finances, but the game is so addicting that you'll keep coming back to it. Like I did.

I don't ever rate games, but this one deserves it. Only been playing an hour and I love it. I'm already excited to start over and try things differently. Totally worth the money and I highly suggest this for any sim fans. Great time killer as well. Good job guys.
description: Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.Create games your wayYour success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.Grow your companyOnce you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.Features🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s✍ Design and create games💡 Gain new insights through game reports 👁 Research new technologies ⚙ Create custom game engines 🏢 Move into bigger offices 👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team 🔬 Unlock secret labs📈 Become a market leader💚 Gain worldwide fans🥇 Unlock achievementsThe full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.The mobile version introduces☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode📰 An updated storyline👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games📱 New UI optimized for phones and tabletsA game with 💚Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. Enjoy!
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Game Dev Tycoon. In this business simulation game you start your own game development company in the 80s. Create best selling games, research new technologies to boost your business and invent new game types. Become the leader of the market and gain worldwide fans.

Create games your way
Your success depends on your creativity and willingness to experiment. What topics and genres go well together? Should your Action game focus more on engine optimization or on quest design? The decisions you make during the development of your games will have a major impact on the ratings you receive.

Grow your company
Once you have successfully released a few games you can move into your own office and forge a world-class development team. Hire staff, train them and unlock new options.

Features
🕹 Start a game development company in the 80s
✍ Design and create games
💡 Gain new insights through game reports
👁 Research new technologies
⚙ Create custom game engines
🏢 Move into bigger offices
👩🏽‍💻 Forge a world-class development team
🔬 Unlock secret labs
📈 Become a market leader
💚 Gain worldwide fans
🥇 Unlock achievements

The full game has many more features which are not listed here to prevent spoilers.

The mobile version introduces
☠ A super-difficult (but optional) pirate mode
📰 An updated storyline
👩‍🍳 New topics for even more varied games
📱 New UI optimized for phones and tablets

A game with 💚
Game Dev Tycoon does not contain any in-app purchases or ads and you can play it without an internet connection. Enjoy!

comments: This game should be avoided. They don't care about what the players think and refuse to make improvements or adjustment players suggest. Progress is slow and even if you spend real money your odds of getting what you want is low.  Avoid starting at a costs. It is not worth your time.

It is impossible to have a good team without spending lots of money.  In order to have a good team you need 4 star level robots which even when you do get a chance to get one, you will end up with a duplicate which will be liquidated for just about nothing. Hence better players get better and lower level players stay at the bottom. Also players that spend alot tend to get better chances on draws that are supposed to be random. Wow that's a surprise

This game is a lot of fun. Great time killer. The only thing I think could be improve is the fact that you can't upgrade your bots with duplicates you get in the space bridge. And possibly better mechanics to see the bots you have walking around your base. Other than that. It's amazing.

Slow, VERY SLOW You have to wait for everything.  After each battle, the Autobots need 7 minutes to recover for the next battle, but I have enough fuel for battle.  And, as your robots get more stars, the more you have to wait.  So it is about 20 minutes per game for me. Slow  Then if you accidentally switch to another apps or shut the screen off for a second, you will have to wait for the game to reload for another 2 or 3 minutes.  slow  Graphics is beautiful, but story suck, and wait time is horrible

Updated. Games are supposed to be fun, if u play this game be prepared for a complete lack of respect for its user Base from the devs and a lack of fun events. Even those spending 1000s are bored  Don't start spending as the game is dying Don't expect good support from the game makers either who seem to be on a mission to put off it's older users to the point of stopping them playing the game. Ps dont expect many players as a deception. Pps #saveferal

First off, if you do not want duplicates, do _not_ spend any money on anything other than maybe another builder bot and don't waste any of your cyber coins on crystals until you get all of your builder bots.   So long as you don't care about getting dupes the game is fun. And you will get so very many many many dupes, often times the same bot in a row. Fortunately, the somewhat new cores help take away the pain of getting dupes.  Personally, I enjoy the strategic and alliance parts of this game a lot and the events are fun so long as you don't care about placement on the leaderboard. Having a good alliance helps a lot by the way. Don't be afraid to look around for ones that boot leaches.
description: Join millions of players in the battle for Earth! Forge colossal Combiners including Devastator, Superion, Predaking, Bruticus and Volcanicus, the new Dinobot Combiner. ‘TIL ALL ARE ONE!Form alliances with fellow Autobots or Decepticons from around the world.
